String.name: Self-Destruct
String.tooltip: Self-destruct to damage nearby targets.

String.name: Arrow I
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Focus Generation$BRShoot an arrow at a target up to $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of <font color = '#66bbff'>Focus</font>. (Stack Focus 10 times to reduce the charging time of Penetrating Arrow and Radiant Arrow.)
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced</font> damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour basic attack.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit.$BRDecreases cooldowns for <font color = '#f9b600'>Decoy Jutsu</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Double Cut</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Skyfall</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Circle of Steel</font>, and <font color = '#f9b600'>One Thousand Cuts</font> by 0.5 seconds with each hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRThe first hit of <font color = '#f9b600'>Combo Attack</font> staggers an enemy player.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile facing the target, press and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times.

String.name: Sharan Bolt I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUnleash a bolt of Sharan energy at a single target up to $maxDistance away.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Blast I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a shot which explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away. Replenishes 100 MP on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage] </font>$BRYour basic attack. Skill can be used while moving.

String.name: Punch I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a punch, <font color = '#66bbff'>replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.</font>$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing your target.

String.name: Slash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike a target and gain MP with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to three hits, with the third hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile facing the target, press and hold or hit the skill button consecutively to strike up to three times.

String.name: Divine Radiance I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a pulse of energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing a distant target.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more nearby targets, and <font color = '#66bbff'>gain MP</font> with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or use the skill button repeatedly to strike nearby enemies up to four times.

String.name: Fireball I
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot a fireball at one target within 18m.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Reduced</font> damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour basic attack.

String.name: Spiral Barrage I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more targets at melee and mid range, and gain MP with each hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button repeatedly to increase the damage.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more nearby targets, and <font color = '#66bbff'>gain MP</font> with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BRIncreases Attack Speed (for this skill only) by 20% after 14 successful hits.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour basic attack. Hold or use the skill button repeatedly to strike nearby enemies up to four times.

String.name: Punch I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a punch, <font color = '#66bbff'>replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.</font>$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing your target.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a punch, <font color = '#66bbff'>replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.</font>$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing your target.

String.name: Slash III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Spiral Barrage III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more targets at melee and mid range, and gain MP with each hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button repeatedly to increase the damage.

String.name: Slash III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Arrow IV
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Focus Generation$BRShoot an arrow at a target up to $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of <font color = '#66bbff'>Focus</font>. (Stack Focus 10 times to reduce the charging time of Penetrating Arrow and Radiant Arrow.)
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced</font> damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour basic attack.

String.name: Combo Attack IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit.$BRDecreases cooldowns for <font color = '#f9b600'>Decoy Jutsu</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Double Cut</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Skyfall</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Circle of Steel</font>, and <font color = '#f9b600'>One Thousand Cuts</font> by 0.5 seconds with each hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRThe first hit of <font color = '#f9b600'>Combo Attack</font> staggers an enemy player.

String.name: Combo Attack IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile facing the target, press and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times.

String.name: Sharan Bolt IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUnleash a bolt of Sharan energy at a single target up to $maxDistance away.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Blast IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a shot which explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away. Replenishes 100 MP on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage] </font>$BRYour basic attack. Skill can be used while moving.

String.name: Punch IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a punch, <font color = '#66bbff'>replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.</font>$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing your target.

String.name: Slash IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Combo Attack IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike a target and gain MP with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to three hits, with the third hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile facing the target, press and hold or hit the skill button consecutively to strike up to three times.

String.name: Divine Radiance IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a pulse of energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing a distant target.

String.name: Combo Attack IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more nearby targets, and <font color = '#66bbff'>gain MP</font> with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or use the skill button repeatedly to strike nearby enemies up to four times.

String.name: Fireball IV
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot a fireball at one target within 18m.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Reduced</font> damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour basic attack.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more nearby targets, and <font color = '#66bbff'>gain MP</font> with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BRIncreases Attack Speed (for this skill only) by 20% after 14 successful hits.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour basic attack. String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Punch VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a punch, <font color = '#66bbff'>replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.</font>$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing your target.

String.name: Slash VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Slash VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Arrow VII
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Focus Generation$BRShoot an arrow at a target up to $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of <font color = '#66bbff'>Focus</font>. (Stack Focus 10 times to reduce the charging time of Penetrating Arrow and Radiant Arrow.)
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced</font> damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour basic attack.

String.name: Combo Attack VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit.$BRDecreases cooldowns for <font color = '#f9b600'>Decoy Jutsu</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Double Cut</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Skyfall</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Circle of Steel</font>, and <font color = '#f9b600'>One Thousand Cuts</font> by 0.5 seconds with each hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRThe first hit of <font color = '#f9b600'>Combo Attack</font> staggers an enemy player.

String.name: Combo Attack VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile facing the target, press and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times.

String.name: Sharan Bolt VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUnleash a bolt of Sharan energy at a single target up to $maxDistance away.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Blast VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a shot which explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away. Replenishes 100 MP on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage] </font>$BRYour basic attack. Skill can be used while moving.

String.name: Punch VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a punch, <font color = '#66bbff'>replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.</font>$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing your target.

String.name: Slash VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Combo Attack VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike a target and gain MP with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to three hits, with the third hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile facing the target, press and hold or hit the skill button consecutively to strike up to three times.

String.name: Divine Radiance VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a pulse of energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing a distant target.

String.name: Combo Attack VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more nearby targets, and <font color = '#66bbff'>gain MP</font> with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or use the skill button repeatedly to strike nearby enemies up to four times.

String.name: Fireball VII
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot a fireball at one target within 18m.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Reduced</font> damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour basic attack.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Slash IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Arrow X
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Focus Generation$BRShoot an arrow at a target up to $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of <font color = '#66bbff'>Focus</font>. (Stack Focus 10 times to reduce the charging time of Penetrating Arrow and Radiant Arrow.)
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced</font> damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour basic attack.

String.name: Combo Attack X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit.$BRDecreases cooldowns for <font color = '#f9b600'>Decoy Jutsu</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Double Cut</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Skyfall</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Circle of Steel</font>, and <font color = '#f9b600'>One Thousand Cuts</font> by 0.5 seconds with each hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRThe first hit of <font color = '#f9b600'>Combo Attack</font> staggers an enemy player.

String.name: Combo Attack X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile facing the target, press and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times.

String.name: Sharan Bolt X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUnleash a bolt of Sharan energy at a single target up to $maxDistance away.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Blast X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a shot which explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away. Replenishes 100 MP on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage] </font>$BRYour basic attack. Skill can be used while moving.

String.name: Punch X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a punch, <font color = '#66bbff'>replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.</font>$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing your target.

String.name: Slash X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack enemies with a series of sweeping blows while moving forward.$BRThe fourth hit of Slash has 5 times the normal chance to crit, and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold or hit the skill button repeatedly to strike up to four times, moving forward a little with each strike.

String.name: Combo Attack X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike a target and gain MP with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to three hits, with the third hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile facing the target, press and hold or hit the skill button consecutively to strike up to three times.

String.name: Divine Radiance X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a pulse of energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing a distant target.

String.name: Combo Attack X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike one or more nearby targets, and <font color = '#66bbff'>gain MP</font> with each hit.$BRSuccessive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or use the skill button repeatedly to strike nearby enemies up to four times.

String.name: Fireball X
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot a fireball at one target within 18m.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Reduced</font> damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour basic attack.

String.name: Arrow Volley I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Shadow Jump
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRInstantly leap forward to evade enemy attacks. You can Shadow Jump twice within 3 seconds, and you can change direction between leaps.$BR - Invincible while moving$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to escape attacks or move quickly.

String.name: Axe Block I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'>Rage Skill</font>$BRBlock frontal attacks with your weapon. Damage blocked depends on your weapon's stats.$BRRemains active as long as you hold down the skill button. On successful block, allies behind you are also protected.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, damage blocked increases by 60%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to block frontal attacks. Remains active as long as you hold down the skill button.

String.name: Corruption Ring I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Drain HP</font> from targets within 6m, storing it as <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font>. The HP absorbed is proportional to how long you can channel the ring.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRThe longer you hold down the skill button, the greater the <font color = '#66bbff'>effect</font>. Follow with </font><font color = '#F9B600'>Infusion Ring</font> to release the stored energy.

String.name: Bombardment I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch a volley of eleven shots up to $maxDistance with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 100 Willpower for each successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once to target an area, then press the skill button again to launch an attack.

String.name: Counter I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Overhead Slash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive twice in a wide arc, damaging all nearby enemies with each pass. A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.

String.name: Stand Fast I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBlock frontal attacks with your shield.$BRDamage reduction depends on your equipment. Allies behind you also get damage reduction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to protect you and your allies from enemy attacks.$BRReduces damage as long as you hold down the skill button.

String.name: Regeneration Circle I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRUp to 5 allies within $maxDistance of you <font color = '#66bbff'>heal</font> $calcValue(heal,0,123,0) HP every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies need HP.

String.name: Knockdown Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Frost Sphere I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunches a damaging sphere of chilled air that <font color = '#66bbff'>penetrates</font> a line of targets up to $maxDistance, which has a chance to briefly slow the target's <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by 20%. Once the sphere reaches maximum range it shatters, damaging all nearby enemies.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD2.5%$COLOR_END of your Max. MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate distant enemies.

String.name: Evasive Roll
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLeap in the direction of movement to dodge an enemy's attack.$BRConsumes RE every time you use the skill.$BR - Invincible while moving$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while moving in a safe direction.

String.name: Counter I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Arrow Volley I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Infusion Ring I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRelease stored <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font> as MP to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates after successful hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Corruption Ring</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies are low on MP. The greater the number of targets who need MP restored, the less MP is given to each target.

String.name: Counter II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Arrow Volley II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Infusion Ring II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRelease stored <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font> as MP to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates after successful hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Corruption Ring</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies are low on MP. The greater the number of targets who need MP restored, the less MP is given to each target.

String.name: Overhead Slash II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive twice in a wide arc, damaging all nearby enemies with each pass. A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.

String.name: Knockdown Strike II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Overhead Slash II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive twice in a wide arc, damaging all nearby enemies with each pass. A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.

String.name: Arrow Volley III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Corruption Ring III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Drain HP</font> from targets within 6m, storing it as <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font>. The HP absorbed is proportional to how long you can channel the ring.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRThe longer you hold down the skill button, the greater the <font color = '#66bbff'>effect</font>. Follow with </font> <font color = '#F9B600'>Infusion Ring</font> to release the stored energy.

String.name: Bombardment III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch a volley of eleven shots up to $maxDistance with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 100 Willpower for each successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once to target an area, then press the skill button again to launch an attack.

String.name: Counter III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Overhead Slash III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive twice in a wide arc, damaging all nearby enemies with each pass. A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.

String.name: Regeneration Circle III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRUp to 5 allies within $maxDistance of you <font color = '#66bbff'>heal</font> $calcValue(heal,0,190,0) HP every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies need HP.

String.name: Knockdown Strike III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Frost Sphere III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunches a damaging sphere of chilled air that <font color = '#66bbff'>penetrates</font> a line of targets up to $maxDistance, which has a chance to briefly slow the target's <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by 20%. Once the sphere reaches maximum range it shatters, damaging all nearby enemies.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD2.5%$COLOR_END of your Max. MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate distant enemies.

While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Counter IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Arrow Volley IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Infusion Ring IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRelease stored <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font> as MP to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates after successful hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Corruption Ring</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies are low on MP. The greater the number of targets who need MP restored, the less MP is given to each target.

String.name: Overhead Slash IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive twice in a wide arc, damaging all nearby enemies with each pass. A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.

String.name: Knockdown Strike IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Overhead Slash IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive twice in a wide arc, damaging all nearby enemies with each pass. A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.

String.name: Arrow Volley V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Corruption Ring V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Drain HP</font> from targets within 6m, storing it as <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font>. The HP absorbed is proportional to how long you can channel the ring.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRThe longer you hold down the skill button, the greater the <font color = '#66bbff'>effect</font>. Follow with </font> <font color = '#F9B600'>Infusion Ring</font> to release the stored energy.

String.name: Bombardment V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch a volley of eleven shots up to $maxDistance with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 100 Willpower for each successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once to target an area, then press the skill button again to launch an attack.

String.name: Counter V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.

String.name: Regeneration Circle V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRUp to 5 allies within $maxDistance of you <font color = '#66bbff'>heal</font> $calcValue(heal,0,255,0) HP every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies need HP.

String.name: Knockdown Strike V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Frost Sphere V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunches a damaging sphere of chilled air that <font color = '#66bbff'>penetrates</font> a line of targets up to $maxDistance, which has a chance to briefly slow the target's <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by 20%. Once the sphere reaches maximum range it shatters, damaging all nearby enemies.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD2.5%$COLOR_END of your Max. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Knockdown Strike VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Counter VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Counter VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Arrow Volley VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Infusion Ring VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRelease stored <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font> as MP to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates after successful hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Corruption Ring</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies are low on MP. The greater the number of targets who need MP restored, the less MP is given to each target.

String.name: Overhead Slash VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive twice in a wide arc, damaging all nearby enemies with each pass. A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.

String.name: Knockdown Strike VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Overhead Slash VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive twice in a wide arc, damaging all nearby enemies with each pass. A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.

String.name: Arrow Volley VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Corruption Ring VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Drain HP</font> from targets within 6m, storing it as <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font>. The HP absorbed is proportional to how long you can channel the ring.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRThe longer you hold down the skill button, the greater the <font color = '#66bbff'>effect</font>. Follow with </font> <font color = '#F9B600'>Infusion Ring</font> to release the stored energy.

String.name: Regeneration Circle VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRUp to 5 allies within $maxDistance of you <font color = '#66bbff'>heal</font> $calcValue(heal,0,291,0) HP every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies need HP.

String.name: Frost Sphere VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunches a damaging sphere of chilled air that <font color = '#66bbff'>penetrates</font> a line of targets up to $maxDistance, which has a chance to briefly slow the target's <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by 20%. Once the sphere reaches maximum range it shatters, damaging all nearby enemies.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD2.5%$COLOR_END of your Max. String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Knockdown Strike VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Counter VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Counter VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Arrow Volley VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Infusion Ring VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRelease stored <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font> as MP to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates after successful hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Corruption Ring</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies are low on MP. The greater the number of targets who need MP restored, the less MP is given to each target.

String.name: Knockdown Strike VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Arrow Volley IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Corruption Ring IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Drain HP</font> from targets within 6m, storing it as <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font>. The HP absorbed is proportional to how long you can channel the ring.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRThe longer you hold down the skill button, the greater the <font color = '#66bbff'>effect</font>. Follow with </font> <font color = '#F9B600'>Infusion Ring</font> to release the stored energy.

String.name: Counter IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Regeneration Circle IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRUp to 5 allies within $maxDistance of you <font color = '#66bbff'>heal</font> $calcValue(heal,0,308,0) HP every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Apex]</font>$BRAdds <font color = '#f9b600'>Devoted Favor</font> to healed targets.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies need HP.

String.name: Knockdown Strike IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Frost Sphere IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunches a damaging sphere of chilled air that <font color = '#66bbff'>penetrates</font> a line of targets up to $maxDistance, which has a chance to briefly slow the target's <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by 20%. Once the sphere reaches maximum range it shatters, damaging all nearby enemies.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD2.5%$COLOR_END of your Max. MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate distant enemies.

String.name: Counter X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Counter X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Arrow Volley X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Infusion Ring X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRelease stored <font color = '#66bbff'>spiritual energy</font> as MP to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance.$BR$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stun</font>, and <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font> while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates after successful hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Corruption Ring</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when allies are low on MP. The greater the number of targets who need MP restored, the less MP is given to each target.

String.name: Knockdown Strike X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBowl your enemy over with a mighty swing that has a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to knock down your foe and start combos.

String.name: Arrow Volley XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Lock on</font> to $maxCount targets and shoot arrows within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then again (or left-click) to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Counter XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Chained Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks and strike enemies with destructive blows. Successful hits generate additional Rage. While active, consumes MP and adds frontal defense.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDamage increases when chained after one or more <font color = '#F9B600'>Punches</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Blow (after 1 Punch)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Stagger</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Jawbreaker (after 2 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock enemies into the air</font> while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep (after 3 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Pull</font> monsters toward you while blocking frontal attacks.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Wall Smasher (after 4 Punches)</font> - <font color = '#66bbff'>Knock down</font> enemies while blocking frontal attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Tornado Sweep's</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>pulling</font> effect does not apply to players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using <font color = '#F9B600'>Punch</font>, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Overhead Slash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive twice in a wide arc, damaging all nearby enemies with each pass. A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.
