String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive twice in a wide arc, damaging all nearby enemies with each pass. A successful hit stuns a target for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack (and possibly stun) every nearby enemy within close range.

String.name: Radiant Arrow I
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Charge up</font> the arrow's damage by holding down the skill button, then shoot the arrow up to $maxDistance by releasing the button. Charges to one level.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggers <font color = '#f9b600'>Sequential Fire</font> after use.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFires as soon as you release the skill button. The longer you press it, the more damage you'll do.

String.name: Leaves on the Wind I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Throw eight iron spikes, damaging enemies in a cone within 18m. Deals crit damage to enemies suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to attack targets at mid range.

String.name: Thunder Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRCharge up your axe to deliver a devastating attack. The longer you hold down the skill button, the greater the damage.$BRCharges to one level. Movement Speed is reduced while charging this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button, then release it while facing the target.

String.name: Titanic Wrath I
String.tooltip: Energy pours into you and non-hostile players within $maxDistance, increasing Power by $value for $time and Attack Speed by $value2.

String.name: Scattershot I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a spread of five penetrating shots at enemies within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 30 Willpower for each successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage enemies and generate Willpower.

String.name: Divine Wrath I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCall upon the fury of the gods to smite a group of enemies.$BRYour attack has a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown</font> and a high chance to crit. Also <font color = '#66bbff'>blocks attacks from the front</font>.</font>$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to deal one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once to activate, select your target area, then press the skill button to execute.

String.name: Glaive Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRToss your runeglaive in the air, then slam it into the ground to cause a massive explosion. Has a high chance to knock down nearby enemies.$BR$BRMust be used within 4 seconds of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to finish off any enemies left after using Leaping Slash.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 2 Runemarks on a successful hit.

String.name: Onslaught I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRush your foe and lunge repeatedly. Blocks attacks from the front. Your attacks draw more aggro.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if you first use <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Bash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to rush a distance target.

String.name: Healing Circle I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Heal</font> $calcValue(heal,0,2141.1,0) HP on up to $maxCount nearby group members.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRIncreases <font color = '#66bbff'>healing</font> by 25% and <font color = '#66bbff'>casting speed</font> by 20% if used after <font color = '#f9b600'>Focus Heal</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Backstep</font>, or <font color = '#f9b600'>Fiery Escape</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when nearby allies need HP.

String.name: Whirlwind I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin with your sword, hitting targets within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack nearby foes.

String.name: Lightning Trap I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSet a ring-shaped trap that briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stuns</font> its victims. Trap lasts 10 seconds or until triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to restrain a target.

String.name: Double Shear I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFling your scythes to strike a ranged target. The scythes strike the target again as they return to you. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRThe damage increases by 10% if <font color = '#F9B600'>Double Shear</font> (after the 3rd, 4th or 5th hit), <font color = '#F9B600'>Pendulum Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Whipsaw</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Death Spiral</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Smite</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shadow Lash</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Retribution</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Vengeful Attack</font> are used as a chained skill. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget the corresponding target and perform the skill.

String.name: Torrent of Blows I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> <font color = '#F9B600'>Edge Skill</font>$BRYou spin around and attack nearby enemies repeatedly. Draws high <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font> from surrounding enemies.$BRYou are more resistant to knockdown and stagger while using this skill. The damage you take is reduced by 25% and you have the <font color = '#66bbff'>frontal defense effect</font>.$BRThe damage is drastically reduced when used on a player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTime your attack to <font color = '#66bbff'>block</font> frontal attacks or <font color = '#66bbff'>draw aggro</font> from nearby enemies

Movement Speed is reduced while charging this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button, then release it while facing the target.

String.name: Scattershot IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a spread of five penetrating shots at enemies within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 30 Willpower for each successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage enemies and generate Willpower.

String.name: Glaive Strike IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRToss your runeglaive in the air, then slam it into the ground to cause a massive explosion. Has a high chance to knock down nearby enemies.$BR$BRMust be used within 4 seconds of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to finish off any enemies left after using Leaping Slash.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 2 Runemarks on a successful hit.

String.name: Healing Circle IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Heal</font> $calcValue(heal,0,3160.8,0) HP on up to $maxCount nearby group members.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRIncreases <font color = '#66bbff'>healing</font> by 25% and <font color = '#66bbff'>casting speed</font> by 20% if used after <font color = '#f9b600'>Focus Heal</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Backstep</font>, or <font color = '#f9b600'>Fiery Escape</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when nearby allies need HP.

String.name: Whirlwind IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin with your sword, hitting targets within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack nearby foes.

String.name: Radiant Arrow V
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Charge up</font> the arrow's damage by holding down the skill button, then shoot the arrow up to $maxDistance by releasing the button. Charges to one level.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggers <font color = '#f9b600'>Sequential Fire</font> after use.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFires as soon as you release the skill button. The longer you press it, the more damage you'll do.

Has a high chance to knock down nearby enemies.$BR$BRMust be used within 4 seconds of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to finish off any enemies left after using Leaping Slash.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 2 Runemarks on a successful hit.

String.name: Radiant Arrow X
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Charge up</font> the arrow's damage by holding down the skill button, then shoot the arrow up to $maxDistance by releasing the button. Charges to one level.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggers <font color = '#f9b600'>Sequential Fire</font> after use.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFires as soon as you release the skill button. The longer you press it, the more damage you'll do.

String.name: Thunder Strike X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRCharge up your axe to deliver a devastating attack. The longer you hold down the skill button, the greater the damage.$BRCharges to three levels. Overcharging beyond three levels will damage you. Movement Speed is reduced while charging this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button, then release it while facing the target.

String.name: Scattershot X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a spread of five penetrating shots at enemies within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 30 Willpower for each successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage enemies and generate Willpower.

String.name: Whirlwind X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin with your sword, hitting targets within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack nearby foes.

String.name: Penetrating Arrow I
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRCharge up the arrow's damage, then shoot a penetrating arrow at up to $pierceDepth targets in a $maxDistance line by releasing the button. Charges to one level.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chained Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggers <font color = '#f9b600'>Sequential Fire</font> after use.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFires as soon as you release the skill button. The longer you press it, the more damage you'll do.

String.name: Jagged Path I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Dash forward up to 25m in a serpentine fashion, attacking and staggering the first enemy you encounter.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to close the distance to an enemy.

String.name: Flatten I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPound the ground, knocking down targets within 4m.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRThis skill activates faster when following <font color = '#F9B600'>Sweeping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Raze</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Punishing Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Overwhelm</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Ancient Binding I
String.tooltip: Hurl a magical bolt forward $maxDistance, briefly slowing the target by $value.

String.name: Point Blank I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing your arcannon to attack enemies within $maxDistance. Press the skill button again to fire a second shot which moves you back.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Ground Pounder I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou pummel the ground and draw <font color = '#66bbff'>surrounding opponents closer to you</font> with every blow until, on the final strike, you hurl them into the air. Generates <font color = '#66bbff'>max. Aggro for 5 sec</font>. <font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font>. You gain Rage on every hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRBlocking an enemy attack for 0.5 seconds leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to convert 40% of the skill damage into critical hits on the enemy (if within 8m). You also gain 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace the target when you are surrounded or attacked by a group of enemies.

String.name: Charge I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Challenging Shout I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShout to draw aggro from monsters within 15 m and maintain it at maximum for 5 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTaunt the monsters to attack you and protect your group members.

String.name: Evasive Roll
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDodge your enemy's attack.$BR - Invincible while moving$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while moving in a safe direction.

String.name: Arcane Pulse I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Arcane Attack, Charge Skill</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Charge up</font> and launch a slow-moving pulse that <font color = '#66bbff'>penetrates</font> enemies within 21m.$BRThe skill damage and number of pulses are determined by the level of charge.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhanced Skill]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Mana Boost</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>increases</font> the number of pulses while active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to charge, and release it to launch the pulse(s).

String.name: Sundering Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRGather shadows into your scythes to deal a fatal blow to a target in front of you. Sundering Strike inflicts more damage to enemies with lower HP. Shadows at the epicenter of the attack explode after 3 seconds to deal additional damage. When chained, damage of the first explosion is increased by 20%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chained Skill Guide]</font>$BRSundering Strike activates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Death Spiral</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Double Shear</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Grim Strike</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCan be used while moving.

String.name: Rain of Blows I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Edge Skill</font>$BRExecute a flurry of sword swings while advancing on your foe.$BRYou take 25% less damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Combative Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cascade of Stuns</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Charge I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Charge I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Challenging Shout I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShout to draw aggro from monsters within 15 m and maintain it at maximum for 5 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTaunt the monsters to attack you and protect your group members.

String.name: Sundering Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRGather shadows into your scythes to deal a fatal blow to a target in front of you. Sundering Strike inflicts more damage to enemies with lower HP. Shadows at the epicenter of the attack explode after 3 seconds to deal additional damage. When chained, damage of the first explosion is increased by 20%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chained Skill Guide]</font>$BRSundering Strike activates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Death Spiral</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Double Shear</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Grim Strike</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCan be used while moving.

String.name: Charge I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Penetrating Arrow II
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRCharge up the arrow's damage, then shoot a penetrating arrow at up to $pierceDepth targets in a $maxDistance line by releasing the button. Charges to two levels.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chained Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggers <font color = '#f9b600'>Sequential Fire</font> after use.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFires as soon as you release the skill button. The longer you press it, the more damage you'll do.

String.name: Jagged Path II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Dash forward up to 25m in a serpentine fashion, attacking and staggering the first enemy you encounter.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to close the distance to an enemy.

String.name: Flatten II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPound the ground, knocking down targets within 4m.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRThis skill activates faster when following <font color = '#F9B600'>Sweeping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Raze</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Punishing Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Overwhelm</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Ancient Binding II
String.tooltip: Hurl a magical bolt forward $maxDistance, briefly slowing the target by $value.

String.name: Point Blank II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing your arcannon to attack enemies within $maxDistance. Press the skill button again to fire a second shot which moves you back.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Ground Pounder II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou pummel the ground and draw <font color = '#66bbff'>surrounding opponents closer to you</font> with every blow until, on the final strike, you hurl them into the air. Generates <font color = '#66bbff'>max. Aggro for 5 sec</font>. <font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font>. You gain Rage on every hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRBlocking an enemy attack for 0.5 seconds leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to convert 40% of the skill damage into critical hits on the enemy (if within 8m). You also gain 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace the target when you are surrounded or attacked by a group of enemies.

String.name: Charge II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Challenging Shout II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShout to draw aggro from monsters within 15 m and maintain it at maximum for 5 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTaunt the monsters to attack you and protect your group members.

String.name: Evasive Roll II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDodge your enemy's attack.$BRYou can dodge again if you press the skill button again within 4 seconds. Skill cooldown begins after the second dodge.$BR - Invincible while moving$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while moving in a safe direction.

String.name: Arcane Pulse IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Arcane Attack, Charge Skill</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Charge up</font> and launch a slow-moving pulse that <font color = '#66bbff'>penetrates</font> enemies within 21m.$BRThe skill damage and number of pulses are determined by the level of charge.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhanced Skill]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Mana Boost</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>increases</font> the number of pulses while active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to charge, and release it to launch the pulse(s).

String.name: Rain of Blows IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Edge Skill</font>$BRExecute a flurry of sword swings while advancing on your foe.$BRYou take 25% less damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Combative Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cascade of Stuns</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Charge IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Charge IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Challenging Shout IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShout to draw aggro from monsters within 15 m and maintain it at maximum for 5 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTaunt the monsters to attack you and protect your group members.

String.name: Charge IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Penetrating Arrow V
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRCharge up the arrow's damage, then shoot a penetrating arrow at up to $pierceDepth targets in a $maxDistance line by releasing the button. Charges to three levels.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chained Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggers <font color = '#f9b600'>Sequential Fire</font> after use.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFires as soon as you release the skill button. The longer you press it, the more damage you'll do.

String.name: Jagged Path V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Dash forward up to 25m in a serpentine fashion, attacking and staggering the first enemy you encounter.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to close the distance to an enemy.

String.name: Flatten V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPound the ground, knocking down targets within 4m.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRThis skill activates faster when following <font color = '#F9B600'>Sweeping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Raze</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Punishing Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Overwhelm</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Point Blank V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing your arcannon to attack enemies within $maxDistance. Press the skill button again to fire a second shot which moves you back.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Ground Pounder V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou pummel the ground and draw <font color = '#66bbff'>surrounding opponents closer to you</font> with every blow until, on the final strike, you hurl them into the air. Generates <font color = '#66bbff'>max. Aggro for 5 sec</font>. <font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font>. You gain Rage on every hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRBlocking an enemy attack for 0.5 seconds leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to convert 40% of the skill damage into critical hits on the enemy (if within 8m). You also gain 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace the target when you are surrounded or attacked by a group of enemies.

String.name: Charge V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Arcane Attack, Charge Skill</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Charge up</font> and launch a slow-moving pulse that <font color = '#66bbff'>penetrates</font> enemies within 21m.$BRThe skill damage and number of pulses are determined by the level of charge.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhanced Skill]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Mana Boost</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>increases</font> the number of pulses while active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to charge, and release it to launch the pulse(s).

String.name: Rain of Blows VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Edge Skill</font>$BRExecute a flurry of sword swings while advancing on your foe.$BRYou take 25% less damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Combative Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cascade of Stuns</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Charge VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Charge VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Challenging Shout VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShout to draw aggro from monsters within 15 m and maintain it at maximum for 5 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTaunt the monsters to attack you and protect your group members.

String.name: Charge VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Penetrating Arrow IX
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRCharge up the arrow's damage, then shoot a penetrating arrow at up to $pierceDepth targets in a $maxDistance line by releasing the button. Charges to three levels.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chained Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggers <font color = '#f9b600'>Sequential Fire</font> after use.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFires as soon as you release the skill button. The longer you press it, the more damage you'll do.

String.name: Jagged Path IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Dash forward up to 25m in a serpentine fashion, attacking and staggering the first enemy you encounter.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to close the distance to an enemy.

String.name: Flatten IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPound the ground, knocking down targets within 4m.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRThis skill activates faster when following <font color = '#F9B600'>Sweeping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Raze</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Punishing Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Overwhelm</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Ground Pounder IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou pummel the ground and draw <font color = '#66bbff'>surrounding opponents closer to you</font> with every blow until, on the final strike, you hurl them into the air. Generates <font color = '#66bbff'>max. Aggro for 5 sec</font>. <font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font>. You gain Rage on every hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRBlocking an enemy attack for 0.5 seconds leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to convert 40% of the skill damage into critical hits on the enemy (if within 8m). You also gain 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace the target when you are surrounded or attacked by a group of enemies.

String.name: Charge X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDash forward and attack the first target in your path.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRA successful hit staggers an enemy player.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to close the distance to an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit, if the target does not have any Runemarks.

String.name: Rain of Arrows I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot arrows into the sky; they descend $offsetDistance away and damage targets in the circle where they land.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when fighting multiple enemies.

String.name: Impact Bomb I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Toss a flame bomb at your feet and jump back, damaging your enemies and suspending them in the air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to evade and damage an enemy in close proximity.

String.name: Dash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRIncrease your speed by $value for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to move quickly.

String.name: Titanic Favor I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRLock on up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>heal $calcValue(heal,0,604,0) HP</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRChain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Warding Totem</font> for more effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move reticule over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to affect all targets.

String.name: Burst Fire I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Willpower Skill$BRFire a series of shots at targets within $maxDistance. Each successive shot has increased chance to crit and skill damage. A successful hit <font color = '#66bbff'>decreases a target's Movement Speed</font> for a short time (no effect on bosses).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to continue firing as long as you have Willpower.

String.name: Bull Rush I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge forward, <font color = '#66bbff'>driving back</font> enemies in your path, generating <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BREnemy players can use evasion skills while being pushed.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to gather the targets. Use your mouse to adjust your course in mid-charge.

String.name: Maelstrom I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPull minions and normal monsters toward you with a damaging vortex attack. The final swing has double the normal chance to crit and a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to pull nearby enemies close, damaging them in the process.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit.

String.name: Shield Bash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBriefly stun one or more foes.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if you first use <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when facing a melee target.

String.name: Blessing of Shakan I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRYou and allies within $maxDistance receive a blessing that increases non-combat Movement Speed by 10 and <font color = '#66bbff'>recovers $calcValue(heal,0,67,0) HP</font> every 2 seconds for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when nearby group members are preparing to move.

String.name: Dash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRIncrease your Movement Speed by $value for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to move faster.

String.name: Mana Infusion I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Replenishes</font> 400 MP every second, up to a maximum of 2,000 MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are low on MP.

String.name: Grim Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou strike down hard in front of you with your scythes.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRGrim Strike activates faster when chained with <font color = '#F9B600'>Spiral Barrage</font> (after 3rd, 4th, or 5th hit), <font color = '#F9B600'>Double Shear</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Pendulum Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Whipsaw</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Death Spiral</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Smite</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shadow Lash</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Retribution</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Vengeful Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRIf you don't press a direction key, the skill is performed on the spot. If you press the forward button while using the skill, you only move a little.

String.name: Battle Cry I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYour warlike shout has a chance to <font color = '#66bbff'>stun</font> enemies within $maxDistance.$BRAgainst monsters, it also draws <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font> and maintains it at maximum for 5 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = k'#66bbff'>stun</font> or <font color = '#66bbff'>taunt</font> targets.

String.name: Maelstrom II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPull minions and normal monsters toward you with a damaging vortex attack. The final swing has double the normal chance to crit and a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to pull nearby enemies close, damaging them in the process.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit.

String.name: Rain of Arrows III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot arrows into the sky; they descend $offsetDistance away and damage targets in the circle where they land.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A2FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when fighting multiple enemies.

String.name: Impact Bomb III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Toss a flame bomb at your feet and jump back, damaging your enemies and suspending them in the air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to evade and damage an enemy in close proximity.

String.name: Titanic Favor III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRLock on up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>heal $calcValue(heal,0,993,0) HP</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRChain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Warding Totem</font> for more effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move reticule over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to affect all targets.

String.name: Burst Fire III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Willpower Skill$BRFire a series of shots at targets within $maxDistance. Each successive shot has increased chance to crit and skill damage. A successful hit <font color = '#66bbff'>decreases a target's Movement Speed</font> for a short time (no effect on bosses).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to continue firing as long as you have Willpower.

String.name: Bull Rush III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge forward, <font color = '#66bbff'>driving back</font> enemies in your path, generating <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BREnemy players can use evasion skills while being pushed.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to gather the targets. Use your mouse to adjust your course in mid-charge.

String.name: Maelstrom III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPull minions and normal monsters toward you with a damaging vortex attack. The final swing has double the normal chance to crit and a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to pull nearby enemies close, damaging them in the process.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit.

String.name: Blessing of Shakan III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRYou and allies within $maxDistance receive a blessing that increases non-combat Movement Speed by 10, <font color = '#66bbff'>Power</font> by 25, <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> by 11, all <font color = '#66bbff'>resistances</font> by 5, and <font color = '#66bbff'>recovers $calcValue(heal,0,73,0) HP</font> every 2 seconds for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when nearby group members are preparing to move.

String.name: Dash III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRIncrease your Movement Speed by $value for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to move faster.

String.name: Grim Strike III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou strike down hard in front of you with your scythes.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRGrim Strike activates faster when chained with <font color = '#F9B600'>Spiral Barrage</font> (after 3rd, 4th, or 5th hit), <font color = '#F9B600'>Double Shear</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Pendulum Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Whipsaw</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Death Spiral</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Smite</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shadow Lash</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Retribution</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Vengeful Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRIf you don't press a direction key, the skill is performed on the spot. If you press the forward button while using the skill, you only move a little.

String.name: Battle Cry III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYour warlike shout has a chance to <font color = '#66bbff'>stun</font> enemies within $maxDistance.$BRAgainst monsters, it also draws <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font> and maintains it at maximum for 5 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>stun</font> or <font color = '#66bbff'>taunt</font> targets.

String.name: Titanic Favor III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRLock on up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>heal $calcValue(heal,0,993,0) HP</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRChain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Warding Totem</font> for more effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move reticule over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to affect all targets.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPull minions and normal monsters toward you with a damaging vortex attack. The final swing has double the normal chance to crit and a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to pull nearby enemies close, damaging them in the process.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRLock on up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>heal $calcValue(heal,0,2101,0) HP</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRChain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Warding Totem</font> for more effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move reticule over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to affect all targets.

String.name: Burst Fire IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Willpower Skill$BRFire a series of shots at targets within $maxDistance. Each successive shot has increased chance to crit and skill damage. A successful hit <font color = '#66bbff'>decreases a target's Movement Speed</font> for a short time (no effect on bosses).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to continue firing as long as you have Willpower.

String.name: Bull Rush IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge forward, <font color = '#66bbff'>driving back</font> enemies in your path, generating <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BREnemy players can use evasion skills while being pushed.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to gather the targets. Use your mouse to adjust your course in mid-charge.

String.name: Titanic Favor IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRLock on up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>heal $calcValue(heal,0,2101,0) HP</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRChain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Warding Totem</font> for more effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move reticule over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to affect all targets.

String.name: Rain of Arrows X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot arrows into the sky; they descend $offsetDistance away and damage targets in the circle where they land.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A9FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when fighting multiple enemies.

String.name: Titanic Favor X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRLock on up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>heal $calcValue(heal,0,2182,0) HP</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Heals an additional 15000 HP</font> when target has the <font color = '#66bbff'>Arun's Breath</font> effect.$BR$BRChain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Warding Totem</font> for more effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move reticule over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to affect all targets.

String.name: Burst Fire X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font> Willpower Skill$BRFire a series of shots at targets within $maxDistance. Each successive shot has increased chance to crit and skill damage. Skill damage increases by 600%$calcValue(multiple,1006,2.5,2) and chance to crit is significantly increased.$BR This effect is increased based on your Magic Crit Power.$BRA successful hit <font color = '#66bbff'>decreases a target's Movement Speed</font> for a short time (no effect on bosses).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arcannon Quick Cooling]</font>$BRRefreshes the state of the arcannon. $H_S_GOODArcannon Cooling$COLOR_END is stacked when using Burst Fire. On 15 stacks, you receive the $H_S_GOODFrozen Arcannon$COLOR_END effect and Magic Amplification is increased by $H_S_GOOD5%$COLOR_END.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to continue firing as long as you have Willpower.

String.name: Titanic Favor X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRLock on up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>heal $calcValue(heal,0,2182,0) HP</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Heals an additional 15000 HP</font> when target has the <font color = '#66bbff'>Arun's Breath</font> effect.$BR$BRChain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Warding Totem</font> for more effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move reticule over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to affect all targets.

String.name: Targeted Burst Fire
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font> Modular Weapons Exclusive Willpower Skill$BRFire a series of shots at targets within $maxDistance with the Modular Weapons System support. Each successive shot has increased chance to crit and skill damage. Skill damage increases by 600%$calcValue(multiple,1006,2.5,2) and chance to crit is significantly increased. This effect is increased based on your Magic Crit Power. A successful hit <font color = '#66bbff'>decreases a target's Movement Speed</font> for a short time (no effect on bosses) and decreases the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>[Balder's Vengeance]</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'><font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arcannon Efficiency Cooling]</font>Fully refreshes the state of the arcannon. $H_S_GOODArcannon Efficiency Cooling$COLOR_END is stacked when using Targeted Burst Fire. On 15 stacks, you receive the $H_S_GOODOverfrozen Arcannon$COLOR_END effect and Magic Amplification is increased by $H_S_GOOD8%$COLOR_END.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to continue firing as long as you have Willpower.

String.name: Maelstrom I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPull minions and normal monsters toward you with a damaging vortex attack. The final swing has double the normal chance to crit and a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to pull nearby enemies close, damaging them in the process.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRQuickly leap out of harm's way.$BR -<font color = '#66bbff'>Invincible</font> while moving$BR -You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to dodge in the current movement direction or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.

String.name: One Thousand Cuts I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Charge forward and execute a lightning-fast series of attacks that damage and stagger enemies. You are immune to damage while attacking.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to deliver a lot of damage to a nearby enemy.

String.name: Sweeping Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Rage Skill</font>$BRMake a sweeping attack that briefly stuns and turns your target around.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, stun duration is increased and targets do not spin.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a target.

String.name: Shara's Lash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCast a bolt of Sharan energy forward $maxDistance that explodes at range or on contact, briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stunning</font> foes.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Reduces Movement Speed</font> of targets when <font color = '#66bbff'>stun effect</font> ends.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing the target.

String.name: Time Bomb I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a shot that explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away, leaving behind a Time Bomb that explodes shortly thereafter. Enemies near a Time Bomb are <font color = '#66bbff'>slowed</font>, and the secondary detonation blasts any surviving enemies <font color = '#66bbff'>into the air</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 20 Willpower on a successful hit, and 40 Willpower from the secondary detonation.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an area or enemy for destruction. Skill can be used while moving.

String.name: Haymaker I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWind up and throw a terrific punch, with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>knocking the enemy down</font>.$BRA successful hit increases your Rage. You deal more damage when the enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>HP is lower</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target. <font color = '#66bbff'>The lower the enemy's HP</font>, the higher the damage.

String.name: Leaping Slash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLeap into the air with a sweeping attack, then slam your enemies with a powerful overhand strike. Minions and normal monsters are suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRGround Bash</font> and Glaive Strike activate faster if used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]$BRUse this skill to lead off an attack, or set up chain skills.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful overhand strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>$BRGenerates 20 additional Ragnarok points on a successful secondary hit.

String.name: Arise I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRInstantly <font color = '#66bbff'>stands</font> group members up to $maxDistance away and increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Balance Factor</font> by $value for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when group members are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked down</font>.

String.name: Backstab I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRush $maxDistance and make a lethal thrust to your target's back.$BRThe target is immobilized. Ends if target is knocked down.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage and disable a single target.

String.name: Meteor Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummons a flaming meteor and bombards targets in a 4m radius circle centered 10m in front of you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when a group of enemies is a short distance away.

String.name: Death Spiral I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your scythes in a 720-degree arc, dealing damage to all enemies around you, and reducing the Movement Speed of all monsters hit for 5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRYou can use Death Spiral in a chain to interrupt your own skill actions.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Haymaker I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWind up and throw a terrific punch, with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>knocking the enemy down</font>.$BRA successful hit increases your Rage. String.name: Leaping Slash II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLeap into the air with a sweeping attack, then slam your enemies with a powerful overhand strike. Minions and normal monsters are suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRGround Bash</font> and Glaive Strike activate faster if used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]$BRUse this skill to lead off an attack, or set up chain skills.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful overhand strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>$BRGenerates 20 additional Ragnarok points on a successful secondary hit.

String.name: Arise II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRInstantly <font color = '#66bbff'>stands</font> group members up to $maxDistance away and increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Balance Factor</font> by $value for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when group members are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked down</font>.

String.name: Backstab II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRush $maxDistance and make a lethal thrust to your target's back.$BRThe target is immobilized. Ends if target is knocked down.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage and disable a single target.

String.name: Meteor Strike II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummons a flaming meteor and bombards targets in a 4m radius circle centered 10m in front of you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when a group of enemies is a short distance away.

String.name: Death Spiral II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your scythes in a 720-degree arc, dealing damage to all enemies around you, and reducing the Movement Speed of all monsters hit for 5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRYou can use Death Spiral in a chain to interrupt your own skill actions.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Haymaker II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWind up and throw a terrific punch, with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>knocking the enemy down</font>.$BRA successful hit increases your Rage. You deal more damage when the enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>HP is lower</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target. <font color = '#66bbff'>The lower the enemy's HP</font>, the higher the damage.

String.name: Backstab II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRush $maxDistance and make a lethal thrust to your target's back.$BRThe target is immobilized. Ends if target is knocked down. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage and disable a single target.

String.name: Haymaker II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWind up and throw a terrific punch, with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>knocking the enemy down</font>.$BRA successful hit increases your Rage. You deal more damage when the enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>HP is lower</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target. <font color = '#66bbff'>The lower the enemy's HP</font>, the higher the damage.

String.name: Sweeping Strike II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Rage Skill</font>$BRMake a sweeping attack that briefly stuns and turns your target around.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, stun duration is increased and targets do not spin.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a target.

String.name: One Thousand Cuts III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Charge forward and execute a lightning-fast series of attacks that damage and stagger enemies. You are immune to damage while attacking.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to deliver a lot of damage to a nearby enemy.

String.name: Sweeping Strike III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Rage Skill</font>$BRMake a sweeping attack that briefly stuns and turns your target around.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, stun duration is increased and targets do not spin.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a target.

String.name: Time Bomb III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a shot that explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away, leaving behind a Time Bomb that explodes shortly thereafter. Enemies near a Time Bomb are <font color = '#66bbff'>slowed</font>, and the secondary detonation blasts any surviving enemies <font color = '#66bbff'>into the air</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 20 Willpower on a successful hit, and 40 Willpower from the secondary detonation.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an area or enemy for destruction. Skill can be used while moving.

Minions and normal monsters are suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRGround Bash</font> and Glaive Strike activate faster if used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]$BRUse this skill to lead off an attack, or set up chain skills.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful overhand strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>$BRGenerates 20 additional Ragnarok points on a successful secondary hit.

String.name: Haymaker V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWind up and throw a terrific punch, with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>knocking the enemy down</font>.$BRA successful hit increases your Rage. You deal more damage when the enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>HP is lower</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target. <font color = '#66bbff'>The lower the enemy's HP</font>, the higher the damage.

String.name: Leaping Slash V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLeap into the air with a sweeping attack, then slam your enemies with a powerful overhand strike. Minions and normal monsters are suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRGround Bash</font> and Glaive Strike activate faster if used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]$BRUse this skill to lead off an attack, or set up chain skills.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful overhand strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>$BRGenerates 20 additional Ragnarok points on a successful secondary hit.

String.name: One Thousand Cuts VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Charge forward and execute a lightning-fast series of attacks that damage and stagger enemies. You are immune to damage while attacking.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to deliver a lot of damage to a nearby enemy.

String.name: Sweeping Strike VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Rage Skill</font>$BRMake a sweeping attack that briefly stuns and turns your target around.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, stun duration is increased and targets do not spin.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a target.

String.name: Time Bomb VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a shot that explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away, leaving behind a Time Bomb that explodes shortly thereafter. Enemies near a Time Bomb are <font color = '#66bbff'>slowed</font>, and the secondary detonation blasts any surviving enemies <font color = '#66bbff'>into the air</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 20 Willpower on a successful hit, and 40 Willpower from the secondary detonation.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an area or enemy for destruction. Skill can be used while moving.

String.name: Haymaker VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWind up and throw a terrific punch, with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>knocking the enemy down</font>.$BRA successful hit increases your Rage. You deal more damage when the enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>HP is lower</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target. <font color = '#66bbff'>The lower the enemy's HP</font>, the higher the damage.

String.name: Meteor Strike VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummons a flaming meteor and bombards targets in a 4m radius circle centered 10m in front of you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when a group of enemies is a short distance away.

HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, stun duration is increased and targets do not spin.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a target.

String.name: Haymaker IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWind up and throw a terrific punch, with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>knocking the enemy down</font>.$BRA successful hit increases your Rage. You deal more damage when the enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>HP is lower</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target. <font color = '#66bbff'>The lower the enemy's HP</font>, the higher the damage.

String.name: Leaping Slash IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLeap into the air with a sweeping attack, then slam your enemies with a powerful overhand strike. Minions and normal monsters are suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRGround Bash</font> and Glaive Strike activate faster if used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]$BRUse this skill to lead off an attack, or set up chain skills.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful overhand strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>$BRGenerates 20 additional Ragnarok points on a successful secondary hit.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWind up and throw a terrific punch, with a high chance of <font color = '#66bbff'>knocking the enemy down</font>.$BRA successful hit increases your Rage. You deal more damage when the enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>HP is lower</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target. <font color = '#66bbff'>The lower the enemy's HP</font>, the higher the damage.

String.name: One Thousand Cuts X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Charge forward and execute a lightning-fast series of attacks that damage and stagger enemies. You are immune to damage while attacking.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to deliver a lot of damage to a nearby enemy.

String.name: Sweeping Strike X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Rage Skill</font>$BRMake a sweeping attack that briefly stuns and turns your target around.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, stun duration is increased and targets do not spin.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a target.

String.name: Time Bomb X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFire a shot that explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away, leaving behind a Time Bomb that explodes shortly thereafter. Enemies near a Time Bomb are <font color = '#66bbff'>slowed</font>, and the secondary detonation blasts any surviving enemies <font color = '#66bbff'>into the air</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 20 Willpower on a successful hit, and 40 Willpower from the secondary detonation.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an area or enemy for destruction. Skill can be used while moving.

String.name: Meteor Strike X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Flame Attack</font>$BRSpend $H_S_GOOD12%$COLOR_END of your Maximum MP to summon a flaming meteor and bombards targets in a 4m radius circle centered 10m in front of you. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhanced Skill]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Mana Boost</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>increases</font> the number of meteors while active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when a group of enemies is a short distance away.

String.name: Feign Death I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeceive monsters by pretending to be dead. This <font color = '#66bbff'>resets all aggro</font> on you. You can feign death for up to $time. <font color = '#66bbff'>Ends</font> when you use a skill or take damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to clear aggro.

String.name: Decoy Jutsu I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPlace a decoy, then teleport behind an enemy within 15m. You are briefly immune to damage after teleporting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to evade and attack a nearby enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRCooldown doubles when you attack an enemy player.

String.name: Mocking Shout
String.tooltip: Your warlike shout has a chance of staggering enemies within $maxDistance. You become immune to knockdown and stagger for $time, while greatly increasing your resistance to weakening effects.

String.name: Mana Infusion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Replenish $value MP</font> every second for $time.$BR$BREnds if you take damage or use a <font color = '#F9B600'>combat skill</font> or item.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Mana Infusion</font> does not chain.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are low on MP.

String.name: Arcane Barrage I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Primary Barrage)</font> - Fire an energy pulse that damages all enemies in a line up to $maxDistance.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Secondary Explosion)</font> - Press the skill button again to detonate the pulse, damaging and knocking down enemies in a wide radius with a high chance to crit. If used within 40m of a summoned HB construct, the HB fires five Electric Bombs at the detonation point.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 20 Willpower on successful hit, and 200 Willpower from the secondary detonation.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an area or enemy within the max distance of the skill. Skill can be used while moving.

String.name: Roundhouse Kick I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRKicks monsters <font color = '#66bbff'>up into the air</font>. Increases your Rage on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Staggers</font> enemy players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRThe skill can be used during <font color = '#F9B600'>any attack skill</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill on a valid target after an attack skill with a long cooldown.

String.name: Spinning Death I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin vertically and make three quick strikes.$BRThe first and second strike can stagger on hit.$BRThe third strike has a high chance of knockdown and must be made within 5 seconds or cooldown will be applied.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or repeatedly press the skill button to strike 3 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRThe third attack generates 2 Runemarks and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#ff0030'>[Leaping Slash]</font> on a successful hit.

String.name: Guardian Shout I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCreates an aura which increases Endurance by 91% and Power by 30% for you and group members within 40m. Lasts $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill button when you or your group members are in danger.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: Quickly leap out of harm's way.$BR -<font color = '#66bbff'>Invincible</font> while moving$BR -You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to dodge in the current movement direction or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.

String.name: Final Judgment I
String.tooltip: Throw your scythes at an enemy to deal a fatal blow. Final Judgment can attack enemies at long range.

String.name: Spinning Death I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin vertically and make three quick strikes.$BRThe first and second strike can stagger on hit.$BRThe third strike has a high chance of knockdown and must be made within 5 seconds or cooldown will be applied.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or repeatedly press the skill button to strike 3 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRThe third attack generates 2 Runemarks and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#ff0030'>[Leaping Slash]</font> on a successful hit.
