String.name: Guardian Shout II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCreates an aura which increases Endurance by 91% and Power by 30% for you and group members within 40m. Lasts $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill button when you or your group members are in danger.

String.name: Final Judgment II
String.tooltip: Throw your scythes at an enemy to deal a fatal blow. Final Judgment can attack enemies at long range.

String.name: Spinning Death II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin vertically and make three quick strikes.$BRThe first and second strike can stagger on hit.$BRThe third strike has a high chance of knockdown and must be made within 5 seconds or cooldown will be applied.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or repeatedly press the skill button to strike 3 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRThe third attack generates 2 Runemarks and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#ff0030'>[Leaping Slash]</font> on a successful hit.

String.name: Spinning Death II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin vertically and make three quick strikes.$BRThe first and second strike can stagger on hit.$BRThe third strike has a high chance of knockdown and must be made within 5 seconds or cooldown will be applied.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or repeatedly press the skill button to strike 3 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRThe third attack generates 2 Runemarks and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#ff0030'>[Leaping Slash]</font> on a successful hit.

String.name: Roundhouse Kick II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRKicks monsters <font color = '#66bbff'>up into the air</font>. Increases your Rage on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Staggers</font> enemy players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRThe skill can be used during <font color = '#F9B600'>any attack skill</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill on a valid target after an attack skill with a long cooldown.

String.name: Spinning Death II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin vertically and make three quick strikes.$BRThe first and second strike can stagger on hit.$BRThe third strike has a high chance of knockdown and must be made within 5 seconds or cooldown will be applied.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or repeatedly press the skill button to strike 3 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRThe third attack generates 2 Runemarks and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#ff0030'>[Leaping Slash]</font> on a successful hit.

String.name: Final Judgment II
String.tooltip: Throw your scythes at an enemy to deal a fatal blow. Final Judgment can attack enemies at long range.

String.name: Final Judgment II
String.tooltip: Throw your scythes at an enemy to deal a fatal blow. Final Judgment can attack enemies at long range.

String.name: Spinning Death II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin vertically and make three quick strikes.$BRThe first and second strike can stagger on hit.$BRThe third strike has a high chance of knockdown and must be made within 5 seconds or cooldown will be applied.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or repeatedly press the skill button to strike 3 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRThe third attack generates 2 Runemarks and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#ff0030'>[Leaping Slash]</font> on a successful hit.

String.name: Feign Death III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeceive monsters by pretending to be dead. This <font color = '#66bbff'>resets all aggro</font> on you. You can feign death for up to $time. <font color = '#66bbff'>Ends</font> when you use a skill or take damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A2FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to clear aggro.

String.name: Decoy Jutsu III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPlace a decoy, then teleport behind an enemy within 15m. You are briefly immune to damage after teleporting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to evade and attack a nearby enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRCooldown doubles when you attack an enemy player.

String.name: Arcane Barrage III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Primary Barrage)</font> - Fire an energy pulse that damages all enemies in a line up to $maxDistance.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Secondary Explosion)</font> - Press the skill button again to detonate the pulse, damaging and knocking down enemies in a wide radius with a high chance to crit. If used within 40m of a summoned HB construct, the HB fires five Electric Bombs at the detonation point.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 20 Willpower on successful hit, and 200 Willpower from the secondary detonation.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an area or enemy within the max distance of the skill. Skill can be used while moving.

String.name: Roundhouse Kick III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRKicks monsters <font color = '#66bbff'>up into the air</font>. If used within 40m of a summoned HB construct, the HB fires five Electric Bombs at the detonation point.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRGain 20 Willpower on successful hit, and 200 Willpower from the secondary detonation.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an area or enemy within the max distance of the skill. Skill can be used while moving.

String.name: Roundhouse Kick VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRKicks monsters <font color = '#66bbff'>up into the air</font>. Increases your Rage on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Staggers</font> enemy players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRThe skill can be used during <font color = '#F9B600'>any attack skill</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill on a valid target after an attack skill with a long cooldown.

String.name: Spinning Death VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin vertically and make three quick strikes.$BRThe first and second strike can stagger on hit.$BRThe third strike has a high chance of knockdown and must be made within 5 seconds or cooldown will be applied.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or repeatedly press the skill button to strike 3 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRThe third attack generates 2 Runemarks and resets the cooldown of <font color = '#ff0030'>[Leaping Slash]</font> on a successful hit.

String.name: Decoy Jutsu VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPlace a decoy, then teleport behind an enemy within 15m. You are briefly immune to damage after teleporting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to evade and attack a nearby enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRCooldown doubles when you attack an enemy player.

String.name: Rapid Fire I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Focus Generation</font>$BRShoot up to 14 arrows at a target up to $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of <font color = '#66bbff'>Focus</font>. $BRDeals <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced damage</font> at max. distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRThe skill can be stacked up to 5 times. Holding the skill button will fire up to 14 arrows.

String.name: Fire Avalanche I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Rise into the air, then dive forward to attack an enemy within 13m and knock it down. You may use this skill up to three consecutive times before a cooldown applies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Raining Fire]</font> Attacking again with Fire Avalanche deals more damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhen your Chi meter is full, press the skill button up to three times to deliver up to three attacks, on up to three different targets. You can change direction between attacks.

String.name: Fiery Rage I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSacrifice HP to increase your Power by 20% and Crit Factor by 10%, but decrease your Endurance by 10% for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your stats.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Metamorphic Smite</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack nearby enemies.

String.name: Piledriver I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeliver a series of uppercuts while leaping into the airthen end with a powerful downward blow.$BRSuccessful hits increase your Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Titansbane I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPlant your runeglaive in the ground to cause a massive release of dream energy. Deals up to 5 waves of AoE damage to nearby enemies, and applies <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arun's Wail]</font> to you and your group. When Ragnarok is in effect, this skill applies <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font> instead. Pressing the skill button a second time within 7 seconds ends either effect, and causes a secondary explosion with a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arun's Wail]</font> $BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 10%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 20% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font>$BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 15%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 30% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill against minions or normal monsters. Best used when you are in a group.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.$BRSecondary explosion - Generates 2 Runemarks on a successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.

String.name: Shield Counter I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>With successful defense</font> using <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font>, gain a chance to shield-thump your foe with a high probabliity to crit. You take half damage while using the skill, and have a high resistance to knockdown and stagger.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button after blocking with <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font>.

String.name: Mana Infusion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou <font color = '#66bbff'>regain 500 MP</font> every second for 10 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you need MP replenishment.

String.name: Overhand Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing downward for a massive blow. Deals crit damage to monsters suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Whirlwind</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Knockdown Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Stunning Backhand</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Startling Kick</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Eviscerate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Fury Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Savage Strike</font>, the last hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>, or the fourth consecutive hit with <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'></font>$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>In Cold Blood</font> is active, skill damage is increased by 30%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using the <font color = '#F9B600'>chained skill</font>, face your opponent and press the skill button.$BRUse to punish a target suspended in air, or as part of a combo.

String.name: Flame Pillar I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummon a column of flame 3m in front of you that burns and <font color = '#66bbff'>staggers</font> nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRHas a higher chance to <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill when surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Whipsaw I
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFling your scythes at enemies within range to inflict multiple hits, recovering some of your own HP.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRThe effect of healing skills on enemy players is reduced by 6% per hit (stacks up to 5 times).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRYou can use Whipsaw to interrupt your own skill actions when used in a chain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Spiral Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Double Shear</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Pendulum Strike</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to recover HP while attacking.

String.name: Assault Stance I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Enhance Skill</font>$BRIncreases Power by 5 and Crit Factor by 30. Increases your skill damage by 30% when attacking monsters, however, your Endurance decreases by 20% while in Assault Stance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRCannot be used at the same time as <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are focused on dealing damage.

String.name: Piledriver I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeliver a series of uppercuts while leaping into the airthen end with a powerful downward blow.$BRSuccessful hits increase your Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPlant your runeglaive in the ground to cause a massive release of dream energy. When Ragnarok is in effect, this skill applies <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font> instead. Pressing the skill button a second time within 7 seconds ends either effect, and causes a secondary explosion with a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arun's Wail]</font> $BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 10%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 20% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font>$BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 15%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 30% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill against minions or normal monsters. Best used when you are in a group.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.$BRSecondary explosion - Generates 2 Runemarks on a successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.

String.name: Overhand Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing downward for a massive blow. Deals crit damage to monsters suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Whirlwind</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Knockdown Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Stunning Backhand</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Startling Kick</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Eviscerate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Fury Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Savage Strike</font>, the last hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>, or the fourth consecutive hit with <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'></font>$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>In Cold Blood</font> is active, skill damage is increased by 30%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using the <font color = '#F9B600'>chained skill</font>, face your opponent and press the skill button.$BRUse to punish a target suspended in air, or as part of a combo.

String.name: Whipsaw I
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFling your scythes at enemies within range to inflict multiple hits, recovering some of your own HP.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRThe effect of healing skills on enemy players is reduced by 6% per hit (stacks up to 5 times).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRYou can use Whipsaw to interrupt your own skill actions when used in a chain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Spiral Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Double Shear</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Pendulum Strike</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to recover HP while attacking.

String.name: Titansbane I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPlant your runeglaive in the ground to cause a massive release of dream energy. Deals up to 5 waves of AoE damage to nearby enemies, and applies <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arun's Wail]</font> to you and your group. When Ragnarok is in effect, this skill applies <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font> instead. Pressing the skill button a second time within 7 seconds ends either effect, and causes a secondary explosion with a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arun's Wail]</font> $BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 10%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 20% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font>$BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 15%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 30% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill against minions or normal monsters. Best used when you are in a group.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.$BRSecondary explosion - Generates 2 Runemarks on a successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.

String.name: Rapid Fire II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> <font color = '#f9b600'>Focus Generation</font>$BRShoot up to 14 arrows at a target up to $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of <font color = '#66bbff'>Focus</font>. $BRDeals <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced damage</font> at max. distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRThe skill can be stacked up to 5 times. Holding the skill button will fire up to 14 arrows.

String.name: Fire Avalanche II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Rise into the air, then dive forward to attack an enemy within 13m and knock it down. You may use this skill up to three consecutive times before a skill cooldown applies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Raining Fire]</font> Attacking again with Fire Avalanche deals more damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhen your Chi meter is full, press the skill button up to three times to deliver up to three attacks, on up to three different targets. You can change direction between attacks.

String.name: Fiery Rage II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSacrifice HP to increase your Power by 20% and Crit Factor by 10%, but decrease your Endurance by 10% for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your stats.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Metamorphic Smite</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack nearby enemies.

String.name: Piledriver II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeliver a series of uppercuts while leaping into the airthen end with a powerful downward blow.$BRSuccessful hits increase your Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Shield Counter II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>With successful defense</font> using <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font>, gain a chance to shield-thump your foe with a high probabliity to crit. You take half damage while using the skill, and have a high resistance to knockdown and stagger.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button after blocking with <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font>.

String.name: Overhand Strike II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing downward for a massive blow. Deals crit damage to monsters suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Whirlwind</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Knockdown Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Stunning Backhand</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Startling Kick</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Eviscerate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Fury Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Savage Strike</font>, the last hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>, or the fourth consecutive hit with <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'></font>$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>In Cold Blood</font> is active, skill damage is increased by 30%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using the <font color = '#F9B600'>chained skill</font>, face your opponent and press the skill button.$BRUse to punish a target suspended in air, or as part of a combo.

String.name: Flame Pillar II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummon a column of flame 3m in front of you that burns and <font color = '#66bbff'>staggers</font> nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRHas a higher chance to <font color = '#66bbff'>stagger</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill when surrounded by enemies.

<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFling your scythes at enemies within range to inflict multiple hits, recovering some of your own HP.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRThe effect of healing skills on enemy players is reduced by 6% per hit (stacks up to 5 times).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRYou can use Whipsaw to interrupt your own skill actions when used in a chain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Spiral Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Double Shear</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Pendulum Strike</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to recover HP while attacking.

String.name: Assault Stance II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Enhance Skill</font>$BRIncreases Power by 10 and Crit Factor by 40. Increases your skill damage by 30% when attacking monsters, however, your Endurance decreases by 20% while in Assault Stance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRCannot be used at the same time as <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are focused on dealing damage.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Metamorphic Smite</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack nearby enemies.

String.name: Piledriver IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeliver a series of uppercuts while leaping into the airthen end with a powerful downward blow.$BRSuccessful hits increase your Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Overhand Strike IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing downward for a massive blow. Deals crit damage to monsters suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Whirlwind</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Knockdown Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Stunning Backhand</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Startling Kick</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Eviscerate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Fury Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Savage Strike</font>, the last hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>, or the fourth consecutive hit with <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'></font>$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>In Cold Blood</font> is active, skill damage is increased by 30%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using the <font color = '#F9B600'>chained skill</font>, face your opponent and press the skill button.$BRUse to punish a target suspended in air, or as part of a combo.

String.name: Rapid Fire V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Focus Generation</font>$BRShoot up to 14 arrows at a target up to $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of <font color = '#66bbff'>Focus</font>. $BRDeals <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced damage</font> at max. distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRThe skill can be stacked up to 5 times. Holding the skill button will fire up to 14 arrows.

String.name: Fiery Rage V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSacrifice HP to increase your Power by 20% and Crit Factor by 10%, but decrease your Endurance by 10% for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your stats.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Metamorphic Smite</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack nearby enemies.

String.name: Piledriver V

String.name: Shield Counter V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>With successful defense</font> using <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font>, gain a chance to shield-thump your foe with a high probabliity to crit. You take half damage while using the skill, and have a high resistance to knockdown and stagger.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button after blocking with <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font>.

String.name: Overhand Strike V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing downward for a massive blow. String.name: Fiery Rage VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Rage Skill$BRSacrifice 10% of your Maximum HP to increase your Power by 20%, Crit Factor by 10%, and Maximum HP by 10% but decrease your Endurance by 10% for $BR$time.$BRTriggers <font color = '#F66bbff'>Flurry of Blows</font>, which increases Attack Speed and shortend charging times by 40% for 18 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, the following effects apply: draws and maintains aggro from monsters within 10m for 5 sec; reduces skill cooldowns by 10 sec.$BR<font color = '#F66bbff'>Flurry of Blows</font> will not activate again for 20 sec once the effect ends.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your stats.$BRUse with <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> to draw aggro from nearby monsters and protect allies.

Deals crit damage to monsters suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Whirlwind</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Knockdown Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Stunning Backhand</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Startling Kick</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Eviscerate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Fury Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Savage Strike</font>, the last hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Distant Blade</font>, or the fourth consecutive hit with <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'></font>$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>In Cold Blood</font> is active, skill damage is increased by 30%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAfter using the <font color = '#F9B600'>chained skill</font>, face your opponent and press the skill button.$BRUse to punish a target suspended in air, or as part of a combo.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Metamorphic Smite</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack nearby enemies.

String.name: Piledriver IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeliver a series of uppercuts while leaping into the airthen end with a powerful downward blow.$BRSuccessful hits increase your Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Shield Counter IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>With successful defense</font> using <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font>, gain a chance to shield-thump your foe with a high probabliity to crit. You take half damage while using the skill, and have a high resistance to knockdown and stagger.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button after blocking with <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font>.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing downward for a massive blow. String.name: Titansbane I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPlant your runeglaive in the ground to cause a massive release of dream energy. Deals up to 5 waves of AoE damage to nearby enemies, and applies <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arun's Wail]</font> to you and your group. When Ragnarok is in effect, this skill applies <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font> instead. Pressing the skill button a second time within 7 seconds ends either effect, and causes a secondary explosion with a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arun's Wail]</font> $BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 10%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 20% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font>$BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 15%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 30% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill against minions or normal monsters. Best used when you are in a group.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.$BRSecondary explosion - Generates 2 Runemarks on a successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.

String.name: Titansbane I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPlant your runeglaive in the ground to cause a massive release of dream energy. Deals up to 5 waves of AoE damage to nearby enemies, and applies <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arun's Wail]</font> to you and your group. When Ragnarok is in effect, this skill applies <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font> instead. Pressing the skill button a second time within 7 seconds ends either effect, and causes a secondary explosion with a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arun's Wail]</font> $BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 10%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 20% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font>$BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 15%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 30% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill against minions or normal monsters. Best used when you are in a group.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.$BRSecondary explosion - Generates 2 Runemarks on a successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.

When Ragnarok is in effect, this skill applies <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font> instead. Pressing the skill button a second time within 7 seconds ends either effect, and causes a secondary explosion with a high chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Arun's Wail]</font> $BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 10%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 20% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Shara's Scream]</font>$BR - Increases skill damage of other group members by 15%.$BR - Increases the damage of the secondary explosion by 10% per stack, and its chance to crit by 30% per stack. Stacks up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill against minions or normal monsters. Best used when you are in a group.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on every successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.$BRSecondary explosion - Generates 2 Runemarks on a successful hit when Ragnarok is in effect.

String.name: Slow Trap I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSet a trap that briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>slows</font> the victim. The trap lasts for 15 seconds or until triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse traps to inconvenience enemies and gain time for complex attacks.

String.name: Smoke Bomb
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Create a smoke cloud to evade enemy attacks. The cloud lasts for 3 seconds, and also affects allies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to evade enemies clustered around you for a short time.

String.name: Arun's Cleansing Touch
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> $BRLock on up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>purge all harmful effects</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move the reticule over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to affect all targets.

String.name: Mana Missiles I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> <font color = '#F9B600'>Charge Skill</font>$BRLaunch a weaving pair of missiles up to $maxDistance. Each missile that strikes an enemy explodes, with a high chance of knockdown. Charging the skill creates a third missile.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BREach missile generates 34 Willpower on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to charge.

String.name: Jackhammer I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRHammer the enemy with a flurry of rapid jabs, increasing your Rage and decreasing enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> by $H_S_BAD12%$COLOR_END.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Ground Bash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSlam your runeglaive on the ground for massive damage.$BRHas a high chance to knockdown when attacking another player.$BRMust be used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to follow up a Leaping Slash</font> attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>Generates 10 additional Ragnarok points on a successful hit.

String.name: Leash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a magical hook and chain that pulls one enemy within 18m toward you and stuns them for 3 seconds.$BRDoes not work on huge opponents.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAim at a distant target and press the skill button.

String.name: Leaping Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump at your foe and smash downward.$BRKnocked-down foes take 5x damage once you learn <font color = '#F9B600'>Merciless Leap</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to punish a knocked-down foe.

String.name: Smite
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump into the air and strike enemies in the head with your scythes, stunning them for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate a target.

String.name: Defensive Stance I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Enhance Skill$BRIncreases Endurance by 20% and Balance Factor by 20. Increases the chance to crit by 15% when attacking monsters.$BR Attacks draw 130% more aggro, and you are immune to push-back from monsters, except for certain special attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRYou can only use <font color = '#F9B600'>one stance</font> at a time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when tanking.

String.name: Defensive Stance II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Toggle Skill</font>$BRIncreases Endurance and Physical Resistance by 25%, Balance Factor by 30 and increases the chance to crit by 15% when attacking monsters.$BRAttack skills draw 153% more aggro. You are immune to push-back from monsters, except for certain special attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRCannot be used at the same time as <font color = '#F9B600'>Assault Stance</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when tanking.

String.name: Jackhammer II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRHammer the enemy with a flurry of rapid jabs, increasing your Rage and decreasing enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> by $H_S_BAD12%$COLOR_END.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Jackhammer II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRHammer the enemy with a flurry of rapid jabs, increasing your Rage and decreasing enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> by $H_S_BAD12%$COLOR_END.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Jackhammer II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRHammer the enemy with a flurry of rapid jabs, increasing your Rage and decreasing enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> by $H_S_BAD12%$COLOR_END.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Ground Bash II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSlam your runeglaive on the ground for massive damage.$BRHas a high chance to knockdown when attacking another player.$BRMust be used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to follow up a Leaping Slash</font> attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>Generates 10 additional Ragnarok points on a successful hit.

String.name: Ground Bash II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSlam your runeglaive on the ground for massive damage.$BRHas a high chance to knockdown when attacking another player.$BRMust be used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to follow up a Leaping Slash</font> attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>Generates 10 additional Ragnarok points on a successful hit.

String.name: Slow Trap III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSet a trap that briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>slows</font> the victim. The trap lasts for 15 seconds or until triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A2FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse traps to inconvenience enemies and gain time for complex attacks.

String.name: Mana Missiles III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> <font color = '#F9B600'>Charge Skill</font>$BRLaunch a weaving pair of missiles up to $maxDistance. Each missile that strikes an enemy explodes, with a high chance of knockdown. Charging the skill creates a third missile.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BREach missile generates 34 Willpower on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to charge.

String.name: Jackhammer III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRHammer the enemy with a flurry of rapid jabs, increasing your Rage and decreasing enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> by $H_S_BAD12%$COLOR_END.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Ground Bash III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSlam your runeglaive on the ground for massive damage.$BRHas a high chance to knockdown when attacking another player.$BRMust be used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to follow up a Leaping Slash</font> attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>Generates 10 additional Ragnarok points on a successful hit.

String.name: Leash III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a magical hook and chain that pulls one enemy within 18m toward you and stuns them for 3 seconds.$BRDoes not work on huge opponents.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAim at a distant target and press the skill button.

String.name: Leaping Strike III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump at your foe and smash downward.$BRKnocked-down foes take 5x damage once you learn <font color = '#F9B600'>Merciless Leap</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to punish a knocked-down foe.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump at your foe and smash downward.$BRKnocked-down foes take 5x damage once you learn <font color = '#F9B600'>Merciless Leap</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to punish a knocked-down foe.

String.name: Jackhammer VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRHammer the enemy with a flurry of rapid jabs, increasing your Rage and decreasing enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> by $H_S_BAD12%$COLOR_END.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Slow Trap IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSet a trap that briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>slows</font> the victim. The trap lasts for 15 seconds or until triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A8FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse traps to inconvenience enemies and gain time for complex attacks.

String.name: Mana Missiles IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> <font color = '#F9B600'>Charge Skill</font>$BRLaunch a weaving pair of missiles up to $maxDistance. Each missile that strikes an enemy explodes, with a high chance of knockdown. Charging the skill creates a third missile.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BREach missile generates 34 Willpower on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress and hold the skill button to charge.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSlam your runeglaive on the ground for massive damage.$BRHas a high chance to knockdown when attacking another player.$BRMust be used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to follow up a Leaping Slash</font> attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>Generates 10 additional Ragnarok points on a successful hit.

String.name: Ground Bash XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSlam your runeglaive on the ground for massive damage.$BRHas a high chance to knockdown when attacking another player.$BRMust be used within 4 seconds of Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to follow up a Leaping Slash</font> attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark on a successful hit.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>Generates 10 additional Ragnarok points on a successful hit.

String.name: Stunning Trap I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSet a trap that briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stuns</font> the victim. The trap lasts for 20 seconds or until triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse traps to inconvenience enemies and gain time for complex attacks.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Cyclone I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRSwing your axe to strike targets around you.$BRThe longer you charge, the more you increase skill damage and spin energy.$BRCan charge to one level.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold down the skill button, then release while facing a target in range. Effective on multiple targets.

String.name: Resurrect
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Resurrect</font> one ally nearest to you within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRApproach the dead player and use the skill.

String.name: Arc Bomb I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLob a bomb up to $maxDistance, which can bounce up to three times before exploding. On striking an enemy, the bomb explodes, <font color = '#66bbff'>stunning</font> nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRBomb generates 20 Willpower on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an enemy, mindful of the bomb's trajectory.

String.name: Counterpunch I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>After a successful block</font>, throw a counterpunch that <font color = '#66bbff'>knocks the enemy into the air.</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font> and generates additional Rage on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to deal one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCan only be used <font color = '#66bbff'>on successful block</font>. Use the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Dream Slash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a blazing crescent of dream energy up to 30m, damaging all enemies in its path. Deals crit damage to knocked down enemies or enemies suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this kill to deal damage at a distance, or take down several opponents in a straight line.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRA successful hit on a target with at least one Runemark resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font> and generates 2 Runemarks.

String.name: Debilitate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBriefly weaken the Endurance of your foes by 12%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRAlso decreases your foe's HP recovery by 30% at any number of stacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font> activate faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Purifying Circle
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRInstantly <font color = '#66bbff'>removes all harmful effects</font> from up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to remove debuffs from allies.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Mana Barrier I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCast a magical shield that <font color = '#66bbff'>absorbs</font> up to $value damage for $time. Costs 1 MP per 14 damage the shield absorbs. <font color = '#66bbff'>Ends</font> when the shield reaches maximum damage or you run out of MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to protect yourself.

String.name: Pendulum Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing your scythes upward in an arc to damage enemies in front of you as you jump backward. Monsters hit by Pendulum Strike are immobilized for 3 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRYou can use Pendulum Strike in a chain to interrupt your own skill actions.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate monsters and set up your next attack.

String.name: Death From Above I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRBecome <font color = '#66bbff'>invincible</font> while executing a leaping attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse as a high-damage attack, or to cancel another skill's animation.

String.name: Dream Slash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a blazing crescent of dream energy up to 30m, damaging all enemies in its path. String.name: Retaliate IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Cyclone IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRSwing your axe to strike targets around you.$BRThe longer you charge, the more you increase skill damage and spin energy.$BRCan charge to three levels. Charging above level 3 continuously consumes HP, but gradually increases skill damage. When charged to level 3 or higher, pulls nearby targets toward you. Using the skill against other players does not pull them towards you, but every 3 hits will cause them to stagger.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold down the skill button then release while facing a target in range. Effective on multiple targets.

String.name: Arc Bomb IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLob a bomb up to $maxDistance, which can bounce up to three times before exploding. On striking an enemy, the bomb explodes, <font color = '#66bbff'>stunning</font> nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRBomb generates 20 Willpower on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an enemy, mindful of the bomb's trajectory.

String.name: Counterpunch IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>After a successful block</font>, throw a counterpunch that <font color = '#66bbff'>knocks the enemy into the air.</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font> and generates additional Rage on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to deal one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCan only be used <font color = '#66bbff'>on successful block</font>. Use the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Dream Slash IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a blazing crescent of dream energy up to 30m, damaging all enemies in its path. Deals crit damage to knocked down enemies or enemies suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this kill to deal damage at a distance, or take down several opponents in a straight line.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRA successful hit on a target with at least one Runemark resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font> and generates 2 Runemarks.

String.name: Retaliate IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Death From Above IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRBecome <font color = '#66bbff'>invincible</font> while executing a leaping attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse as a high-damage attack, or to cancel another skill's animation.

String.name: Stunning Trap V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSet a trap that briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stuns</font> the victim. The trap lasts for 20 seconds or until triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A4FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse traps to inconvenience enemies and gain time for complex attacks.

You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Cyclone IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRSwing your axe to strike targets around you. $BRThe longer you charge, the more you increase skill damage and spin energy.$BRCan charge to three levels. Charging above level 3 continuously consumes HP, but gradually increases skill damage. When charged to level 3 or higher, pulls nearby targets toward you. Using the skill against other players does not pull them towards you, but every 3 hits will cause them to stagger.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold down the skill button then release while facing a target in range. Effective on multiple targets.

String.name: Arc Bomb IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLob a bomb up to $maxDistance, which can bounce up to three times before exploding. On striking an enemy, the bomb explodes, <font color = '#66bbff'>stunning</font> nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRBomb generates 20 Willpower on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an enemy, mindful of the bomb's trajectory.

String.name: Counterpunch IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>After a successful block</font>, throw a counterpunch that <font color = '#66bbff'>knocks the enemy into the air.</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font> and generates additional Rage on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to deal one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCan only be used <font color = '#66bbff'>on successful block</font>. Use the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Dream Slash IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a blazing crescent of dream energy up to 30m, damaging all enemies in its path. Deals crit damage to knocked down enemies or enemies suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this kill to deal damage at a distance, or take down several opponents in a straight line.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRA successful hit on a target with at least one Runemark resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font> and generates 2 Runemarks.

Deals crit damage to knocked down enemies or enemies suspended in air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this kill to deal damage at a distance, or take down several opponents in a straight line.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRA successful hit on a target with at least one Runemark resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font> and generates 2 Runemarks.

String.name: Poison Trap I
String.tooltip:
Set a trap that damages the victim by $value each $tickInterval for $time. The trap lasts for 20 seconds or until triggered.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDoes less damage to other players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse traps to inconvenience enemies and gain time for complex attacks.

String.name: Focus
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRInfuse Focus into your weapon to increase your skill damage by 5%$calcValue(multiple,1002,0.0000003,2).$BRSkill damage is increased based on your magic amplification.$BR$BRFocus drains 20 MP every second while the skill is active. Intense Focus is gradually stacked by Focus. Intense Focus get stronger every 5 sec. and the skill damage increases by 2% per stack.$BRCan be stacked up to 5 times. You lose Focus if you are knocked down by an enemy.

String.name: Leaping Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump at your foe and smash downward.$BRKnocked-down foes take greater damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Summon: Group
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Teleport</font> all group members within the same <font color = '#66bbff'>province</font> to your side.$BRTarget members must accept <font color = '#66bbff'>summon</font> within 10 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when group members are in the same <font color = '#66bbff'>province</font>.

String.name: Rocket Jump I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin and fire at the ground, damaging nearby enemies and propelling yourself in whatever direction you are facing. Use during <font color = '#F9B600'>Rolling Reload</font> for additional distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage nearby enemies and move around the battlefield.

String.name: Shining Crescent I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDisrupt Runemarks on a target to create an explosion of dream energy, dealing damage based on the number of Runemarks it bears and with 3 times the normal chance to crit. The target is suspended in air (or possibly staggered, if a boss or enemy player). If the target has 7 Runemarks, press the skill button again to trigger a secondary explosion.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to take out clusters of opponents. Best used when one of the targets has 7 Runemarks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 2 Runemarks on a successful secondary explosion.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>$BRGenerates 60 additional Ragnarok points on a successful secondary explosion.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRA successful hit grants Aura of Retribution, increasing <font color = '#66bbff'>Crit Rate</font> of all <font color = '#f9b600'>attack skills</font> by 1.5 times for 2 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage lots of nearby enemies.

String.name: Lightning Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCalls down a 15m line of lightning bolts in front of you, damaging any opponents in its path.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD3%$COLOR_END of your Maximum MP$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while enemies are in front of you.

String.name: Shadow Lash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCreate a whip of shadows and fling it at targets in front of you. Shadow Lash can be chained together up to 4 times and replenishes MP on every hit. A cooldown time begins after the chain ends.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to replenish MP while attacking.

String.name: Poison Blade I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Poison</font> on your swords wounds your foe for $value HP every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals less damage to other players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse mutiple times on the same target to maintain the poison effect.

String.name: Super Rocket Jump I
String.tooltip: Use forward momentum for a longer jump.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRA successful hit grants Aura of Retribution, increasing <font color = '#66bbff'>Crit Rate</font> of all <font color = '#f9b600'>attack skills</font> by 1.5 times for 2 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage lots of nearby enemies.

String.name: Lightning Strike III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCalls down a 15m line of lightning bolts in front of you, damaging any opponents in its path.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD3%$COLOR_END of your Maximum MP$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while enemies are in front of you.

String.name: Poison Blade III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Poison</font> on your swords wounds your foe for $value HP every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals less damage to other players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse mutiple times on the same target to maintain the poison effect.

String.name: Shining Crescent III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDisrupt Runemarks on a target to create an explosion of dream energy, dealing damage based on the number of Runemarks it bears and with 3 times the normal chance to crit. The target is suspended in air (or possibly staggered, if a boss or enemy player). If the target has 7 Runemarks, press the skill button again to trigger a secondary explosion.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to take out clusters of opponents. Best used when one of the targets has 7 Runemarks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 2 Runemarks on a successful secondary explosion.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>$BRGenerates 60 additional Ragnarok points on a successful secondary explosion.

String.name: Shining Crescent III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDisrupt Runemarks on a target to create an explosion of dream energy, dealing damage based on the number of Runemarks it bears and with 3 times the normal chance to crit. String.name: Poison Trap IV
String.tooltip:
Set a trap that damages the victim by $value each $tickInterval for $time. The trap lasts for 20 seconds or until triggered.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDoes less damage to other players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse traps to inconvenience enemies and gain time for complex attacks.

String.name: Leaping Strike IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump at your foe and smash downward.$BRKnocked-down foes take greater damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Rocket Jump IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin and fire at the ground, damaging nearby enemies and propelling yourself in whatever direction you are facing. Use during <font color = '#F9B600'>Rolling Reload</font> for additional distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage nearby enemies and move around the battlefield.

You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProject a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRA successful hit grants Aura of Retribution, increasing <font color = '#66bbff'>Crit Rate</font> of all <font color = '#f9b600'>attack skills</font> by 1.5 times for 2 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage lots of nearby enemies.

String.name: Lightning Strike X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCalls down a 15m line of lightning bolts in front of you, damaging any opponents in its path.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD3%$COLOR_END of your Maximum MP$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while enemies are in front of you.

String.name: Poison Blade X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Poison</font> on your swords wounds your foe for $value HP every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals less damage to other players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse mutiple times on the same target to maintain the poison effect.

String.name: Lightning Strike X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCalls down a 15m line of lightning bolts in front of you, damaging any opponents in its path.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD3%$COLOR_END of your Maximum MP$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while enemies are in front of you.

String.name: Poison Blade XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font> <font color = '#F9B600'>Edge Skill</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Poison</font> on your swords wounds your foe for $value$calcValue(multiple,1001,1.5,0) HP every $tickInterval for $time.$BR[PvP] Damages 954$calcValue(multiple,1001,0.01,0) to other players.$BRPoison damage is increased by $H_S_GOOD150%$COLOR_END of your Physical Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse multiple times on the same target to maintain the poison effect.

String.name: Shining Crescent I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDisrupt Runemarks on a target to create an explosion of dream energy, dealing damage based on the number of Runemarks it bears and with 3 times the normal chance to crit. The target is suspended in air (or possibly staggered, if a boss or enemy player). If the target has 7 Runemarks, press the skill button again to trigger a secondary explosion.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to take out clusters of opponents. Best used when one of the targets has 7 Runemarks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 2 Runemarks on a successful secondary explosion.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ragnarok]</font>$BRGenerates 60 additional Ragnarok points on a successful secondary explosion.

String.name: Summon: Black Pearl
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMovement Speed 275.$COLOR_END$BRSummon Black Pearl, the pirate mount.

String.name: Summon: Lupus Animus
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODSpeed: 280; Effects: MP, HP$COLOR_END$BRSummon a Lupus Animus which restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second.

String.name: Summon: Almighty Etherwing
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODSpeed: 280; Effects: MP, HP$COLOR_END$BRSummon an Almighty Etherwing which restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second.

String.name: Summon: Almighty Spectral Tail
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODSpeed: 280; Effects: MP, HP$COLOR_END$BRSummon an Almighty Spectral Tail which restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second.

String.name: Summon: Blackstar
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMovement Speed 280; Flight Speed 270.$COLOR_END$BR$BRSummon Blackstar, a flying mount.

String.name: Summon: Tulpar
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMovement Speed 270; Flight Speed 270.$COLOR_END$BR$BRSummon Tulpar, a flying mount.

String.name: Summon: Black Pegasus
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMovement Speed 280; Flight.$COLOR_END$BR$BRFlight Speed 270$BRFlight Duration 500$BR$BRSummon Black Pegasus, a winged mount.

String.name: Summon: White Pegasus
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMovement Speed 280; Flight.$COLOR_END$BR$BRFlight Speed 270$BRFlight Duration 500$BR$BRSummon White Pegasus, a winged mount.

String.name: Summon: Training Bay Gelding
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMovement Speed 240.$COLOR_END$BRSummon a brown horse mount with a Movement Speed of 240.$BR$BRThis skill will be replaced by the <font color = '#66bbff'>Summon: Bay Gelding</font> skill.

String.name: Velik's Mark I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMark a target within $maxDistance for $time. You deal 10% <font color = '#66bbff'>more</font> damage to the marked target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRMaximizes damage on high priority targets.

String.name: Skyfall I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Jump into the air and attack nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to attack enemies in close proximity.

String.name: Unchained Anger I
String.tooltip: Sacrifice HP to gain $mpDiff MP.

String.name: Vow of Rebirth
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRForm a pact between you and a group member, who will <font color = '#66bbff'>resurrect</font> if <font color = '#66bbff'>killed</font> in the next $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on a group member within 18m, then press the skill button again or left-click to form a pact with the target.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Ragnarok I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRActivate when the Ragnarok meter is full to reset all skills with cooldowns of 60 sec or less (except for Evasion, Retaliate, Bloodflower, and Overhead Slash), and gain the following effects:$BR$BR - Increases Power by 50$calcValue(multiple,1002,0.0001,0)$BR - Increases Attack Speed by 20$BR - Increases attack range by 20%$BR - Decreases skill cooldowns by 60% when casting skills with cooldowns of 60 sec or less.$BRPower is increased based on your Magic Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRBuild up your Ragnarok meter by damaging enemies, then use this skill to deal more damage, faster, with shorter skill cooldowns.

String.name: Infuriate
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BREnrages all monsters within $maxDistance and increases your aggro.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRProtect party members by taunting monsters to attack you.

String.name: Resurrect
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Resurrect</font> one ally nearest to you within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRApproach a <font color = '#66bbff'>dead</font> player and use the skill.

String.name: Heart Thrust I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDrive your greatsword into a target's vulnerable spots.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage a single target and start combos.

String.name: Void Pulse I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch a powerful sphere at an enemy within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an enemy for destruction!

String.name: Shadow Burst I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRGather shadows into your scythes and strike the ground, damaging nearby targets. Press the skill button again to inflict additional damage with a high chance of pulling enemies toward you and to the ground. You are immune to knockdown and stagger while using Shadow Burst.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to pull enemies.

String.name: Leaping Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump at your foe and smash downward.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Passive]</font>$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Merciless Leap</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>Knocked-down</font> foes take 5x damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when your opponent is knocked-down.

String.name: Shadow Burst I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRGather shadows into your scythes and strike the ground, damaging nearby targets. Press the skill button again to inflict additional damage with a high chance of pulling enemies toward you and to the ground. You are immune to knockdown and stagger while using Shadow Burst.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to pull enemies.

String.name: Electric Bomb I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> - <font color = '#F9B600'>HB Construct Skill</font>$BRLob a bomb up to $maxDistance, which explodes on impact and creates a target for your HB construct. The HB throws five more bombs of equal strength at the same spot. Gain 10 Willpower for each successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BROnly usable with a summoned HB construct within 40m.
