You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Heart Thrust IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDrive your greatsword into a target's vulnerable spots.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage a single target and start combos.

String.name: Void Pulse IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Flame Attack$BRConsume $H_S_GOOD6%$COLOR_END of your Maximum MP to launch a powerful sphere at an enemy within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an enemy for destruction!

String.name: Skyfall X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Jump into the air and attack nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to attack enemies in close proximity.

String.name: Retaliate X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Heart Thrust X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDrive your greatsword into a target's vulnerable spots.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage a single target and start combos.

String.name: Skyfall XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Jump into the air and attack nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to attack enemies in close proximity.

String.name: Heart Thrust XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRHeave your greatsword to attack your target's vulnerable spots. $BR$BRIncreases ability to ignore Physical Resistance by $calcValue(multiple,1001,0.05,3) for a short time.$BRThis effect is increased by $H_S_GOOD5%$COLOR_END of your Physical Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage a single target and start combos.

String.name: Heart Thrust XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRHeave your greatsword to attack your target's vulnerable spots. $BR$BRIncreases ability to ignore Physical Resistance by $calcValue(multiple,1001,0.05,3) for a short time.$BRThis effect is increased by $H_S_GOOD5%$COLOR_END of your Physical Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage a single target and start combos.

String.name: Heart Thrust XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRHeave your greatsword to attack your target's vulnerable spots. $BR$BRIncreases ability to ignore Physical Resistance by $calcValue(multiple,1001,0.05,3) for a short time.$BRThis effect is increased by $H_S_GOOD5%$COLOR_END of your Physical Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage a single target and start combos.

String.name: Heart Thrust XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRHeave your greatsword to attack your target's vulnerable spots. $BR$BRIncreases ability to ignore Physical Resistance by $calcValue(multiple,1001,0.05,3) for a short time.$BRThis effect is increased by $H_S_GOOD5%$COLOR_END of your Physical Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage a single target and start combos.

String.name: Circle of Steel I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Spin your shuriken to attack nearby enemies and suspend them in the air, with the last hit dealing substantially more damage with a chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to set up <font color = '#f9b600'>One Thousand Cuts</font>.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Aura of the Merciless I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Toggle Skill$BRGrants Titanic Wrath I to you and your allies within 30m, increasing <font color = '#66bbff'>Power</font> by 20 and <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed</font> by 6.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Costs 30 MP</font> every 2 seconds to maintain.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRCannot be used with <font color = '#F9B600'>Aura of the Swift</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Boosts</font> nearby allies when skill is activated.

String.name: Balder's Vengeance I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Willpower Skill$BRDeal damage to all enemies in front of you, up to $maxDistance, with a very high chance to crit. You are <font color = '#66bbff'>immune</font> to damage, but not stuns, while using this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRLine up enemies and press the skill button when your Willpower is full.

String.name: Provoke I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDraw the attention of enemies, increasing and maintaining maximum <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font> toward you for 5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCan be used while moving. Use to taunt nearby enemies that are attacking other party members.

String.name: Bloodflower I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStab a target repeatedly, applying <font color = '#00A0FF'>Bleed</font>. Targets with 6 stacks of <font color = '#00A0FF'>Bleed</font> are stunned for 3 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill for a good chance to stun an opponent.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRA successful final hit is guaranteed to generate 1 Runemark.

String.name: Spring Attack I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRReach out with your lance to strike the target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Bash</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Lockdown Blow</font>, or the third consecutive hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when facing a nearby target.

String.name: Stunning Backhand I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing your sword around, dealing damage and briefly stunning your foe.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to disable an opponent.

String.name: Mindblast I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBriefly put targets to <font color = '#66bbff'>sleep</font> in a $maxRadius radius centered $offsetDistance in front of you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to incapacitate enemies a short distance away.

String.name: Soul Reversal
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a shadowy cable at a single target within 20m. A successful hit entangles the target, and deals damage over time. Press the skill button again to switch places with the target (if within 40m) and stun them. If the entangled target is a boss or elite monster, you teleport behind the target instead of switching places.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to manuever an enemy into a position of weakness.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Bloodflower IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStab a target repeatedly, applying <font color = '#00A0FF'>Bleed</font>. Targets with 6 stacks of <font color = '#00A0FF'>Bleed</font> are stunned for 3 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill for a good chance to stun an opponent.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRA successful final hit is guaranteed to generate 1 Runemark.

String.name: Spring Attack IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRReach out with your lance to strike the target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Bash</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Lockdown Blow</font>, or the third consecutive hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when facing a nearby target.

String.name: Bloodflower IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStab a target repeatedly, applying <font color = '#00A0FF'>Bleed</font>. String.name: Circle of Steel V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Spin your shuriken to attack nearby enemies and suspend them in the air, with the last hit dealing substantially more damage with a chance of knockdown.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to set up <font color = '#f9b600'>One Thousand Cuts</font>.

String.name: Provoke V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDraw the attention of enemies, increasing and maintaining maximum <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font> toward you for 5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCan be used while moving. String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRReach out with your lance to strike the target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Bash</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Lockdown Blow</font>, or the third consecutive hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when facing a nearby target.

String.name: Retaliate X

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Double Cut I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Attack nearby enemies with a crosscut slice.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to lead of a series of chained skills.

String.name: Aura of the Swift I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Toggle Skill$BRGrants Aura of the Swift I to you and your allies within 30m, increasing <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by 10%.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Costs 30 MP</font> every 2 seconds to maintain.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRCannot be used with <font color = '#F9B600'>Aura of the Merciless</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Boosts</font> nearby allies when skill is activated.

String.name: Infuriate
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRChallenge enemies within $maxDistance for 5 seconds, drawing high <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to draw attention of nearby enemies when allies are in peril.

String.name: Evasion I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRVault forward to evade enemy attacks.$BRYou can evade twice within 4 seconds. Skill cooldown begins after the second dodge.$BRCorrect timing grants <font color = '#00A0FF'>Perfect Evasion</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Evasion]</font>$BRYour next attack with any skill but Slash has a guaranteed chance to crit.$BR - Invincible while moving$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRDash away to avoid enemy attack.

String.name: Summon: Group
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Teleport</font> all group members within the same <font color = '#66bbff'>province</font> to your side.$BRMembers must accept <font color = '#66bbff'>summons</font> within 10 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when group members are far away, but within the same <font color = '#66bbff'>province</font>.

String.name: Distant Blade I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike a target within $maxDistance with a magic extension of your sword.$BRCan attack up to 3 consecutive times, dealing greater damage with each strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to close the distance with a foe.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike a target within $maxDistance with a magic extension of your sword.$BRCan attack up to 3 consecutive times, dealing greater damage with each strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to close the distance with a foe.

String.name: Retaliate IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Retaliate X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Double Cut XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Attack nearby enemies with a crosscut slice.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to lead of a series of chained skills.

String.name: Incendiary Trap I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSet a trap that lasts for 12 seconds.$BRThe trap explodes and deals damage to nearby enemies when triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse traps to inconvenience enemies and gain time for complex attacks.

String.name: Burning Heart I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Tap your inner strength to produce a penetrating volley of fireballs. Fireballs stagger and deal double damage to normal monsters and minions, and automatically crit targets suspended in the air. Holding down the skill button launches fireballs as long as you have Chi (up to a maximum of ten fireballs), but <font color = '#f9b600'>Burning Heart</font>'s cooldown increases by 2 seconds for each fireball.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhen your Chi meter is full, hold down the skill button to deliver a volley of attacks at mid range.

String.name: Vampiric Blow I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRThe lower your HP, the greater the damage.$BRA portion of the damage dealt returns to you as healing. Movement Speed is reduced while charging this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster but with less healing if you first overcharge <font color = '#F9B600'>Thunder Strike</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>Hold down the skill button to charge, then release it toward a target within range.

String.name: Aura of the Unyielding I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Toggle Skill$BRGrants Aura of the Unyielding I to you and your allies within 30m, increasing <font color = '#66bbff'>Crit Resist Factor</font> by 10%.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Costs 30 MP</font> every 2 seconds to maintain.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRCannot be used with <font color = '#F9B600'>Aura of the Tenacious</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Boosts</font> nearby allies when skill is activated.

String.name: Replenishment I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRReplenish 250 MP and 200 Willpower. May eliminate cooldowns for <font color = '#F9B600'>Scattershot</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Arcane Barrage</font> (50% chance for each).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when low on MP or when <font color = '#F9B600'>Scattershot</font> and/or <font color = '#F9B600'>Arcane Barrage</font> are on cooldown.

String.name: High Kick I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Kick</font> a knocked-down enemy <font color = '#66bbff'>up in the air</font>, increasing your Rage. Activates when you knock down an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill on a <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font> target.

String.name: Windslash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive in a tight circle to damage nearby enemies. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button when you are surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Charging Lunge I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge a medium distance and impale your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAim at a mediumly distant target and press the skill button.

String.name: Startling Kick I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBriefly stun your target with a kick, then flip away from the direction of movement.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to open up some distance from a foe.

String.name: Retribution I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPrepare to counter an incoming attack. If you activate Retribution right before an attack lands, you ignore all damage and immediately charge toward the enemy. While preparing, you also ignore all damage and become immune to all effects. Retribution does not work on projectiles while in PvP If Retribution hits, all attacks against monsters are considered to be attacks from behind for 4 seconds. Attack speed does not affect the Retribution skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill just before the enemy attacks.

String.name: Charging Lunge I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge a medium distance and impale your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAim at a mediumly distant target and press the skill button.

String.name: Windslash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive in a tight circle to damage nearby enemies. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button when you are surrounded by enemies.

If you activate Retribution right before an attack lands, you ignore all damage and immediately charge toward the enemy. While preparing, you also ignore all damage and become immune to all effects. Retribution does not work on projectiles while in PvP If Retribution hits, all attacks against monsters are considered to be attacks from behind for 4 seconds. Attack speed does not affect the Retribution skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill just before the enemy attacks.

String.name: Vengeful Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge at and attack your enemy with Retribution. If Vengeful Attack hits, all attacks against monsters are considered to be attacks from behind for 4 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPerform the attack while facing a target.

String.name: Windslash III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive in a tight circle to damage nearby enemies. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button when you are surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Incendiary Trap IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSet a trap that lasts for 12 seconds.$BRThe trap explodes and deals damage to nearby enemies when triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A3FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse traps to inconvenience enemies and gain time for complex attacks.

String.name: Burning Heart IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Tap your inner strength to produce a penetrating volley of fireballs. Fireballs stagger and deal double damage to normal monsters and minions, and automatically crit targets suspended in the air. Holding down the skill button launches fireballs as long as you have Chi (up to a maximum of ten fireballs), but <font color = '#f9b600'>Burning Heart</font>'s cooldown increases by 2 seconds for each fireball.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhen your Chi meter is full, hold down the skill button to deliver a volley of attacks at mid range.

String.name: Vampiric Blow IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRThe lower your HP, the greater the damage.$BRA portion of the damage dealt returns to you as healing. Movement Speed is reduced while charging this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster but with less healing if you first overcharge <font color = '#F9B600'>Thunder Strike</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>Hold down the skill button to charge, then release it toward a target within range.

String.name: Aura of the Unyielding IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Toggle Skill$BRGrants Aura of the Unyielding IV to you and your allies within 30m, increasing <font color = '#66bbff'>Crit Resist Factor</font> by 40%.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Costs 30 MP</font> every 2 seconds to maintain.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRCannot be used with <font color = '#F9B600'>Aura of the Tenacious</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Boosts</font> nearby allies when skill is activated.

String.name: Replenishment IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRReplenish 325 MP and 200 Willpower. May eliminate cooldowns for <font color = '#F9B600'>Scattershot</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Arcane Barrage</font> (50% chance for each).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when low on MP or when <font color = '#F9B600'>Scattershot</font> and/or <font color = '#F9B600'>Arcane Barrage</font> are on cooldown.

String.name: High Kick IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Kick</font> a knocked-down enemy <font color = '#66bbff'>up in the air</font>, increasing your Rage. Activates when you knock down an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill on a <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font> target.

String.name: Windslash IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive in a tight circle to damage nearby enemies. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button when you are surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Charging Lunge IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge a medium distance and impale your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAim at a mediumly distant target and press the skill button.

String.name: Startling Kick IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBriefly stun your target with a kick, then flip away from the direction of movement.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to open up some distance from a foe.

String.name: Charging Lunge IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge a medium distance and impale your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAim at a mediumly distant target and press the skill button.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRReplenish 475 MP and 200 Willpower. May eliminate cooldowns for <font color = '#F9B600'>Scattershot</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Arcane Barrage</font> (50% chance for each).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when low on MP or when <font color = '#F9B600'>Scattershot</font> and/or <font color = '#F9B600'>Arcane Barrage</font> are on cooldown.

String.name: High Kick X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Kick</font> a knocked-down enemy <font color = '#66bbff'>up in the air</font>, increasing your Rage. Activates when you knock down an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill on a <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font> target.

String.name: Windslash X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your runeglaive in a tight circle to damage nearby enemies. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button when you are surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Charging Lunge X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge a medium distance and impale your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAim at a mediumly distant target and press the skill button.

String.name: Breakaway Bolt I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot an explosive arrow that damages targets within $maxDistance, while <font color = '#66bbff'>leaping out</font> of harm's way.$BRYou are <font color = '#66bbff'>invincible</font> for a short while when using the skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to dodge in the current movement direction or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.

String.name: Death Blossom I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Toss a ring of shurikens that damages all enemies within 7m, then pulls them toward you and knocks them down.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill when you are surrounded by enemies, and follow up with <font color = '#f9b600'>Skyfall</font> or <font color = '#f9b600'>Circle of Steel</font>.

String.name: Fearsome Shout I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMonsters within $maxDistance briefly run away from you.$BRFear effect ends if target is knocked down.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRFear effect ends if target is attacked.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when enemies are gathered nearby.

String.name: Aura of the Tenacious
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Toggle Skill$BRGrants Aura of the Tenacious to your allies within 30m, replenishing <font color = '#66bbff'>20 MP</font> every second.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Costs 30 MP</font> every 2 seconds to maintain.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRCannot be used with <font color = '#F9B600'>Aura of the Unyielding</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Boosts</font> nearby allies when skill is activated.

String.name: Flip Kick I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeliver a kick to the enemy's head, <font color = '#66bbff'>stunning</font> the enemy for 3 seconds and increasing your Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRWhen used on an enemy player <font color = '#66bbff'>who's knocked up in the air</font>, the enemy player can't use <font color = '#f9b600'>Retaliate</font> in the air for a short time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target to block enemy's movement.

String.name: Runeburst I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDetonate Runemarks, damaging all enemies within 6m. Each detonated Runemark replenishes 100MP, with a high chance to stagger and 3 times the normal chance to crit. Generating 7 Runemarks resets the cooldown of this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button whenever an enemy with Runemarks is close by other enemies.

String.name: Second Wind I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRecovers $hpDiff HP and 750 RE.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when HP is low.

String.name: Shocking Implosion I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProduce a shocking burst 3m in front of you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#f9b600'>Metamorphic Blast</font> or <font color = '#f9b600'>Final Reprisal</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack enemies in your face.

String.name: Fury Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSlash your greatsword in front of you; the lower your HP, the greater the damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRAlso reduces the effect of healing skills on foes by 30% for 10 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when your HP is low.

String.name: Painblast I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUp to $maxCount targets within a $maxRadius radius centered $offsetDistance in front of you take $value damage every $tickInterval for $time. Does less damage to other players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing a distant target.

String.name: Shadow Reaping
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRReap the shadows around you and reset the cooldowns of <font color = '#F9B600'>Double Shear</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Grim Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Pendulum Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Whipsaw</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Sundering Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Death Spiral</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cable Step</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>. These skills also have their cooldowns reduced by 70% while Shadow Reaping is active.$BRIncreases Magic Amplification by $H_S_GOOD5%$COLOR_END during effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to reset and shorten skill cooldowns.

String.name: Charging Slash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRCharge forward and attack the first target in your path. Attack draws high <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to quickly approach a target.

String.name: Runeburst I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDetonate Runemarks, damaging all enemies within 6m. Each detonated Runemark replenishes 100MP, with a high chance to stagger and 3 times the normal chance to crit. Generating 7 Runemarks resets the cooldown of this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button whenever an enemy with Runemarks is close by other enemies.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProduce a divine burst to attack target within 3m.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#f9b600'>Metamorphic Blast</font> or <font color = '#f9b600'>Final Reprisal</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack enemies in your face.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot an explosive arrow that damages targets within $maxDistance, while <font color = '#66bbff'>leaping out</font> of harm's way.$BRYou are <font color = '#66bbff'>invincible</font> for a short while when using the skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to dodge in the current movement direction or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.

String.name: Death Blossom III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Toss a ring of shurikens that damages all enemies within 7m, then pulls them toward you and knocks them down.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill when you are surrounded by enemies, and follow up with <font color = '#f9b600'>Skyfall</font> or <font color = '#f9b600'>Circle of Steel</font>.

String.name: Fearsome Shout III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMonsters within $maxDistance briefly run away from you.$BRFear effect ends if target is knocked down.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRFear effect ends if target is attacked.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when enemies are gathered nearby.

String.name: Flip Kick III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeliver a kick to the enemy's head, <font color = '#66bbff'>stunning</font> the enemy for 3 seconds and increasing your Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRWhen used on an enemy player <font color = '#66bbff'>who's knocked up in the air</font>, the enemy player can't use <font color = '#f9b600'>Retaliate</font> in the air for a short time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target to block enemy's movement.

String.name: Runeburst III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDetonate Runemarks, damaging all enemies within 6m. Each detonated Runemark replenishes 100MP, with a high chance to stagger and 3 times the normal chance to crit. Generating 7 Runemarks resets the cooldown of this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button whenever an enemy with Runemarks is close by other enemies.

String.name: Second Wind III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRecovers $hpDiff HP and 750 RE.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when HP is low.

String.name: Shocking Implosion III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRProduce a divine burst to attack target within 3m.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#f9b600'>Metamorphic Blast</font> or <font color = '#f9b600'>Final Reprisal</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to attack enemies in your face.

String.name: Fury Strike III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSlash your greatsword in front of you; the lower your HP, the greater the damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRAlso reduces the effect of healing skills on foes by 30% for 10 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when your HP is low.

String.name: Painblast III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUp to $maxCount targets within a $maxRadius radius centered $offsetDistance in front of you take $value damage every $tickInterval for $time. Does less damage to other players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while enemies are in front of you.

String.name: Charging Slash III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRCharge forward and attack the first target in your path. Attack draws high <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to quickly approach a target.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRCharge forward and attack the first target in your path. Attack draws high <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to quickly approach a target.

String.name: Runeburst VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDetonate Runemarks, damaging all enemies within 6m. Each detonated Runemark replenishes 100MP, with a high chance to stagger and 3 times the normal chance to crit. Generating 7 Runemarks resets the cooldown of this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button whenever an enemy with Runemarks is close by other enemies.

String.name: Breakaway Bolt VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot an explosive arrow that damages targets within $maxDistance, while <font color = '#66bbff'>leaping out</font> of harm's way.$BRYou are <font color = '#66bbff'>invincible</font> for a short while when using the skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to dodge in the current movement direction or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.

Generating 7 Runemarks resets the cooldown of this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button whenever an enemy with Runemarks is close by other enemies.

String.name: Web Arrow I
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot an arrow up to $maxDistance, inflicting damage and slowing the target's <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by $value for $time.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate a target.

String.name: Attunement
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Still your mind and restore your Chi by 50%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill when <font color = '#f9b600'>Combo Attack</font> will take too long to build up your Chi meter.

String.name: Teleport Jaunt
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Teleport</font> a short distance in the direction the camera faces.$BR - You are Invincible while teleporting.$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing the target location to escape or move quickly.

String.name: Rampage I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Rage Skill$BRRush the enemy from up to 8m away and deliver a series of devastating blows. <font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to deal one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while targeting a distant enemy.

String.name: Balder's Tears
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummons three glowing spheres of dream energy that each block 70% of the damage from an incoming attack. You are immune to knockdown, stagger, and push-back while the spheres are active and recover 67 Ragnarok points per second. Effects end when the player enters combat.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to avoid being interrupted while using potions or otherwise preparing for combat.

String.name: Adrenaline Rush I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Increases Attack Speed </font>by 15% for you and your group members within 40m range and increases damage to monsters by 5% for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Bonus Effect]</font>$BRYour <font color = '#f9b600'>attack skills</font> draw more <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font>. Reduces <font color = '#66bbff'>cooldown</font> of your melee <font color = '#f9b600'>attack skills</font> by 50%, except for <font color = '#f9b600'>Shield Bash</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Debilitate</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Charging Lunge</font>, and <font color = '#f9b600'>Lockdown Blow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill when you and your allies are focusing on a single target.

String.name: Headlong Rush I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge forward, increasing the speed of your next attack within 10 seconds by 40%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to close the distance with a foe, or to expedite a skill with a long cast time.

String.name: Painful Trap I
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSet a trap that explodes when stepped on. Trap lasts 10 seconds.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRTarget is <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked down</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to incapacitate an enemy.

String.name: Spirit Gallows
String.tooltip: Press and hold the skill button to levitate surrounding enemies. The longer you hold the button, the higher your enemies will rise and the more damage they will take when they fall. Levitated enemies cannot be damaged by normal attacks until dropped, and will fall immediately if you are immobilized.

String.name: Vortex Slash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing your swords in a wide arc, pulling hit targets toward you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to set up big attacks.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing your swords in a wide arc to pull hit targets toward you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance II</font> is active, greatly increases <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font> and maintains it at maximum for 5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to draw aggro and set up big attacks.

String.name: Rampage VIII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Rage Skill$BRRush the enemy from up to 8m away and deliver a series of devastating blows. <font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to deal one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while targeting a distant enemy.

String.name: Rampage IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Rage Skill$BRRush the enemy from up to 8m away and deliver a series of devastating blows. <font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to deal one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while targeting a distant enemy.

String.name: Rampage X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Rage Skill$BRRush the enemy from up to 8m away and deliver a series of devastating blows. <font color = '#66bbff'>Blocks attacks from the front</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perfect Defense]</font>$BRCorrect timing leads to <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font>, which has a high chance to deal one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while targeting a distant enemy.

String.name: Close Quarters I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike a foe in front of you twice.$BRSecond attack briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stuns</font> the foe.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate a target.

String.name: Bladestorm I
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Throw your shuriken up to 12m ahead of you, where it will pull in and damage nearby enemies for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to gather enemies at mid range and set them up for a follow-up attack.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRSkill duration is slightly less.

String.name: Lethal Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike your foes as you rush forward. Increases your skill damage as your HP decreases.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if you first use <font color = '#F9B600'>Thunder Strike</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Arun's Vitae I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRGenerates motes of <font color = '#66bbff'>HP Recovery</font> in front of you. The mote <font color = '#66bbff'>instantly removes all debuffs</font> and grants <font color = '#66bbff'>Arun's Vitae</font>, which <font color = '#66bbff'>recovers 390 HP</font> per second for 3 seconds.$BR$BRThe effect can be <font color = '#66bbff'>stacked</font> twice.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPrepare in advance; place the motes near allies that might need <font color = '#F66bbff'>healing</font>.

String.name: HB-1
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummon a construct to aid you. HB-1 damages nearby enemies when summoned. When you are nearby and below max HP, HB-1 aims a healing ray at you. <font color = '#F9B600'>Command: Stay/Follow</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Command: Recall</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Command: Self-Destruct</font> work while HB-1 is active and within 40m. If you move more than 80m from HB-1, it will teleport to your side. Lasts up to 30 minutes.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour friendly construct companion. Can be summoned while moving.

String.name: Growing Fury
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font> Rage Skill$BRRelease your rage to increase body size. Your gigantic form slows your attack speed, but also gives you great power to block enemy attacks.$BR$BRYou can <font color = '#66bbff'>block frontal attacks</font> while casting. You draw 25% more aggro, increase size by 10%, Power by 45, and Crit Factor by 50, and reduce skill cooldown by 30% and Attack Speed by 10.$BRPower is increased based on your Physical Amplification.$BR$BRConsumes 250 Rage per second. Effect ends when you run out of Rage. [Provoke] resets when effect ends.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRYou cannot use <font color = '#f9b600'>Mounting Rage</font> or <font color = '#f9b600'>Meat Grinder</font> while <font color = '#f9b600'>Growing Fury</font> is in effect.$BR(If <font color = '#f9b600'>Mounting Rage</font> is in effect, casting Growing Fury</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>cancels</font> the effect.)$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUntil your Rage is fully consumed, use this skill to <font color = '#66bbff'>block</font> enemy attacks and <font color = '#66bbff'>attack at the same time.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Shield Barrage I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMove forward, attacking target by swinging your shield.$BRRepeat the attack up to 2 hits. The last hit may briefly stun your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a nearby target.

String.name: Heal Thyself I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Restores HP</font> to the caster.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>restore your HP</font>.

String.name: Overpower I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYour next attack within $time does $value extra damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse before casting a powerful skill.

String.name: Glacial Retreat I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFreeze the ground before you as you leap backward, briefly decreasing the <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> of your target by $value.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to dodge in the current movement direction or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.

String.name: Shrouded Escape
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCloak yourself in shadow, reducing aggro and becoming invisible. This effect lasts for 8 seconds, but is cancelled if you use a skill or are attacked.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the to escape or hide from enemies.

String.name: Combative Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRSacrifice HP to deal a decisive attack, decreasing the <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> of your foes by $value.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRAlso reduces the <font color = '#66bbff'>effect of healing skills</font> on foes by 30%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to weaken opponents.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMove forward, attacking target by swinging your shield.$BRRepeat the attack up to 2 hits. The last hit may briefly stun your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a nearby target.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRSacrifice HP to deal a decisive attack, decreasing the <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> of your foes by $value.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRAlso reduces the <font color = '#66bbff'>effect of healing skills</font> on foes by 30%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to weaken opponents.

String.name: Shield Barrage IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMove forward, attacking target by swinging your shield.$BRRepeat the attack up to 2 hits. The last hit may briefly stun your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a nearby target.

String.name: Lethal Strike IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike your foes as you rush forward. Increases your skill damage as your HP decreases.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if you first use <font color = '#F9B600'>Thunder Strike</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Retaliate IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Close Quarters V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike a foe in front of you twice.$BRSecond attack briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stuns</font> the foe.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A4FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate a target.

String.name: Bladestorm V
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Throw your shuriken up to 12m ahead of you, where it will pull in and damage nearby enemies for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to gather enemies at mid range and set them up for a follow-up attack.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRSkill duration is slightly less.

String.name: Lethal Strike V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrike your foes as you rush forward. Increases your skill damage as your HP decreases.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if you first use <font color = '#F9B600'>Thunder Strike</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Arun's Vitae V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRGenerates motes of <font color = '#66bbff'>HP Recovery</font> in front of you. The mote <font color = '#66bbff'>instantly removes all debuffs</font> and grants <font color = '#66bbff'>Arun's Vitae</font>, which <font color = '#66bbff'>recovers 1375 HP</font> per second for 3 seconds.$BR$BRThe effect can be <font color = '#66bbff'>stacked</font> twice.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPrepare in advance; place the motes near allies that might need <font color = '#F66bbff'>healing</font>.

String.name: HB-5
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummon a construct to aid you. HB-5 damages nearby enemies when summoned. When you are nearby and below max HP, HB-5 aims a healing ray at you. <font color = '#F9B600'>Command: Stay/Follow</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Command: Recall</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Command: Self-Destruct</font> work while HB-5 is active and within 40m. If you move more than 80m from HB-5, it will teleport to your side. Lasts up to 30 minutes.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYour friendly construct companion. Can be summoned while moving.

String.name: Retaliate V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Shield Barrage V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMove forward, attacking target by swinging your shield.$BRRepeat the attack up to 2 hits. The last hit may briefly stun your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a nearby target.

String.name: Heal Thyself V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Restores HP</font> to the caster.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>restore your HP</font>.

String.name: Glacial Retreat V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFreeze the ground before you as you leap backward, briefly decreasing the <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> of your target by $value.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to dodge in the current movement direction or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.

The mote <font color = '#66bbff'>instantly removes all debuffs</font> and grants <font color = '#66bbff'>Arun's Vitae</font>, which <font color = '#66bbff'>recovers 6921 HP</font> per second for 3 seconds.$BR$BRThe effect can be <font color = '#66bbff'>stacked</font> twice.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPrepare in advance; place the motes near allies that might need <font color = '#F66bbff'>healing</font>.

String.name: Retaliate X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Shield Barrage X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMove forward, attacking target by swinging your shield.$BRRepeat the attack up to 2 hits. The last hit may briefly stun your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a nearby target.

String.name: Heal Thyself X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Restores HP</font> to the caster.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>restore your HP</font>.

String.name: Combative Strike X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRSacrifice HP to deal a decisive attack, decreasing the <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> of your foes by $value.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRAlso reduces the <font color = '#66bbff'>effect of healing skills</font> on foes by 30%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to weaken opponents.

String.name: Shield Barrage X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMove forward, attacking target by swinging your shield.$BRRepeat the attack up to 2 hits. The last hit may briefly stun your target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a nearby target.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Bladestorm XI
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Throw your shuriken up to 12m ahead of you, where it will pull in and damage nearby enemies for 2.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to gather enemies at mid range and set them up for a follow-up attack.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRSkill duration is slightly less.

String.name: Arun's Vitae XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRGenerates motes of <font color = '#66bbff'>HP Recovery</font> in front of you. The mote <font color = '#66bbff'>instantly removes all debuffs</font> and grants <font color = '#66bbff'>Arun's Vitae</font>, which <font color = '#66bbff'>recovers 10254 HP</font> per second for 3 seconds.$BR$BRThe effect can be <font color = '#66bbff'>stacked</font> twice.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPrepare in advance; place the motes near allies that might need <font color = '#F66bbff'>healing</font>.

String.name: Heal Thyself XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Restores HP</font> to the caster.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>restore your HP</font>.

String.name: Combative Strike XI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> <font color = '#F9B600'>Edge Skill</font>$BRSacrifice HP to imbue your sword with fighting spirit and strike with precision.$BRInjured targets suffer $value lower <font color = '#66bbff'>endurance</font> for a limited time. Is the target is a player, it also reduces <font color = '#66bbff'>HP Recovery</font> by 30%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance II</font> is active, decreases a monster's <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> by an additional 12% and Physical and Magic Resistance by $calcValue(multiple,1003,0.1,3).$BRThis effect is increased by $H_S_GOOD10%$COLOR_END of the total Physical Resistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target. If the target is a player character, <font color = '#66bbff'>reduces HP recovery</font> effect.

String.name: Anti-Tank Mine
String.tooltip: A high-damage trap. Stays active for 60 seconds.

String.name: Lightning Mine
String.tooltip: Temporarily immobilizes an enemy tank. Stays active for 60 seconds.

String.name: Thunder Mine
String.tooltip: Temporarily prevents an enemy tank from attacking. Stays active for 60 seconds.

String.name: Suicide Soldier
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once to activate a Suicide Bomb, then again to deal massive damage to nearby enemies. You cannot board a tank while this skill is active, and once you explode you will be a spectator until the end of the round.

String.name: Suicide Bomber
String.tooltip: Blow yourself up.

String.name: Poison Arrow I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot an arrow dripping with lethal poison. The arrow flies, <font color = '#66bbff'>poisoning</font> the target and inflicting $value damage every $tickInterval for $time. $BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Reduced damage</font> at max distance and the effect is <font color = '#66bbff'>weaker</font> for player characters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing a distant target.

String.name: Chakra Thrust I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLunge forward and stab a target at close range, stunning them for 3 seconds. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to strike a nearby enemy and temporarily prevent them from attacking.

String.name: Triumphant Shout I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCall on inner reserves to stagger players within 8m, and recover 997 HP and 300 MP.$BRYou become immune to knockdown, stagger, and stun for 3 seconds, and gain a strong resistance to weakening effects.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse on a nearby target. Briefly enables attacks without being stopped by enemies.

String.name: ST-1
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummon a construct to aid you in combat. Throw ST-1 at a spot within $maxDistance, and it will continually attack enemies within 18m for 45 seconds. <font color = '#F9B600'>Command: Self-Destruct</font> works while ST-1 is active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse for additional damage on mobs or bosses.

String.name: Invigorating Rage
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Rage Skill$BRBurn off half of your maximum Rage to <font color = '#66bbff'>recover</font> 40% of maximum HP and <font color = '#66bbff'>replenish</font> 40% of maximum MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Consume your Rage</font> to <font color = '#66bbff'>recharge</font> your HP or MP. Can use while moving.

String.name: Reclamation I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRTransfer all Runemarks from the primary target to yourself.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRGenerates 1 Runemark.

String.name: Pledge of Protection
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAbsorb 20% of damage done to other group members within 20m for $time by taking it on yourself and reduce 20% of damage you receive.$BRYour Defense determines how much damage you take.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRIncreases Physical Resistance of allies by $calcValue(multiple,1003,0.15,3).$BRThis effect is increased by $H_S_GOOD15%$COLOR_END of your Physical Resistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button when an ally is in danger.

String.name: Focus Heal I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Restore $calcValue(heal,0,347.5,0) HP</font> to $maxCount targeted group members within $maxDistance (modified by your heal bonus).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move over to lock on to targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Tenacity I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCall on inner reserves to instantly replenish $mpDiff MP. Greatly increases resistance to stun for 3 seconds. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you need MP replenishment or before you receive stun effect.

String.name: Mana Siphon
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Charge up</font> your attack by holding down the skill button, then release it to take MP from targets within $maxDistance. MP absorption $H_S_GOODincreases$COLOR_END up to $H_S_GOOD20%$COLOR_END of your Maximum MP according to the level of charge. MP of target will decrease as the same amount you have absorbed.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to replenish MP in combat.

String.name: Dark Harvest
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAfter a successful hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Grim Strike</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Sundering Strike</font> send your scythes flying to the same spot for an additional attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRA successful hit activates enhanced versions of <font color = '#F9B600'>Shadow Burst</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Sundering Strike</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse as part of an enhanced attack chain.

String.name: Rising Fury I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Edge Skill</font>$BRSlash a target twice. $BRPress the skill button again within 1 second to slash the target once more.$BRReduces a target's <font color = '#66bbff'>movement speed</font> by 50% for a moment.$BRAny damage received is reduced by 25% while the skill is active.$BRThe lower your HP, the greater the damage dealt.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace the target while using the skill.$BRDeals greater damage when the caster has low HP. Can adjust attack direction when you deal additional damage.

String.name: Focus Heal I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Restore $calcValue(heal,0,347.5,0) HP</font> to $maxCount targeted group members within $maxDistance (modified by your heal bonus).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move over to lock on to targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Edge Skill</font>$BRSlash a target twice. $BRPress the skill button again within 1 second to slash the target once more.$BRReduces a target's <font color = '#66bbff'>movement speed</font> by 50% for a moment.$BRAny damage received is reduced by 25% while the skill is active.$BRThe lower your HP, the greater the damage dealt.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace the target while using the skill.$BRDeals greater damage when the caster has low HP. Can adjust attack direction when you deal additional damage.

String.name: Focus Heal IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Restore $calcValue(heal,0,771,0) HP</font> to $maxCount targeted group members within $maxDistance (modified by your heal bonus).$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move over to lock on to targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Poison Arrow V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot an arrow dripping with lethal poison. The arrow flies, <font color = '#66bbff'>poisoning</font> the target and inflicting $value damage every $tickInterval for $time. $BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Reduced damage</font> at max distance and the effect is <font color = '#66bbff'>weaker</font> for player characters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing a distant target.

String.name: Chakra Thrust V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLunge forward and stab a target at close range, stunning them for 3 seconds. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to strike a nearby enemy and temporarily prevent them from attacking.

String.name: Outlaw Declaration
String.tooltip: While toggled, you may attack other players and other players may attack you. (Note that outlaws may not attack players with Seren's Protection.) Killing other players 6 or more levels lower will stack infamy, which may result in penalties.

String.name: Murderous Intent
String.tooltip: Increases Power by $H_W_GOOD$value2$COLOR_END, Attack Speed by $H_W_GOOD$value3$COLOR_END, Crit Factor by $H_W_GOOD$value5$COLOR_END, and Movement Speed by $H_W_GOOD$value4$COLOR_END.

String.name: Dark Wings
String.tooltip: Increases Power by 3, Attack Speed by 2%, Crit Factor by 2 and Movement Speed by 4% for $time. <font color = '#FF0000'>You may use this skill until the next Crusade season begins.</font>

String.name: Dark Souls
String.tooltip: Increases Power by 3, Attack Speed by 2% and Movement Speed by 4% for $time. <font color = '#FF0000'>You may use this skill until the next Crusade season begins.</font>

String.name: Dark Hearts
String.tooltip: Increases Power by 3 and Movement Speed by 4% for $time. <font color = '#FF0000'>You may use this skill until the next Crusade season begins.</font>

String.name: Restraining Arrow I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoots an arrow up to $maxDistance, decreasing the targets <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by $value2 and <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed</font> by $value for a short time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing a distant target.

String.name: Clone Jutsu
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>Target another player within 30m and duplicate their current appearance. Clone Jutsu lasts for 60 seconds, and you can take no actions other than moving, jumping, climbing ladders, or using emotes. Your transformation ends if you use a skill or take damage from an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill to copy enemy players in PvP to sow confusion and lure them close for an attack.

String.name: Inescapable Doom I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBriefly slows movement of targets within 5m radius by 62%.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRPrevents other players from using evasive and movement skills.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill button before attacking a quick-moving enemy.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Meat Grinder I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRTarget an enemy <font color = '#66bbff'>suspended in air</font> and pummel it with a series of devastating blows, increasing your Rage.$BRWhile attacking, the target is <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked into the air</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRChain after skills that <font color = '#66bbff'>lift enemies into the air</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when an enemy is <font color = '#66bbff'>suspended in air</font>.

String.name: Backstab I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRTeleport directly behind a target within $maxDistance and attack. You do not receive damage while teleporting.$BRThe target is immobilized for a few seconds. Ends if target is knocked down. Cooldown doubles when you attack an enemy player.$BR$BR</font><font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an enemy and teleport directly behind them.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRA successful hit on a target bearing a Runemark resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.

String.name: In Cold Blood I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRIncreases Skill Damage by 15% for $time. Increases Attack Speed by $value2.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your combat abilities.

String.name: Flaming Barrage I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and attack them with a magical flame.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Cable Step
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow your scythes at a target within 18m. After hitting and stunning the target, pull on the chains to fly toward the target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate and close with a target.

String.name: Deadly Gamble I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRIncreases <font color = '#66bbff'>the chance to crit</font> by $value for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your chance to crit.

String.name: Flaming Barrage I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and attack them with a magical flame.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Deadly Gamble II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRIncreases your <font color = '#66bbff'>chance to crit</font> by $value for $time.$BRWhile active, reduces skill cooldowns by half for all melee attacks except for <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Frenzy</font>.$BRInstantly resets cooldown of Rain of Blows, Blade Draw, Scythe, and Aerial Scythe.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhanced skill]</font>$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Rain of Blows IX</font>: Increases damage by 15% and doubles <font color = '#66bbff'>Edge</font> generation.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Draw IX</font>: Increases damage by 15% and doubles <font color = '#66bbff'>Edge</font> generation.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Scythe IX</font>: Increases skill damage by 15% and <font color = '#66bbff'>range</font> by 20%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your attack temporarily. $BRPress the skill button before using <font color = '#F9B600'>skills above</font> for better damage.

String.name: Flaming Barrage III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and attack them with a magical flame.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Flaming Barrage III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and attack them with a magical flame.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Backstab III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRTeleport directly behind a target within $maxDistance and attack. You do not receive damage while teleporting.$BRThe target is immobilized for a few seconds. Ends if target is knocked down. Cooldown doubles when you attack an enemy player.$BR$BR</font><font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an enemy and teleport directly behind them.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRA successful hit on a target bearing a Runemark resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.

String.name: Retaliate IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Meat Grinder IV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRTarget an enemy <font color = '#66bbff'>suspended in air</font> and pummel it with a series of devastating blows, increasing your Rage.$BRWhile attacking, the target is <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked into the air</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRChain after skills that <font color = '#66bbff'>lift enemies into the air</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when an enemy is <font color = '#66bbff'>suspended in air</font>.
