String.name: Sniper's Eye I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> Power by 30, Attack Speed by 4, and Movement Speed by 16.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> damage to enemy players by 10%, and damage to monsters by 7%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to boost your stats.

String.name: Boomerang Shuriken
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack your enemies with a returning shuriken. Can be cast up to three times in a row, with the third shuriken dealing dramatically increased damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BR - Hitting a target at max distance resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaves on the Wind</font>.$BR - When used while <font color = '#F9B600'>Inner Harmony</font> is active, changes <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaves on the Wind</font> into <font color = '#F9B600'>Harmonious Leaves on the Wind</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when not engaged in melee.

String.name: Bloodlust I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYour Power increases by $value for $time and your Balance Factor and Impact Factor each increase by $value3.$BRAdditionally, damage to monsters increases by $value2.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your DPS.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Command: Recall I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRTravel in a straight line to your HB construct, passing through enemies without effect. You must be within 40m of your HB to use this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to quickly cross the battlefield. Can be activated while using another skill.

String.name: Mounting Rage
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Rage Skill$BRImmediately gain 50% of your maximum <font color = '#66bbff'>Rage</font>, then gain 50 more Rage every second for 20 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRYou cannot use this skill while <font color = '#f9b600'>Growing Fury</font> is in effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to gain <font color = '#66bbff'>Rage</font>.

String.name: Dark Herald I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPulls all enemies within 8m of a target bearing Runemarks, even if that target is you. Stuns monsters for 3 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRPlayers pulled by Dark Herald are immune to the effect for 20 seconds. Can pull up to 2 players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill when you need your enemies clustered together for a follow-up attack.

String.name: Lockdown Blow I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing your shield to deliver a crippling attack to the target, briefly decreasing the target's Movement Speed for a moment.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a nearby target.

String.name: Exhausting Blow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPush forward, striking a painful blow.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRGenerates <font color = '#66bbff'>Exhausting Blow</font> effect.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Exhausting Blow</font> increases the target's skill cooldowns by 50% for all skills they use in the next 11 seconds.$BRCan only be used on other players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse on other players.

String.name: Nerve Exhaustion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRWeaken up to $maxCount players within $maxDistance and <font color = '#66bbff'>prevent them from using any skills</font> for 5 seconds. Knockdown or an attack on a target <font color = '#66bbff'>ends</font> the effect.$BR$BRUsing this skill on a target cursed by <font color = '#f9b600'>Time Gyre</font> removes the effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over enemy players to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Recall Scythes
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRQuickly recall your scythes to deal damage to nearby enemies. If this skill hits, decrease the cooldowns of <font color = '#F9B600'>Shadow Burst</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Grim Strike</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse as a quick follow-up attack after a successful hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Sundering Strike</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Grim Strike</font>.

String.name: Cascade of Stuns I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing your swords in front of you.$BRIf you hit <font color = '#66bbff'>a stunned target</font>, the stun <font color = '#66bbff'>spreads</font> to nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when fighting multiple enemies.

String.name: Harmonious Boomerang Shuriken
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAttack your enemies with a returning shuriken. Can be cast up to three times in a row, with the third shuriken dealing dramatically increased damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BR - Hitting a target at max distance resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaves on the Wind</font>.$BR - When used while <font color = '#F9B600'>Inner Harmony</font> is active, changes <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaves on the Wind</font> into <font color = '#F9B600'>Harmonious Leaves on the Wind</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when not engaged in melee.

String.name: Dark Herald I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPulls all enemies within 8m of a target bearing Runemarks, even if that target is you. Stuns monsters for 3 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRPlayers pulled by Dark Herald are immune to the effect for 20 seconds. Can pull up to 2 players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill when you need your enemies clustered together for a follow-up attack.

String.name: Lockdown Blow I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSwing your shield to deliver a crippling attack to the target, briefly decreasing the target's Movement Speed for a moment.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a nearby target.

String.name: Dark Herald I

Stuns monsters for 3 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRPlayers pulled by Dark Herald are immune to the effect for 20 seconds. Can pull up to 2 players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill when you need your enemies clustered together for a follow-up attack.

String.name: Sniper's Eye II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> Power by 30, Attack Speed by 8, and Movement Speed by 16. <font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> damage to enemy players by 10%, and damage to monsters by 7%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to boost your stats.

String.name: Bloodlust II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYour Power increases by $value for $time. Your Balance Factor and Impact Factor each increases by $value3.$BRAdditionally, damage to monsters increases by $value2.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your DPS.

String.name: Retaliate II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Command: Recall II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRTravel in a straight line to your HB construct, passing through enemies without effect. You must be within 40m of your HB to use this skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to quickly cross the battlefield. Can be activated while using another skill.

Can pull up to 2 players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse this skill when you need your enemies clustered together for a follow-up attack.

String.name: Sequential Fire I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Focus Generation</font>$BRFire a quick, damaging arrow forwards within $maxDistance. A successful hit <font color = '#66bbff'>staggers</font> an enemy and adds a stack of <font color = '#66bbff'>Focus</font>. <font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced</font> damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggered by <font color = '#f9b600'>Radiant Arrow</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Penetrating Arrow</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Rapid Fire</font>, or <font color = '#f9b600'>Thunderbolt</font>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]$BRUse in a chain after select Charging Skills.

String.name: Quick Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRush an opponent and execute a blindingly fast attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDeals more damage when used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Chakra Thrust</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to kick off your attack chain.

String.name: Arun's Tears
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCreate a mote that instantly <font color = '#66bbff'>replenishes MP</font> by 1546.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPrepare in advance; generate the motes near allies that might need <font color = '#66bbff'>MP replenishment</font>.

String.name: Command: Self-Destruct
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BROrder your summoned constructs to detonate, damaging and <font color = '#66bbff'>stunning</font> enemies within 4m.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYou must be within 40m of a construct to issue this command, and can do so even if knocked down or using another skill.

String.name: Flying Kick
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump 7m forward and make hit a target with a hard kick.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRUse after <font color = '#F9B600'>any skill</font> to leap 6m further and hit faster and stronger.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to move faster or rush a target. Use after <font color = '#F9B600'>other skills</font> that have a long cooldown.

String.name: Iron Will I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYour iron will absorbs $value damage for up to 10 seconds.$BRYou consume 1 MP for every 20 damage absorbed. Effect ends when you absorb damage beyond the limit, or when you run out of MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you're about to take a big hit.

String.name: Kaia's Shield I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Shield skill$BRCast a barrier that absorbs $value damage for $time on up to 5 group members including yourself within a $maxDistance range. (While active, you are immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown and stagger</font>.)$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you or your ally is in danger.

String.name: Burning Breath I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot a fiery blaze that inflicts $value damage every $tickInterval for $time for up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Binding Scythes
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRTarget an enemy and press the skill key to entangle them in your chains for 5 seconds, dealing damage at the end.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRThe imprisoned target receives final damage proportional to the number of times attacked while entangled.

String.name: Backstab I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRRush an enemy and make a lethal thrust to your target's back.$BRTarget must be within a $maxDistance range, and is <font color = '#66bbff'>stunned</font> for a few seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRLine up an enemy and press the skill button.

A successful hit <font color = '#66bbff'>staggers</font> an enemy and adds a stack of <font color = '#66bbff'>Focus</font>. <font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced</font> damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggered by <font color = '#f9b600'>Radiant Arrow</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Penetrating Arrow</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Rapid Fire</font>, or <font color = '#f9b600'>Thunderbolt</font>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]$BRUse in a chain after select Charging Skills.

String.name: Iron Will V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYour iron will absorbs $value damage for up to 10 seconds.$BRYou consume 1 MP for every 100 damage absorbed. Effect ends when you absorb damage beyond the limit, or when you run out of MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you're about to take a big hit.

String.name: Kaia's Shield V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font> Shield skill$BRCast a barrier that absorbs $value$calcValue(multiple,1004,0.65,0) damage for $time on up to 5 group members including yourself within a $maxDistance range.$BRAbsorbed amount is increased by $H_S_GOOD65%$COLOR_END of your Magic Resistance.$BR(While active, you are immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown and stagger</font>.)$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you or your ally is in danger.

String.name: Burning Breath V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoot a fiery blaze that inflicts $value damage every $tickInterval for $time for up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Stunning Trap Arrow I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch a trap 15m in front of you. The trap lasts for 10 seconds or until triggered. Briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stuns</font> the target and surrounding enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate enemies.

String.name: Inner Harmony
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou become one with the universe, and can manifest in multiple places at once. While active, you receive the following effects:$BR - Grants continuous MP and Chi restoration, <font color = '#F9B600'>Piercing Gaze</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclic Chi</font>.$BR - <font color = '#F9B600'>Quick Attack</font> becomes <font color = '#F9B600'>Harmonious Quick Attack</font>.$BR - <font color = '#F9B600'>Boomerang Shuriken</font> becomes <font color = '#F9B600'>Harmonious Boomerang Shuriken</font>.$BR - <font color = '#F9B600'>Burning Heart</font> becomes <font color = '#F9B600'>Harmonious Burning Heart</font> and the cooldown is reset.$BR - <font color = '#F9B600'>Fire Avalanche</font> becomes <font color = '#F9B600'>Harmonious Fire Avalanche</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill when targets are incapacitated or when you need to deal high damage.

String.name: Metamorphic Smite I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDamage targets within 5 meters, and has a chance to knock them down.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Metamorphic Blast</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when enemies are too close.

String.name: Command: Stay/Follow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BROrder your HB construct to stay in place or to begin following you again. The HB will automatically teleport to your side if you move more than 80m away.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to position your construct where it is needed most. Can be activated while using another skill and also while moving.

String.name: Spinning Back Elbow
String.tooltip: 1 Hit: Can avoid enemy attacks and deal damage at the same time / 2 Hits: Can knock monsters (expect for bosses) in the air

String.name: Gungnir's Bite
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRDash in a wide circle, attacking any enemies inside its radius. Press the skill button again within 6 seconds to attack a second time. Cooldown applies 6 seconds after the initial attack, or immediately after the second.$BRIncreases skill damage by 10% for 4 seconds.$BRThis effect is increased based on your Magic Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when surrounded by enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRSuccessful hit resets the cooldown of Leaping Slash</font> and generates 1 Runemark$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>Ragnarok</font>$BRGenerates 15 additional Ragnarok points on a successful hit.

String.name: Master's Leash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow another hook to pull a target within 18m nearer.$BRNot effective on huge opponents.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan only be used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Leash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget another enemy and press the skill button.

String.name: Measured Slice I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRGather your might and make a wide slice at an enemy's neck. You deal 30% more damage to enemies suspended in the air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Overhand Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Eviscerate</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Punishing Blow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse on enemies suspended in the air.

String.name: Mana Volley I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on to targets within $maxDistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>replenish</font> 25% of your total MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRTargets lose 25% of their total MP immediately and 172 more MP every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Binding Scythes
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRTarget an enemy and press the skill key to entangle them in your chains for 5 seconds, dealing damage at the end.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRThe imprisoned target receives final damage proportional to the number of times attacked while entangled.

String.name: Spinning Counter I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>When hit,</font> execute a counterattack within 5 seconds.$BRThe counterattack briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stuns</font> and turns your target around.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRCannot be used while in <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse <font color = '#66bbff'>after you've been hit</font> to stun your attacker.

String.name: Gungnir's Bite
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRDash in a wide circle, attacking any enemies inside its radius. Press the skill button again within 6 seconds to attack a second time. Cooldown applies 6 seconds after the initial attack, or immediately after the second.$BRIncreases skill damage by 10% for 4 seconds.$BRThis effect is increased based on your Magic Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when surrounded by enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRSuccessful hit resets the cooldown of Leaping Slash</font> and generates 1 Runemark$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>Ragnarok</font>$BRGenerates 15 additional Ragnarok points on a successful hit.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDamage targets within 5 meters, and has a chance to knock them down.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Metamorphic Blast</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when enemies are too close.

String.name: Measured Slice III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRGather your might and make a wide slice at an enemy's neck. You deal 30% more damage to enemies suspended in the air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Overhand Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Eviscerate</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Punishing Blow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse on enemies suspended in the air.

String.name: Stare Trap
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch a trap 20m in front of you. The trap lasts for 10 seconds or until triggered. Briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stuns</font> the target and surrounding enemies. If enemies on the trajectory are hit, the trap explodes immediately.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A2FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRAutomatically assesses the required range; use to incapacitate enemies.

String.name: Gungnir's Bite
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRDash in a wide circle, attacking any enemies inside its radius. Press the skill button again within 6 seconds to attack a second time. Cooldown applies 6 seconds after the initial attack, or immediately after the second.$BRIncreases skill damage by 10% for 4 seconds.$BRThis effect is increased based on your Magic Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when surrounded by enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRSuccessful hit resets the cooldown of Leaping Slash</font> and generates 1 Runemark$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>Ragnarok</font>$BRGenerates 15 additional Ragnarok points on a successful hit.

String.name: Snare I
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch an arrow at enemies up to $maxDistance away.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Press the skill button again</font> before it reaches the max distance to detonate the arrow early, <font color = '#66bbff'>decreasing</font> the <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> of nearby enemies for a short time.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRSlowing effect and duration is <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTime the detonation to incapacitate a group of enemies.

String.name: Evasive Smash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effects]</font>$BRInterrupt a charge skill with a rolling dodge and then follow up with a rib-rattling uppercut attack.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRInterrupts charge skills such as <font color = '#F9B600'>Thunder Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Vampiric Blow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while moving away to avoid enemy attack.$BRAfter evading, face the target and press the skill button again to attack.$BRUsing a different charge skill after evasion is in action, the chain attack is canceled.

String.name: Volley of Curses I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRHit up to 4 targets within 27m with a curse that does $time$tickInterval damage every $value for $calcValue(multiple,1004,0.1,3).$BRPeriodic damage is increased by $H_S_GOOD100%$COLOR_END of your Magic Amplification.$BRDeals 1,212 $calcValue(multiple,1002,0.03,0) <font color = '#66bbff'>less</font> damage to other players.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stacks</font> up to 2 times.$BR$BRDecreases Physical and Magic Resistance of targets hit by $calcValue(multiple,1002,1,0).$BRThis effect is increased by $H_S_GOOD10%$COLOR_END of your Magic Resistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move over to lock on to targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: One-Inch Punch
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSmash a <font color = '#66bbff'>nearby</font> target in front of you, <font color = '#66bbff'>staggering</font> the target.$BRGenerates a shock wave that has a high probability to <font color = '#66bbff'>knock down</font> enemies behind the target.$BR$BRYou deal more damage when the enemy's <font color = '#66bbff'>HP is low.</font>$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRUse after <font color = '#F9B600'>any skill</font> for faster activation.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Approach</font> and face a <font color = '#66bbff'>low HP</font> target and press the skill button. Use after <font color = '#F9B600'>other skills</font> with a long cooldown.

String.name: Twilight Waltz
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Groundbreaker)</font> - Stamp the ground, damaging nearby enemies and lifting them into the air. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Shining Crescent</font> on a successful hit.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Twilight Thrust)</font> - Press the skill button again to perform an empowered glaive thrust that staggers targets. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Shining Crescent</font>.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 3 (Twilight Spiral)</font> - Press the skill button again to perform multiple spinning glaive attacks.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 4 (Leaping Slash)</font> - Press the skill button a final time to leap to the air and slam your glaive on the ground, causing a massive explosion. Deals increased damage based on the number of Runemarks you hold.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRStages 1 and 2 each generate 3 Runemarks on a successful hit$BRStage 3 generates 2 or 3 Runemarks per hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to destroy enemies and generate Runemarks for a massive finishing move.

String.name: Chained Leash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a chain around a target within 15m and pull 4 additional enemies within 15m together into a tight group.$BRThe group is pulled to the initial target's location.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRUse after <font color = '#F9B600'>Challenging Shout</font> to throw a chain and pull all taunted targets within 15m toward you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRIf targeting other players, you can pull up to 5 enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to gather targets in one area.

String.name: Eviscerate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeals powerful damage and knocks the opponent up into the air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRKnocks players down, not up.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Overhand Strike</font>,<font color = '#F9B600'>Whirlwind</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Knockdown Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Stunning Backhand</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Startling Kick</font>, or a fourth consecutive hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse as part of a combo to knock enemies into the air.

String.name: Burst of Celerity
String.tooltip: Your Attack Speed increases by $value for $time.

String.name: Smoke Aggressor I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSacrifice 20% of your HP to summon a spirit for 20 seconds. The spirit retains your aggro level, and absorbs 50% of damage dealt by monsters, up to 15 times the HP you sacrificed.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRSpirit absorbs 20% of damage dealt by enemy players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to distract and defuse an enemy's attacks.

String.name: Twilight Waltz
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Groundbreaker)</font> - Stamp the ground, damaging nearby enemies and lifting them into the air. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Shining Crescent</font> on a successful hit.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Twilight Thrust)</font> - Press the skill button again to perform an empowered glaive thrust that staggers targets. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Shining Crescent</font>.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 3 (Twilight Spiral)</font> - Press the skill button again to perform multiple spinning glaive attacks.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 4 (Leaping Slash)</font> - Press the skill button a final time to leap to the air and slam your glaive on the ground, causing a massive explosion. Deals increased damage based on the number of Runemarks you hold.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRStages 1 and 2 each generate 3 Runemarks on a successful hit$BRStage 3 generates 2 or 3 Runemarks per hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to destroy enemies and generate Runemarks for a massive finishing move.

String.name: Chained Leash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a chain around a target within 15m and pull 4 additional enemies within 15m together into a tight group.$BRThe group is pulled to the initial target's location.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRUse after <font color = '#F9B600'>Challenging Shout</font> to throw a chain and pull all taunted targets within 15m toward you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRIf targeting other players, you can pull up to 5 enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to gather targets in one area.

String.name: Evasive Smash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effects]</font>$BRInterrupt a charge skill with a rolling dodge and then follow up with a rib-rattling uppercut attack.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRInterrupts charge skills such as <font color = '#F9B600'>Thunder Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Vampiric Blow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while moving away to avoid enemy attack.$BRAfter evading, face the target and press the skill button again to attack.$BRUsing a different charge skill after evasion is in action, the chain attack is canceled.

Deals increased damage based on the number of Runemarks you hold.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRStages 1 and 2 each generate 3 Runemarks on a successful hit$BRStage 3 generates 2 or 3 Runemarks per hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to destroy enemies and generate Runemarks for a massive finishing move.

String.name: Volley of Curses I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up to 4 targets within 27m to and inflict a curse that does $value damage every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BREffect can be <font color = '#66bbff'>stacked</font> up to 2 times. Damage is <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced</font> for player characters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font> $BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on to targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Chained Leash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow a chain around a target within 15m and pull 4 additional enemies within 15m together into a tight group.$BRThe group is pulled to the initial target's location.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRUse after <font color = '#F9B600'>Challenging Shout</font> to throw a chain and pull all taunted targets within 15m toward you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRIf targeting other players, you can pull up to 5 enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to gather targets in one area.

String.name: Chained Leash

String.name: Eviscerate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeals powerful damage and knocks the opponent up into the air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRKnocks players down, not up.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Overhand Strike</font>,<font color = '#F9B600'>Whirlwind</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Knockdown Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Stunning Backhand</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Startling Kick</font>, or a fourth consecutive hit of <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse as part of a combo to knock enemies into the air.

String.name: Snare II
String.tooltip:
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch an arrow at enemies up to $maxDistance away.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Press the skill button again</font> before it reaches the max distance to detonate the arrow early, <font color = '#66bbff'>decreasing</font> the <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> of nearby enemies for a short time.
<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRSlowing effect and duration is <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTime the detonation to incapacitate a group of enemies.

String.name: Smoke Aggressor II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSacrifice 20% of your HP to summon a spirit for 20 seconds. The spirit retains your aggro level, and absorbs 50% of damage dealt by monsters, up to 15 times the HP you sacrificed.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRSpirit absorbs 20% of damage dealt by enemy players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to distract and defuse an enemy's attacks.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up to 4 targets within 27m to and inflict a curse that does $value damage every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BREffect can be <font color = '#66bbff'>stacked</font> up to 2 times. Damage is <font color = '#66bbff'>reduced</font> for player characters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font> $BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on to targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Twilight Waltz
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Groundbreaker)</font> - Stamp the ground, damaging nearby enemies and lifting them into the air. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Shining Crescent</font> on a successful hit.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Twilight Thrust)</font> - Press the skill button again to perform an empowered glaive thrust that staggers targets. Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Shining Crescent</font>.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 3 (Twilight Spiral)</font> - Press the skill button again to perform multiple spinning glaive attacks.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 4 (Leaping Slash)</font> - Press the skill button a final time to leap to the air and slam your glaive on the ground, causing a massive explosion. Deals increased damage based on the number of Runemarks you hold.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Runemark]</font>$BRStages 1 and 2 each generate 3 Runemarks on a successful hit$BRStage 3 generates 2 or 3 Runemarks per hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to destroy enemies and generate Runemarks for a massive finishing move.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Groundbreaker)</font> - Stamp the ground, damaging nearby enemies and lifting them into the air. String.name: Incendiary Trap Arrow I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch a trap 15m in front of you. The trap lasts for 10 seconds or until triggered. Deals damage to the target and nearby enemies when triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A1FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage a group of enemies.

String.name: Raze I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Rage Skill</font>$BRSlash and knock down monsters around you while moving forward.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>Activates faster following <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Thunder Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Axe Counter</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Punishing Strike</font>.$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, you gain additional aggro.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while facing a target. Use after other skills for better effect.

String.name: Thrall of Protection I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Protection that follows the summoner and uses melee attacks to <font color = '#66bbff'>draw aggro</font> from monsters. Lasts 10 minutes or until death.$BR$BRThralls gain stat boosts based on the gear their summoner is wearing. If no attack order is given, thralls will attack enemies that the summoner attacks or who attack the summoner.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Life</font> will cancel Thrall of Protection. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>draw aggro</font> from monsters.

String.name: Dempsey Roll (Slow)
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRQuickly punch targets from left to right.$BRAttack Speed and Attack Power increase with every hit, <font color = '#66bbff'>stunning and pulling</font> the targets.$BRLast successful uppercut knocks the targets <font color = '#66bbff'>up into the air.</font>$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRThe skill can be used during<font color = '#F9B600'>any attack skill</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRMove into several targets and press the skill button.$BRYou can change the attack direction while the skill is active.$BRPress the skill button after an attack skill with a long cooldown.

String.name: Godsfall
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Valkyrie's Cry)</font> - Swing your glaive in a devastating double circle, damaging all nearby enemies. Triggers Inspiring Shout, which grants the following bonuses while active:$BR - Increases Power by 60$BR - Increases Attack Speed by 25$BR - Increases Attack Range by 20%$BR -Eliminates the active cooldowns of skills with a cooldown of 60 seconds or less (<font color = '#F9B600'>Evasive Roll</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Bloodflower</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Overhead Slash</font> are not affected).$BR - Reduces the cooldown of skills that have a cooldown of 60 seconds or less by 70%$BR - Increased damage of <font color = '#F9B600'>Twilight Waltz</font> by 20%$BRPower increases based on your Magic Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Calamity Thrust)</font> - Leap back from your position and charge towards the ground, causing a severe explosion. Eliminates cooldown of Twilight Waltz</font> on skill use.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using Shining Crescent, Gungnir's Bite, or the last hit of Twilight Waltz.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]$BRUse when your Ragnarok meter is full. Press the skill button again within 20 seconds to attack the target.

String.name: Wallop I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump forward and hammer the ground with your shield to inflict damage.$BRBlocks attacks from the front.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Spring Attack</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Counter</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Charging Lunge</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Lockdown Blow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a melee target.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Ultimate Overhand Strike I
String.tooltip: Even stronger Overhand Strike.

String.name: Time Gyre I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBriefly <font color = '#66bbff'>immobilize</font> up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRPrevents other players from using evasion and movement skills.$BRKnockdown or an attack on a target <font color = '#66bbff'>ends</font> the effect.$BR$BRUsing this skill on a target cursed by <font color = '#f9b600'>Nerve Exhaustion</font> removes the effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Command: Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAim at a target within $maxDistance and press the skill button to command your Smoke Aggressor to attack that target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRSend your Smoke Aggressor to distract your target.

String.name: Godsfall
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Valkyrie's Cry)</font> - Swing your glaive in a devastating double circle, damaging all nearby enemies. Triggers Inspiring Shout, which grants the following bonuses while active:$BR - Increases Power by 60$BR - Increases Attack Speed by 25$BR - Increases Attack Range by 20%$BR -Eliminates the active cooldowns of skills with a cooldown of 60 seconds or less (<font color = '#F9B600'>Evasive Roll</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Bloodflower</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Overhead Slash</font> are not affected).$BR - Reduces the cooldown of skills that have a cooldown of 60 seconds or less by 70%$BR - Increased damage of <font color = '#F9B600'>Twilight Waltz</font> by 20%$BRPower increases based on your Magic Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Calamity Thrust)</font> - Leap back from your position and charge towards the ground, causing a severe explosion. Eliminates cooldown of Twilight Waltz</font> on skill use.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using Shining Crescent, Gungnir's Bite, or the last hit of Twilight Waltz.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]$BRUse when your Ragnarok meter is full. Press the skill button again within 20 seconds to attack the target.

String.name: Godsfall
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Valkyrie's Cry)</font> - Swing your glaive in a devastating double circle, damaging all nearby enemies. Triggers Inspiring Shout, which grants the following bonuses while active:$BR - Increases Power by 60$BR - Increases Attack Speed by 25$BR - Increases Attack Range by 20%$BR -Eliminates the active cooldowns of skills with a cooldown of 60 seconds or less (<font color = '#F9B600'>Evasive Roll</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Bloodflower</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Overhead Slash</font> are not affected).$BR - Reduces the cooldown of skills that have a cooldown of 60 seconds or less by 70%$BR - Increased damage of <font color = '#F9B600'>Twilight Waltz</font> by 20%$BRPower increases based on your Magic Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Calamity Thrust)</font> - Leap back from your position and charge towards the ground, causing a severe explosion. Eliminates cooldown of Twilight Waltz</font> on skill use.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using Shining Crescent, Gungnir's Bite, or the last hit of Twilight Waltz.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]$BRUse when your Ragnarok meter is full. Press the skill button again within 20 seconds to attack the target.

Press the skill button again within 20 seconds to attack the target.

String.name: Time Gyre I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBriefly <font color = '#66bbff'>immobilize</font> up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRPrevents other players from using evasion and movement skills.$BRKnockdown or an attack on a target <font color = '#66bbff'>ends</font> the effect.$BR$BRUsing this skill on a target cursed by <font color = '#f9b600'>Nerve Exhaustion</font> removes the effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over targets to lock on, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Wallop I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump forward and hammer the ground with your shield to inflict damage.$BRBlocks attacks from the front.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Spring Attack</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Counter</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Charging Lunge</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Lockdown Blow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a melee target.

String.name: Ultimate Overhand Strike I
String.tooltip: Even stronger Overhand Strike.

String.name: Incendiary Trap Arrow II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch a trap 15m in front of you. The trap lasts for 10 seconds or until triggered. Deals damage to the target and nearby enemies when triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A1FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage a group of enemies.

String.name: Raze II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Rage Skill</font>$BRSlash and knock down monsters around you while moving forward.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>Activates faster following <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Thunder Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Axe Counter</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Punishing Strike</font>.$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, you gain additional aggro.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while facing a target. Use after other skills for better effect.

String.name: Thrall of Protection II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Protection that follows the summoner and uses melee attacks to <font color = '#66bbff'>draw aggro</font> from monsters. Lasts 10 minutes or until death.$BR$BRThralls gain stat boosts based on the gear their summoner is wearing. If there is no attack order given, thralls will attack enemies that the summoner attacks or who attack the summoner.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Life</font> will cancel Thrall of Protection. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>draw aggro</font> from monsters.

String.name: Wallop II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump forward and hammer the ground with your shield to inflict damage.$BRBlocks attacks from the front.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Spring Attack</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Counter</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Charging Lunge</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Lockdown Blow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a melee target.

String.name: Retaliate II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump forward and hammer the ground with your shield to inflict damage.$BRBlocks attacks from the front.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Spring Attack</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Counter</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Charging Lunge</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Lockdown Blow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a melee target.

String.name: Retaliate V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Leap to your feet</font> while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stuns</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down</font>.

String.name: Wallop V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump forward and hammer the ground with your shield to inflict damage.$BRBlocks attacks from the front.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Barrage</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Spring Attack</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Debilitate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Shield Counter</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Charging Lunge</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Lockdown Blow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a melee target.

String.name: Incendiary Trap Arrow VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLaunch a trap 15m in front of you. The trap lasts for 10 seconds or until triggered. Deals damage to the target and nearby enemies when triggered.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A1FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage a group of enemies.

String.name: Raze VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Rage Skill</font>$BRSlash and knock down monsters around you while moving forward.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>Activates faster following <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Thunder Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Axe Counter</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Punishing Strike</font>.$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active, you gain additional aggro.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while facing a target. Use after other skills for better effect.

String.name: Thrall of Protection VI
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Protection that follows the summoner and uses melee attacks to <font color = '#66bbff'>draw aggro</font> from monsters. If there is no attack order given, thralls will attack enemies that the summoner attacks or who attack the summoner.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Life</font> will cancel Thrall of Protection. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>draw aggro</font> from monsters.

String.name: Tackle
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSpin your axe to hurl a bolt that knocks down an enemy up to 18m away.$BRConsumes 1% of your Max. HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRTarget an enemy and press the skill button.

String.name: Rhythmic Blows
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRQuickly blow left and right punches to your nearby targets.$BRIncreases Attack Speed and Power by <font color = '#66bbff'>30%</font>. Targets are <font color = '#66bbff'>staggered</font> and <font color = '#66bbff'>pulled</font> toward you.$BRLast punch knocks the target <font color = '#66bbff'>up into the air.</font>$BR$BREach successful hit reduces <font color = '#66bbff'>cooldown time</font> of <font color = '#F9B600'>all attack skills</font> by 1 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used if you cancel the movements of all <font color = '#F9B600'>attack skills</font>. If the first two hits of <font color = '#F9B600'>Growing Fury</font> are successful, the target suffers <font color = '#66bbff'>internal injuries</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRLeap into the enemy horde to use the skill. You can change the direction of attack while attacking.$BRUse after <font color = '#F9B600'>other skills</font> that have a long cooldown.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRQuickly leap out of harm's way.$BR -<font color = '#66bbff'>Invincible</font> while moving.$BR -You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to dodge in the current movement direction or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.$BRUse to avoid attacks that cannot be blocked with <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font>.

String.name: Fiery Escape I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRA burst of energy under your feet damages targets in front of you and <font color = '#66bbff'>propels you</font> away.$BRDecreases <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> of enemies by $value for 8 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse direction buttons to move in a specific direction, or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.

String.name: Punishing Blow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLeap into the air and slam your greatsword into the ground, with a high chance of knocking down nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Overhand Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Eviscerate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Savage Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Measured Slice</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing a melee target.

String.name: Teleport Jaunt
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Teleport</font> 12m to the direction the camera faces.$BRYou are <font color = '#66bbff'>invincible</font> while teleporting and can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to escape or move quickly.

String.name: Command: Follow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCommand your Smoke Aggressor to follow you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to bring your Smoke Aggressor closer to you.

String.name: Punishing Blow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLeap into the air and slam your greatsword into the ground, with a high chance of knocking down nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Overhand Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Eviscerate</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Savage Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Measured Slice</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while facing a nearby target when you want to close to melee range.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRA burst of energy under your feet damages targets in front of you and <font color = '#66bbff'>propels you</font> away.$BRDecreases <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> of enemies by $value for 8 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse direction buttons to move in a specific direction, or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.

String.name: Unbreakable
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Unleashed Skill$BRFueled by rage, your HP won't go below 1 for $time.$BRYou can still die if you receive a single blow that exceeds your max HP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are low on HP.

String.name: Thrall of Life I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Life that <font color = '#66bbff'>heals</font> and periodically <font color = '#66bbff'>removes harmful effects</font> on you and your group members. Lasts 10 seconds.$BR$BRThralls gain stat boosts based on the gear their summoner is wearing.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Protection</font> will cancel <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Life</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>heal</font> and <font color = '#66bbff'>remove harmful effects</font> on your group members.

String.name: One-inch Punch range check
String.tooltip: Used to check One-inch Punch range.

String.name: Rallying Cry
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDraws aggro while you and up to 10 allies within 10m become immune to knockdown and stagger for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when your group members are in peril.

String.name: Final Reprisal I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRelease energy from your staff to damage enemies within $maxDistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#f9b600'>Metamorphic Blast</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Shocking Implosion</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Triple Nemesis</font>, or <font color = '#f9b600'>Zenobia's Vortex</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage foes in your face.

String.name: Savage Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSlash through enemies in front of you. Afterwards, <font color = '#F9B600'>any attack skill</font> used on monsters will count as an <font color = '#F66bbff'>attack from behind</font> for 5 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill take advantage over your enemy. $BRUse the arrow keys to aim your attack.

String.name: Hail Storm I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummon an icy storm 12m in front of you for 6 seconds, damaging all targets in a 6m radius.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Decreases</font> the <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> of targets by $value per hit. Effect <font color = '#66bbff'>stacks</font> up to four times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when enemies are at medium range.

String.name: Hail Storm I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummon an icy storm 12m in front of you for 6 seconds, damaging all targets in a 6m radius.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> of targets are <font color = '#66bbff'>decreased</font> by $value per hit. Effect <font color = '#66bbff'>stacks</font> up to four times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when enemies are at medium range.

String.name: Eagle's Eye I
String.tooltip: Increase Power by 30, Attack Speed by 4 and Endurance by 4. Increases damage to monsters by 10%. Cannot be used in conjunction with Sniper's Eye.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to boost your stats.

String.name: Intimidation
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BREnhances <font color = '#F9B600'>Rage skills</font>.$BRAttack skills have increased aggro gain, and you continuously gain aggro from monsters within 8m.$BRGrants MP replenishment. You are immune to push-back from monsters, except for certain special attacks.$BRReduces Crit Factor and PvP Attack by 18.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRDecreases cooldowns for <font color = '#F9B600'>Raze</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Flatten</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Fiery Rage</font>, but disables <font color = '#F9B600'>Cyclone</font> while active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to gain aggro from monsters.

String.name: Sonorous Dreams I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up a target within $maxDistance and put the target briefly to <font color = '#66bbff'>sleep</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on a target, then press the skill button again or left-click to cast on your target.

String.name: Super Leap
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump over targets ahead of you and soar high into the sky. As you land, you bash your shield onto the ground, dealing tremendous damage to targets within 8m. Reduces <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed and Movement Speed</font> of the targets by 15% and knocks targets hit into the air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Charging Lunge</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Wallop</font>, which adds <font color = '#66bbff'>frontal defense</font> effect, and you do not jump over the enemy. Cannot <font color = '#66bbff'>pass through</font> monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to jump to the aid of allies surrounded by foes.

String.name: Mana Charge
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRReplenish up to 45% MP to you and group members. Hold the skill button longer to replenish more MP. You can move while charging up the skill.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when group member are low on MP.

String.name: Unsheathe
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRCharge up your greatsword for a devastating spin attack. The longer you hold the skill button, the larger your greatsword becomes, and greater the damage you'll deal.$BRCharges to three levels. Overcharging increases damage even more, but also deals damage to you. Your Movement Speed is reduced while charging.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Civil Unrest]</font>$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Unsheathe</font> cannot be used in the Civil Unrest area.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCharges faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Savage Strike</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when surrounded by enemies.

String.name: Stone Skin
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BREncases your body in stone for 5 seconds, <font color = '#66bbff'>protecting you from all attacks</font> and <font color = '#66bbff'>dropping all aggro</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPressing the skill button a second time cancels the effect.

String.name: Traverse Cut I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMakes 3 quick lunges to the front. Increases your <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed</font> by 0.9% per each successful hit, and the effect stacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster and attacks up to 13 times if you first use <font color = '#F9B600'>Combative Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Poison Blade</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your Attack Speed.

String.name: Super Leap
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRJump over targets ahead of you and soar high into the sky. As you land, you bash your shield onto the ground, dealing tremendous damage to targets within 8m. Reduces <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed and Movement Speed</font> of the targets by 15% and knocks targets hit into the air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after <font color = '#F9B600'>Charging Lunge</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Wallop</font>, which adds <font color = '#66bbff'>frontal defense</font> effect, and you do not jump over the enemy. Cannot <font color = '#66bbff'>pass through</font> monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to jump to the aid of allies surrounded by foes.

String.name: Sonorous Dreams I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up a target within $maxDistance and put the target briefly to <font color = '#66bbff'>sleep</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on a target, then press the skill button again or left-click to cast on your target.

String.name: Traverse Cut I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMakes 3 quick lunges to the front. Increases your <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed</font> by 0.9% per each successful hit, and the effect stacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster and attacks up to 13 times if you first use <font color = '#F9B600'>Combative Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Poison Blade</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your Attack Speed.

String.name: Eagle's Eye II
String.tooltip: Increase Power by 30, Attack Speed by 8 and Endurance by 8. Increases damage to monsters by 10%. Cannot be used in conjunction with Sniper's Eye.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to boost your stats.

String.name: Sonorous Dreams II

String.name: Divine Charge
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill, Healing Skill$BRRestores $H_S_GOOD3870$COLOR_END of maximum MP and increases effectiveness of you and group members within 14m. Hold and charge the skill button longer (up to 4 pulses) for more effect. You can move at an accelerated speed while charging.$BREach pulse of the charge <font color = '#66bbff'>heals HP</font> of nearby group members up to $calcValue(heal,0,3800,0) and increases the <font color = '#66bbff'>Divine Charge</font> effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Divine Charge I</font>: Increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Power</font> by 12 and <font color = '#66bbff'>Crit Power</font> by 0.14%.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Divine Charge II</font>: Increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Power</font> by 13 and <font color = '#66bbff'>Crit Power</font> by 0.16%.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Divine Charge III</font>: Increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Power</font> by 14 and <font color = '#66bbff'>Crit Power</font> by 0.18%.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Divine Charge IV</font>: Increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Power</font> by 15 and <font color = '#66bbff'>Crit Power</font> by 20%.$BR$BR - Divine Charge IV effect is increased based on your Magic Resistance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when group members are focused on opponents.

String.name: Evasive Roll
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDodge your enemy's attack.$BR - Invincible while moving$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to escape or move quickly.

String.name: Regression I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>End all beneficial effects</font> on <font color = '#66bbff'>enemy</font> targets within a $maxDistance radius of you.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>remove</font> buffs on <font color = '#66bbff'>enemy</font> targets.

String.name: Guardian Barrier
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummons a retribution shield to reflect enemy attacks and push back nearby foes.$BRThe barrier is destroyed when it receives <font color = '#66bbff'>damage that exceeds its limit</font>.$BR$BRIf the barrier blocks an attack that cannot be defended by <font color = '#66bbff'>Stand Fast</font>, the barrier is destroyed and cooldown increases by <font color = '#66bbff'>3 times</font>.$BRWhen you use your barrier to block a skill that cannot normally be defended or evaded, and the barrier is destroyed, cooldown increases by <font color = '#66bbff'>10 times</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used while <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font> is active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to protect you and allies behind you from enemy attacks. Hold down the skill button to maintain the barrier. You can move while the barrier is active.

String.name: Triple Nemesis I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow energy pulses at a target up to $maxDistance away.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Holding or repeatedly pressing</font> the skill button generates up to three pulses.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage 1 to 3 distant enemies.

The shock will cause damage and <font color = '#66bbff'>knock enemies back</font>.$BRIt <font color = '#66bbff'>cannot knock back</font> bosses or elite monsters.</font>$BR$BR<font color = '#00A4FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate an enemy.

String.name: Triple Nemesis V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow energy pulses at a target up to $maxDistance away.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Holding or repeatedly pressing</font> the skill button generates up to three pulses.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRReduced damage at max distance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to damage 1 to 3 distant enemies.

String.name: Blade Draw V
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRStab and slash your target as you draw your weapon from the wound.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Traverse Cut</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Vortex Slash</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Charging Slash</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Rising Fury</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cross Parry</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse as part of quick combo chains.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRStab and slash your target as you draw your weapon from the wound.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Traverse Cut</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Vortex Slash</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Charging Slash</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Rising Fury</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Cross Parry</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse as part of quick combo chains.

String.name: Triple Nemesis IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'></font>[Effect]$BRThrow a rage-filled energy pulse at a target within $maxDistance. $BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Holding or repeatedly pressing</font> the skill button generates up to three pulses.$BRReduced damage to <font color = '#66bbff'>players</font> that are farther away.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font>$BRDecreases Physical and Magic Resistance of targets hit by $calcValue(multiple,1004,0.1,3).$BRThe reduced value is $H_S_GOOD10%$COLOR_END of your Magic Resistance. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRHold or repeatedly press the skill button to stack pulses up to three times.

String.name: Axe Counter
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Rage Skill$BRDeliver a crushing counterattack after a successful Axe Block. Increases resistance to knockdown and stagger, and any damage taken while attacking is reduced by 50%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan only be used while <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a target.

String.name: Curse of Exhaustion I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRCurse up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance with 20% increased <font color = '#66bbff'>cooldown times</font> for all skills they use in the next 6 seconds. Effective only on other <font color = '#66bbff'>players</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again to curse all targets.

String.name: Divine Protection
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDivine Protection gives you and your allies within 20m protection against $value$calcValue(multiple,1003,1,0) damage for 5 seconds, and increases Movement Speed while in combat. The shield effect increases by $H_S_GOOD100%$COLOR_END of Physical Resistance. When the damage taken exceeds the max. protection value, all of the damage is absorbed and the shield disappears. This effect can only be used once. ([Skill Usage]Use when group members are in danger. (While active, you are immune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown, stagger, and stun</font>.) You become invincible while casting.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when group members are in danger.

String.name: Plague of Exhaustion I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and call a plague that immediately <font color = '#66bbff'>removes all beneficial effects</font> and inflicts $value damage every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Against other players</font>, the damage decreases, but their <font color = '#66bbff'>cooldown time</font> increases by 50% for <font color = '#66bbff'>melee attack skills</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move reticule to lock on targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to plague all targets.

String.name: Rotation Combo
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> - Combo Attack</font>$BRYou put on Dragon Armor you created from a build-up of energy and cause an explosion.$BRWhen fully charged, you strike the ground in front of you and can use Rotation Combo twice. On a full charge, you obtain the <font color = '#66bbff'>Rotation Strike</font> effect that increases the attack power of Rotation Combo by 15% for 10 sec.$BRYour opponent is knocked down on the third Rotation Combo hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if you use <font color = '#F9B600'>Rotation Combo or Savage Strike</font> first.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace your opponent and press the skill button.

String.name: Nova I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCreate an explosion 7m in front of you, which deals massive damage to enemies within 6m and has a chance of knockdown.$BRYou <font color = '#66bbff'>take only half damage</font> while using this skill, and have a greatly increased <font color = '#66bbff'>resistance to knockdown and stagger</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while enemies are in front of you.

String.name: Scythe I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Exploits Edge$BRDeliver a deadly sweeping arc, attacking multiple enemies.$BRScythe exploits <font color = '#66bbff'>Edge</font> generated by warrior skills to do more damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Rain of Blows</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Poison Blade</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Draw</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Evasive Roll</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you have a full stack of Edge on a target.

String.name: Curse of Exhaustion I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRCurse up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance with 20% increased <font color = '#66bbff'>cooldown times</font> for all skills they use in the next 6 seconds. Effective only on other <font color = '#66bbff'>players</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again to curse all targets.
