String.name: Curse of Exhaustion II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRCurse up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance with 20% increased <font color = '#66bbff'>cooldown times</font> for all skills they use in the next 8 seconds. Effective only on other <font color = '#66bbff'>players</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again to curse all targets.

String.name: Curse of Exhaustion III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRCurse up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance with 20% increased <font color = '#66bbff'>cooldown times</font> for all skills they use in the next 10 seconds. Effective only on other <font color = '#66bbff'>players</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again to curse all targets.

String.name: Plague of Exhaustion III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and call a plague that immediately <font color = '#66bbff'>removes all beneficial effects</font> and inflicts $value damage every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Against other players</font>, the damage decreases, but their <font color = '#66bbff'>cooldown time</font> increases by 50% for <font color = '#66bbff'>melee attack skills</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move reticule to lock on targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to plague all targets.

String.name: Nova III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCreate an explosion 7m in front of you, which deals massive damage to enemies within 6m and has a chance of knockdown.$BRYou <font color = '#66bbff'>take only half damage</font> while using this skill, and have a greatly increased <font color = '#66bbff'>resistance to knockdown and stagger</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while enemies are in front of you.

String.name: Scythe III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Exploits Edge$BRDeliver a deadly sweeping arc, attacking multiple enemies.$BRScythe exploits <font color = '#66bbff'>Edge</font> generated by warrior skills to do more damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Rain of Blows</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Poison Blade</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Draw</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Evasive Roll</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you have a full stack of Edge on a target.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and call a plague that immediately <font color = '#66bbff'>removes all beneficial effects</font> and inflicts $value damage every $tickInterval for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Against other players</font>, the damage decreases, but their <font color = '#66bbff'>cooldown time</font> increases by 50% for <font color = '#66bbff'>melee attack skills</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move reticule to lock on targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to plague all targets.

String.name: Nova IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Arcane Attack</font>$BRSpend $H_S_GOOD8%$COLOR_END of your Maximum MP to create an explosion 7m in front of you, which deals massive damage to enemies within 6m and has a chance of knockdown.$BRYou <font color = '#66bbff'>take only half damage</font> while using this skill, and have a greatly increased <font color = '#66bbff'>resistance to knockdown and stagger</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while enemies are in front of you.

String.name: Scythe IX
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Exploits Edge$BRDeliver a deadly sweeping arc, attacking multiple enemies.$BRScythe exploits <font color = '#66bbff'>Edge</font> generated by warrior skills to do more damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Rain of Blows</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Poison Blade</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Draw</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Evasive Roll</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Strike</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you have a full stack of Edge on a target.

String.name: Tenacity
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCall on inner reserves to instantly replenish $mpDiff <font color = '#66bbff'>MP</font>. Greatly increases <font color = '#66bbff'>resistance to stun</font> for 3 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you are low on MP.

String.name: Overwhelm I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge up to 18m and attack your enemy. Attack has a high chance of knockdown against monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace the target, then press the skill button.

String.name: Curse of Confusion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCurse up to $maxCount foes within $maxDistance so they <font color = '#66bbff'>tremble and flee</font> briefly.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Knockdown</font> cancels the effect on monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BREffect is canceled if <font color = '#66bbff'>attacked</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again to curse all targets.

String.name: Guardian Sanctuary I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Enhance Skill$BRReduces <font color = '#66bbff'>ranged damage</font> taken by $value2, while increasing <font color = '#66bbff'>weakening and DOT resistances</font> by $value and greatly increasing <font color = '#66bbff'>stun resistance</font> for $time. Also, resets the cooldown of <font color = '#f9b600'>Backstep</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to protect yourself from <font color = '#66bbff'>special</font> attacks.

String.name: Jump Smash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> - Combo Attack</font>$BRYou put on Dragon Armor you created from a build-up of energy and cause an explosion.$BRWhen fully charged, you knock the opponent in front of you into the air and perform a jump attack. Your strike is faster and harder on a full charge.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Warp Barrier
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Cancels all damage</font> for 1 second, and <font color = '#66bbff'>recovers 5% of your Max. MP</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRThe Attack Speed of <font color = '#f9b600'>Mana Boost II</font> does not apply while Warp Barrier is active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to protect yourself and replenish MP.

String.name: Reaping Slash I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRLeap forward and chop with both blades.$BRMonsters are briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stunned</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Knocks down</font> enemy players.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster if used after <font color = '#F9B600'>Combative Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Rain of Blows</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to temporarily disable an enemy.

String.name: Curse of Confusion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCurse up to $maxCount foes within $maxDistance so they <font color = '#66bbff'>tremble and flee</font> briefly.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Knockdown</font> cancels the effect on monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BREffect is canceled if <font color = '#66bbff'>attacked</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again to curse all targets.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge up to 18m and attack your enemy. Attack has a high chance of knockdown against monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace the target, then press the skill button.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge up to 18m and attack your enemy. Attack has a high chance of knockdown against monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace the target, then press the skill button.

String.name: Overwhelm X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCharge up to 18m and attack your enemy. Attack has a high chance of knockdown against monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRFace the target, then press the skill button.

String.name: Find Weakness I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRGrants additional effects based on your choice of target, and modifies other skills. While active, all your attacks <font color = '#66bbff'>against monsters</font></font> are considered <font color = '#66bbff'>back attacks</font>, regardless of your relative position. Effect ends when skill is used again.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Velik's Mark</font>: Damage to <font color = '#66bbff'>players</font> within $maxDistance is increased by 10%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to maximize your damage against specific targets.

String.name: Punishing Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Rage Skill$BRPerform a quick strike that generates high aggro. Press the skill button again to dash forward and attack a second time, decreasing the target's Endurance.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan only be used while <font color = '#F9B600'>Intimidation</font> is active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Mire I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and briefly decrease their <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by $value, but increase their <font color = '#66bbff'>Balance Factor</font> by $value2.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Effect ends</font> when the target <font color = '#66bbff'>suffers</font> significant damage or <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on the targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to slow all targets.

String.name: Divine Prayer I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRReduce <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font> and instantly <font color = '#66bbff'>recover</font> $calcValue(heal,0,3408,0) HP and $calcValue(heal,0,681,0) of your total HP every second for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when low on HP or in a group, when you have unwanted attention from monsters.

String.name: Cross Parry
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRBlock frontal attacks with your crossed swords. Damage blocked depends on your weapon's stats. A successful block also reduces damage for allies behind you.$BRHold down the skill button to continue blocking. A well-timed block triggers <font color = '#66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font> effect.$BR<font color = '#F66bbff'>Perfect Defense</font> applies <font color = '#2478FF'>Perseverance</font> and increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Edge</font> by 1. Reduces cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Scythe</font> by 0.5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRRequires <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance. </font> Continually blocking consumes RE.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while tanking.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Perseverance]</font>$BRReplenishes 5% of your maximum MP.

String.name: Mire I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and briefly decrease their <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by $value, but increase their <font color = '#66bbff'>Balance Factor</font> by $value2.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Effect ends</font> when the target <font color = '#66bbff'>suffers</font> significant damage or <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on the targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to slow all targets.

String.name: Find Weakness II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRGrants additional effects based on your choice of target, and modifies other skills. While active, all your attacks <font color = '#66bbff'>against monsters</font></font> are considered <font color = '#66bbff'>back attacks</font>, regardless of your relative position. Effect ends when skill is used again.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Velik's Mark</font>: Damage to <font color = '#66bbff'>players</font> within $maxDistance is increased by 10%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to maximize your damage against specific targets.

String.name: Mire II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and briefly decrease their <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by $value, but increase their <font color = '#66bbff'>Balance Factor</font> by $value2.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Effect ends</font> when the target <font color = '#66bbff'>suffers</font> significant damage or <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on the targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to slow all targets.

String.name: Divine Prayer II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRReduce <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font> and instantly <font color = '#66bbff'>recover</font> $calcValue(heal,0,4260,0) HP and $calcValue(heal,0,852,0) of your total HP every second for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when low on HP or in a group, when you have unwanted attention from monsters.

String.name: Mire II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance and briefly decrease their <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed</font> by $value, but increase their <font color = '#66bbff'>Balance Factor</font> by $value2.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Effect ends</font> when the target <font color = '#66bbff'>suffers</font> significant damage or <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and mouse over to lock on the targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to slow all targets.

String.name: Find Weakness III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou target your opponent's weak point. Grants additional effects based on your <font color = '#66bbff'>choice of target</font>, and modifies other skills.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'></font>While active, <font color = '#f9b600'>all your attacks</font> against <font color = '#66bbff'>monsters</font> are considered <font color = '#66bbff'>back attacks</font>, regardless of your relative position. Effect ends when skill is used again.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Velik's Mark</font>: Damage to <font color = '#66bbff'>players</font> within $maxDistance is <font color = '#66bbff'>increased</font> by 10%.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Weakness Exposed</font>: You reveal the weak spots of targeted <font color = '#66bbff'>monsters</font> within $maxDistance. If you attack them using <font color = '#f9b600'>special skills</font>, your attacks will be <font color = '#66bbff'>treated as back attacks</font>, <font color = '#66bbff'>increasing</font> damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRAiming at a specific target with <font color = '#f9b600'>Radiant Arrow, Penetrating Arrow, or Thunderbolt</font> triggers <font color = '#66bbff'>Weakness Exposed</font>.$BR$BRThe effect of <font color = '#66bbff'>Find Weakness</font> is superceded by that of <font color = '#66bbff'>Weakness Exposed</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to maximize your damage against specific targets.

String.name: Find Weakness III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou target your opponent's weak point. Grants additional effects based on your <font color = '#66bbff'>choice of target</font>, and modifies other skills.$BR$BR<font color = '#66bbff'></font>While active, <font color = '#f9b600'>all your attacks</font> against <font color = '#66bbff'>monsters</font> are considered <font color = '#66bbff'>back attacks</font>, regardless of your relative position. Effect ends when skill is used again.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Velik's Mark</font>: Damage to <font color = '#66bbff'>players</font> within $maxDistance is <font color = '#66bbff'>increased</font> by 10%.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Weakness Exposed</font>: You reveal the weak spots of targeted <font color = '#66bbff'>monsters</font> within $maxDistance. If you attack them using <font color = '#f9b600'>special skills</font>, your attacks will be <font color = '#66bbff'>treated as back attacks</font>, <font color = '#66bbff'>increasing</font> damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRAiming at a specific target with <font color = '#f9b600'>Radiant Arrow, Penetrating Arrow, or Thunderbolt</font> triggers <font color = '#66bbff'>Weakness Exposed</font>.$BR$BRThe effect of <font color = '#66bbff'>Find Weakness</font> is superceded by that of <font color = '#66bbff'>Weakness Exposed</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to maximize your damage against specific targets.

String.name: Chase I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Charge </font> a short distance in the direction of movement. You will stop running if you encounter an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to close the distance between you and your target.

String.name: Unleash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRActivates all <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed skills</font>.$BRSacrifice HP to unleash your fury for 18 seconds. You can only use Unleashed skills. All attacks are counted as attacks from behind. You are immune to knockdown and stuns, and HP will not go below 1.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>After the effect, you receive all the damage at once.</font>$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to activate Apex skills.

String.name: Thrall of Vengeance I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Vengeance that deals <font color = '#66bbff'>ranged attacks</font> to your enemies for 60 seconds.$BR$BRThralls gain stat boosts based on the gear their summoner is wearing.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Wrath</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall Lord</font> will cancel <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Vengeance</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you need to <font color = '#66bbff'>attack enemies at range</font>.

String.name: Ishara's Lullaby I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on a target within $maxDistance and put it briefly to <font color = '#66bbff'>sleep</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move the reticule over to lock on a target, then press the skill button again or left-click to cast at your target.

String.name: Smoke Flanker I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAfter a <font color = '#66bbff'>successful block</font>, summon a shadow to your position, teleport behind your enemy, and attack it.$BRBriefly <font color = '#66bbff'>stuns</font> your target. Aggro transfers to your shadow upon summoning.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRRequires <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance,</font> and a successful <font color = '#F9B600'>Cross Parry</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while tanking.

String.name: Thrall of Vengeance II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Vengeance that deals <font color = '#66bbff'>ranged attacks</font> to your enemies for 60 seconds.$BR$BRThralls gain stat boosts based on the gear their summoner is wearing.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Wrath</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall Lord</font> will cancel <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Vengeance</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you need to <font color = '#66bbff'>attack enemies at range</font>.

String.name: Thrall of Vengeance XV
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Vengeance that deals <font color = '#66bbff'>ranged attacks</font> to your enemies for 60 seconds.$BR$BRThralls gain stat boosts based on the gear their summoner is wearing.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Wrath</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall Lord</font> will cancel <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Vengeance</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you need to <font color = '#66bbff'>attack enemies at range</font>.

String.name: Wind Walk I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Focus Generation$BRCharge forward up to 24m and attack a target.$BR$BRGrants the <font color = '#66bbff'>Howling String</font> effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used to interrupt the animations of <font color = '#f9b600'>all skills</font>. <font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> the skill damage of <font color = '#f9b600'>[Radiant Arrow]</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>[Penetrating Arrow]</font>, and [Thunderbolt]</font> by 10% when Howling String is active.$BREffect based on your Physical Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>Use to close the distance between you and your target.

String.name: Unleashed: Dexter
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect] </font><font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed Skill</font>$BRSmack the target with the axe in your right hand. Recovers $H_S_GOOD2%$COLOR_END of your Maximum HP on every successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggers <font color = '#F66bbff'>Unleashed: Enhancement</font>. <font color = '#F66bbff'>Unleashed: Enhancement</font> increases your Attack Speed</font>, and the skill damage of <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Dexter</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Sinister</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Rampage</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleash is active, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Thrall of Wrath I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Wrath that follows the summoner and will attack randomly with its three powerful area attacks for 20 seconds.$BR$BRThralls gain stat boosts based on the gear their summoner is wearing.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Vengeance</font> will cancel <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Wrath</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you need to <font color = '#66bbff'>attack multiple enemies</font>.

String.name: Restorative Burst I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRCreate a burst of healing 10 meters in front of you. Group members will heal $calcValue(heal,0,575,0) HP every second for 5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when nearby allies are low on HP.

String.name: Mana Boost I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Enhance Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> Attack Speed by 20% for 15 seconds, and skill damage by 10% when attacking monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to boost your stats for a short period.

String.name: Binding Sword
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrow one of your blades to snare up to 4 enemies within 21m and <font color = '#66bbff'>draw them towards you</font>.$BRYou may not draw bosses or elite monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to grab targets, and aggro.

String.name: Wind Walk I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Focus Generation</font>$BRCharge forward up to 24m and attack a target. $BRGrants the <font color = '#66bbff'>Howling String</font> effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used to interrupt the animations of <font color = '#f9b600'>all skills</font>. <font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> the skill damage of <font color = '#f9b600'>[Radiant Arrow], [Penetrating Arrow], and [Thunderbolt]</font> by 10% $calcValue(multiple,1001,0.0000005,2) when <font color = '#66bbff'>Howling String</font> is active.$BREffect based on your Physical Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to close the distance between you and your target. Great for exploiting <font color = '#66bbff'>weak spots</font>.

String.name: Wind Walk: Illusion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Focus Generation</font>$BRCharge forward up to 24m and attack a target. $BRAn illusion appears at your previous position and fires an arrow fowards. If the arrow hits your opponent, an <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Trace</font> is triggered.$BRGrants the <font color = '#66bbff'>Howling String</font> effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used to interrupt the animations of <font color = '#f9b600'>all skills</font>. <font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> the skill damage of <font color = '#f9b600'>[Radiant Arrow], [Penetrating Arrow], and [Thunderbolt]</font> by 10% $calcValue(multiple,1001,0.0000005,2) when <font color = '#66bbff'>Howling String</font> is active.$BREffect based on your Physical Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to close the distance between you and your target. Great for exploiting <font color = '#66bbff'>weak spots</font>.

String.name: Wind Walk: Protection
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Focus Generation</font>$BRCharge forward up to 24m and attack a target. $BRRenders you <font color = '#66bbff'>invincible</font> for a period of time.$BRGrants the <font color = '#66bbff'>Howling String</font> effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used to interrupt the animations of <font color = '#f9b600'>all skills</font>. <font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> the skill damage of <font color = '#f9b600'>[Radiant Arrow], [Penetrating Arrow], and [Thunderbolt]</font> by 10% $calcValue(multiple,1001,0.0000005,2) when <font color = '#66bbff'>Howling String</font> is active.$BREffect based on your Physical Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to close the distance between you and your target. Great for exploiting <font color = '#66bbff'>weak spots</font>.

String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Focus Generation</font>$BRCharge forward up to 24m and attack a target. $BRGrants the <font color = '#66bbff'>Howling String</font> effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used to interrupt the animations of <font color = '#f9b600'>all skills</font>. <font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> the skill damage of <font color = '#f9b600'>[Radiant Arrow], [Penetrating Arrow], and [Thunderbolt]</font> by 10% $calcValue(multiple,1001,0.0000005,2) when <font color = '#66bbff'>Howling String</font> is active.$BREffect based on your Physical Amplification.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to close the distance between you and your target. Great for exploiting <font color = '#66bbff'>weak spots</font>.

String.name: Thrall of Wrath II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Wrath that follows the summoner and will attack randomly with its three powerful area attacks for 20 seconds.$BR$BRThralls gain stat boosts based on the gear their summoner is wearing.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Vengeance</font> will cancel <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Wrath</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you need to <font color = '#66bbff'>attack multiple enemies</font>.

String.name: Restorative Burst II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRCreate a burst of healing 10 meters in front of you. Group members will heal $calcValue(heal,0,588,0) HP every second for 5 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when nearby allies are low on HP.

String.name: Mana Boost II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Enhance Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Increases</font> Attack Speed by 30% and MP by 8% for 20 seconds, and skill damage by 20% when attacking monsters.$BR$BRThe following skills are enhanced while Mana Boost II is active:$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Arcane Pulse</font>: Generates additional pulses.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Meteor Strike</font>: Summons additional meteors.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Fusion</font>: Able to use <font color = '#f9b600'>Elemental Fusion</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to boost your stats and enhance skills for a short period.

String.name: Thrall of Wrath III
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Wrath that follows the summoner and will attack randomly with its three powerful area attacks for 20 seconds.$BR$BRThralls gain stat boosts based on the gear their summoner is wearing.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Vengeance</font> will cancel <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Wrath</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you need to <font color = '#66bbff'>attack multiple enemies</font>.

String.name: Thrall of Wrath VII
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRSummon a Thrall of Wrath that follows the summoner and will attack randomly with its three powerful area attacks for 20 seconds.$BR$BRThralls gain stat boosts based on the gear their summoner is wearing.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Vengeance</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall Lord</font> will cancel <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Wrath</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when you need to <font color = '#66bbff'>attack multiple enemies</font>.

String.name: Windsong I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> <font color = '#f9b600'>Enhance Skills</font>$BRIncreases Movement Speed by 10% for 22 seconds, and <font color = '#66bbff'>resets</font> the cooldown of <font color = '#f9b600'>Find Weakness, Thunderbolt, Radiant Arrow, Penetrating Arrow, Illusion Arrow, Rapid Fire and Sequential Fire</font>.$BRWhile the effect is active, the cooldowns of these skills are <font color = '#66bbff'>decreased</font> by 50% and Physical Amplification is increased by $H_S_GOOD5%$COLOR_END.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhile active, increases the Attack Speed of <font color = '#f9b600'>Radiant Arrow, Penetrating Arrow and Thunderbolt</font> by 30%, and the effectiveness of <font color = '#f9b600'>Rapid Fire</font> is also increased. $BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Decreases</font> the RE consumption of <font color = '#f9b600'>Wind Walk</font> by 30.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>boost your stats and enhance other skills</font>.

String.name: Unleashed: Sinister
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect] </font><font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed Skill</font>$BRSmack the target with the axe in your left hand. Recovers $H_S_GOOD2%$COLOR_END of your Maximum HP on every successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggers <font color = '#F66bbff'>Unleashed: Enhancement</font>. <font color = '#F66bbff'>Unleashed: Enhancement</font> increases your Attack Speed</font>, and the skill damage of <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Dexter</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Sinister</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Rampage</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleash is active, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Command: Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRAim at a target within $maxDistance and press the skill button to command your summoned creature to attack <font color = '#66bbff'>that target</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while aiming at your target.

String.name: Energy Stars I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Enhance Skill$BRLock on a target within $maxDistance and fire an energy bolt.$BRThe bolt damages the target and increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Power</font> by 20, <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed</font> by 8, and decreasing cooldown time by 5% for 20 seconds of group members around the target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move the reticule over to lock on target, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot.$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>boost</font> group members.

String.name: Ice Lances
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Frost Attack</font>$BRFreezes water molecules in the air into projectiles that travel up to 15m, <font color = '#66bbff'>with or without casting</font>.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD4%$COLOR_END of your Max. MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRA successful hit from <font color = '#f9b600'>Arcane Pulse</font> or <font color = '#f9b600'>Nova</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>increases</font> skill damage by 10% for 4 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse as part of an <font color = '#f9b600'>attack chain</font>.

String.name: Infuriate I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BREnrages all monsters within $maxDistance and increases your <font color = '#66bbff'>aggro</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRRequires <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance</font>. After using <font color = '#F9B600'>Infuriate I</font>, you cannot deactivate <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance</font> or switch to <font color = '#F9B600'>Assault Stance</font> for 3 minutes.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to <font color = '#66bbff'>draw aggro</font> from monsters.

String.name: Gust Arrow I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Charge Skill$BRShoots an empowered arrow that <font color = '#66bbff'>staggers</font> and <font color = '#66bbff'>knocks down</font> all enemies within 40m.$BR$BRWhile the skill charges, you are <font color = '#66bbff'>invincible</font> and <font color = '#66bbff'>immune</font> to reactions. Damage increases if a monsters HP is low.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRTriggers <font color = '#f9b600'>Sequential Fire</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to incapacitate a group of enemies.

String.name: Unleashed: Rampage
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect] </font><font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed Skill$BRCrush the target with both your axes. Recovers 3% of your Maximum HP each time you swing your weapon.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRIncreases the skill damage of <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Beast Fury</font> each time you hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhile <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleash</font> is active, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Command: Follow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BRCommand your thrall to <font color = '#66bbff'>follow you</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to move your thrall near you.

String.name: Epiphany of the Goddess I
String.tooltip: TEST Priest Skill 1 (T4+)

String.name: Fusion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Elemental Advantage$BRSuccessful hits by skills with <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Flame Attack, <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Frost Attack, or [Effect]</font> Arcane Attack charge up your Fusion meter. When two elements align, you may cast one of three special Fusion skills, all of which <font color = '#66bbff'>share the same cooldown</font>.$BRReplenishes $H_S_GOOD15%$COLOR_END of max MP on successful hit.$BR$BRFlame and Frost</font>: Activates <font color = '#f9b600'>Prime Flame</font><font color = '#66bbff'>Arcane and Flame</font>: Activates <font color = '#f9b600'>Arcane Storm</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Frost and Arcane</font>: Activates <font color = '#f9b600'>Iceberg</font>$BR$BR[Enhanced Skill]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Mana Boost II</font> allows you to combine all three elements into <font color = '#f9b600'>Elemental Fusion</font>$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCharge your fusion meter by using elemental skills</font>.

String.name: Rain of Blows XI
String.tooltip: Execute a flurry of sword swings while advancing on your foe. You take 30% less damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger. Activates faster if used after Combative Strike, Pounce, or Cascade of Stuns.

String.name: Rain of Blows XI
String.tooltip: Execute a flurry of sword swings while advancing on your foe. You take 30% less damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger. Activates faster if used after Combative Strike, Pounce, or Cascade of Stuns.

String.name: Prime Flame
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Fusion Skill$BRFuse <font color = '#66bbff'>Flame and Frost</font> into a penetrating</font> projectile that returns to you, damaging enemies in a 27m straight line.$BRReplenishes $H_S_GOOD7.5%$COLOR_END of max MP on successful hit.$BRTargets hit twice by Prime Flame are <font color = '#66bbff'>stunned</font> for 2 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCombine Flame and Frost</font> elements for a penetrating attack.

String.name: Arcane Storm
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Fusion Skill$BRFuse <font color = '#66bbff'>Arcane and Flame</font> into an elemental storm that <font color = '#66bbff'>knock enemies back</font> within 7m.$BRYou have greatly increased resistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown and stagger</font> while casting.$BRReplenishes $H_S_GOOD15%$COLOR_END of max MP on successful hit$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCombine <font color = '#66bbff'>Arcane and Flame</font> elements to knock back nearby enemies.

String.name: Iceberg
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Fusion Skill$BRFuse <font color = '#66bbff'>Frost and Arcane</font> into an iceberg that slides up to 18min the direction of movement. The iceberg <font color = '#66bbff'>lifts targets into the air</font> along its path.$BRReplenishes $H_S_GOOD15%$COLOR_END of max MP on successful hit$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCombine <font color = '#66bbff'>Frost and Arcane</font> elements to lift enemies into the air.

String.name: Elemental Fusion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Fusion Skill$BRWhile <font color = '#f9b600'>Mana Boost II</font> is active, fuse all 3 elements into a targeted explosion that deals severe damage, <font color = '#66bbff'>staggers</font> enemies, and triggers <font color = '#66bbff'>Element Zero</font>.$BRYou have greatly increased resistance to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown and stagger</font> while casting.$BRReplenishes $H_S_GOOD15%$COLOR_END of max MP on successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chained Skill Guide]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Element Zero</font> activates <font color = '#f9b600'>Implosion</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRCombine all 3 elements into a massive elemental explosion.

String.name: Illusion Arrow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoots a powerful Illusion Arrow. The arrow deals damage to any opponents it hits, and decreases <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack and Movement Speed</font>. $BRGrants the <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Energy</font> effect when fired and resets the cooldown time for <font color = '#f9b600'>Radiant Arrow and Penetrating Arrow</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Charging</font> is increased while the <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Energy</font> effect is active. When using the <font color = '#f9b600'>Penetrating Arrow, Radiant Arrow and Thunderbolt</font> skills, an arrow is also shot from the illusion. If your opponent is hit by the illusion attack, the <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Trace</font> effect is triggered. <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Trace</font> stacks up to 20 times. If an opponent is hit during <font color = '#f9b600'>Illusion Explosion</font>, the skill inflicts additional damage depending on the number of stacks. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Unleashed: Beast Fury
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect] </font>Unleashed Skill$BRSacrifice 6% of your Maximum HP to unleash a series of brutal attacks as you rush forward. While rushing forward, damage taken is reduced by 50%.$BRUsing the skill consumes <font color = '#66bbff'>bonuses</font> from <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Sinister</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Dexter</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Rampage</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Civil Unrest]</font>$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Beast Fury</font> cannot be used in the Civil Unrest area.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRThe skill can be used to interrupt <font color = '#F9B600'>unleashed attack skills</font>.[Skill Usage]</font>While <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleash is active, press the skill button while facing the target.

String.name: Warding Totem I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRSummons a totem 10m in front of you that casts a <font color = '#66bbff'>warding effect</font> on allies within 20m and <font color = '#66bbff'>recovers $calcValue(heal,51,400,0) HP</font> every 2 seconds. The totem lasts for 10 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRDuring combat, use when many allies have low HP.

String.name: Healing Immersion I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRLock on a target within 19m and fire a healing light to <font color = '#66bbff'>restore HP</font> by $calcValue(heal,0,2834,0) to all group members within 7m of the locked target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move the reticule over to lock on the target, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets. Use when distant group members are low on HP.

String.name: Blade Draw IX
String.tooltip: Stab and slash your target as you draw your weapon from the wound. Activates faster if used after Traverse Cut, Vortex Slash, Charging Slash, Cross Parry, or Rising Fury.

If an opponent is hit during <font color = '#f9b600'>Illusion Explosion</font>, the skill inflicts additional damage depending on the number of stacks. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Warding Totem II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> <font color = '#f9b600'>Healing Skill</font>$BRSummons a totem 10m in front of you. The totem gives all party members within a 20m radius <font color = '#66bbff'>immunity to being knocked down and staggered</font> for 3 seconds. Also <font color = '#66bbff'>restores HP</font> by $calcValue(heal,51,500,0) every 2 sec. for 10 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRDuring combat, use when many allies have low HP.

String.name: Healing Immersion II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRLock on a target within 19m and fire a healing light to <font color = '#66bbff'>restore HP</font> by $calcValue(heal,0,3149,0) to all group members within 7m of the locked target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move the reticule over to lock on the target, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets. Use when distant group members are low on HP.

String.name: Healing Immersion II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRLock on a target within 19m and fire a healing light to <font color = '#66bbff'>restore HP</font> by $calcValue(heal,0,3149,0) to all group members within 7m of the locked target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move the reticule over to lock on the target, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets. Use when distant group members are low on HP.

String.name: Illusion Explosion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoots multiple arrows and the illusion simultaneously, dealing damage to opponents. Hitting targets grants a slight chance of triggering <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Trace</font>. $BRAfter the illusion has disappeared, a powerful arrow is shot forward. The target suffers damage as is knocked down. If an opponent is hit with <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Trace</font>, the skill inflicts additional damage depending on the number of stacks. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Numbing Totem
String.tooltip: Summon a totem 10m in front of you which decreases the Attack speed of enemies within 15m. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRQuickly leap out of harm's way.$BR -<font color = '#66bbff'>Invincible</font> while moving$BR -You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button to dodge in the current movement direction or default to <font color = '#66bbff'>jump backward</font>.

String.name: Scythe II
String.tooltip: Deliver a deadly sweeping arc, attacking multiple enemies. Scythe exploits Edge generated by warrior skills to do more damage. Activates faster if used after Rain of Blows, Poison Blade, Blade Draw, Evasive Roll, or Leaping Strike.

String.name: Illusion Explosion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoots multiple arrows and the illusion simultaneously, dealing damage to opponents. Hitting targets grants a slight chance of triggering <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Trace</font>. $BRAfter the illusion has disappeared, a powerful arrow is shot forward. The target suffers damage as is knocked down. If an opponent is hit with <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Trace</font>, the skill inflicts additional damage depending on the number of stacks. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

Hitting targets grants a slight chance of triggering <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Trace</font>. $BRAfter the illusion has disappeared, a powerful arrow is shot forward. The target suffers damage as is knocked down. If an opponent is hit with <font color = '#66bbff'>Illusion Trace</font>, the skill inflicts additional damage depending on the number of stacks. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing the target.

String.name: Scythe II
String.tooltip: Deliver a deadly sweeping arc, attacking multiple enemies. Scythe exploits Edge generated by warrior skills to do more damage. Activates faster if used after Rain of Blows, Poison Blade, Blade Draw, Evasive Roll, or Leaping Strike.

String.name: Speed Totem
String.tooltip: Summon a totem 10m in front of you which increases the Attack speed of allies within 7m. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Grace of Resurrection
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRGrants a blessing which enables the priest to <font color = '#66bbff'>resurrect</font> immediately with 100% <font color = '#66bbff'>HP and MP</font>. The blessing lasts for $time.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill before entering combat.

String.name: Implosion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUsing the power of <font color = '#66bbff'>Element Zero</font> (acquired through <font color = '#f9b600'>Elemental Fusion</font>), gather wild elemental energy into a massive explosion that severely damages all nearby enemies and <font color = '#66bbff'>lifts them into the air</font>.$BRDuring casting, enemies in the targeted area are <font color = '#66bbff'>pulled together</font>. After casting, you are <font color = '#66bbff'>invincible</font> for a short period.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhile casting, the cooldowns of <font color = '#f9b600'>Teleport</font> and <font color = '#f9b600'>Backstep</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>decrease</font> by 50%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRYou can greatly shorten the casting time by using an <font color = '#f9b600'>Escape skill</font>, but you will <font color = '#66bbff'>not receive the invincible effect</font>.

String.name: Traverse Cut X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMakes 3 quick lunges to the front. Increases your <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed</font> by 0.9% per each successful hit, and the effect stacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster and attacks up to 13 times if you first use <font color = '#F9B600'>Combative Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Poison Blade</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance II</font> is active, also increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed</font> of group members.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your Attack Speed.

String.name: Traverse Cut X
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMakes 3 quick lunges to the front. Increases your <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed</font> by 0.9% per each successful hit, and the effect stacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster and attacks up to 13 times if you first use <font color = '#F9B600'>Combative Strike</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Poison Blade</font>, and <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font>.$BRWhen <font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance II</font> is active, also increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Attack Speed</font> of group members.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to increase your Attack Speed.

String.name: Assailing Totem
String.tooltip: Summon a totem 10m in front of you which decreases resistance to harmful effects of enemies within 15m. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Rolling Reload
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDodge enemy attacks and eliminate the cooldown for <font color = '#F9B600'>Scattershot</font>. You can dodge twice within 4 seconds, with the cooldown starting after the second use.$BR - Invincible while moving$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BRDodging cancels animations for all skills but $BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Balder's Vengeance</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to recharge skills, cancel skill animations, escape attacks, or to move quickly.

String.name: Quick Dash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDodge past your enemy's attack.$BRA cooldown time triggers when the skill is used again within 8 seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRDash away to avoid an enemy's attack.

String.name: Zenobia's Vortex I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUnleashes a whirlwind up to 18m, dealing damage to all enemies in its path and briefly <font color = '#66bbff'>throwing them into the air</font>, unless they are bosses or elite monsters.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when facing multiple enemies.

String.name: Shadow Step
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLeap forward to evade enemy attacks. You can Shadow Step twice within 4 seconds before a cooldown applies.$BR - Invincible while moving.$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to escape or move quickly.

String.name: Blade Waltz
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Edge Skill$BRSpin forward, attacking all nearby enemies. Press the skill button again within 7 seconds to attack a second time. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Assault Stance IV</font> doubles your <font color = '#66bbff'>chance to crit</font>.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Defensive Stance II</font> adds a <font color = '#66bbff'>frontal defense</font> effect and draws high aggro.$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Waltz</font> can interrupt other skill animations.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to escape a cluster of enemies and start a combo chain.

String.name: Rolling Reload
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDodge enemy attacks and eliminate the cooldown for <font color = '#F9B600'>Scattershot</font>. You can dodge twice within 4 seconds, with the cooldown starting after the second use.$BR - Invincible while moving$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BRDodging cancels animations for all skills but $BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Balder's Vengeance</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to recharge skills, cancel skill animations, escape attacks, or to move quickly.

String.name: Dashing Reload
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Laser Targeting$BRDash forward to dodge enemy attacks, eliminate the cooldown for <font color = '#F9B600'>Mana Missiles</font>, and temporarily increase your Movement Speed by 80. You can dash twice within 4 seconds, with the cooldown starting after the second use.$BR - Invincible while moving$BR - You can move through units without restriction.$BR$BRDodging cancels animations for all skills but $BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Balder's Vengeance</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhance Skill]</font>$BRUsing <font color = '#F9B600'>Mana Missiles</font> after <font color = '#F9B600'>Dashing Reload</font> instantly overcharges the skill and increases the missiles' speed, but removes the knockdown effect.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to recharge skills, cancel skill animations, escape attacks, or to move quickly.

String.name: Contagion I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on and apply Infection on one target within $maxDistance for 20 seconds. Infected target's <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> is reduced by 5% and the target spreads a disease that deals 1141 damage per second.$BRUsing this skill does not automatically start <font color = '#66bbff'>combat status</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals less damage and reduces players' <font color = '#66bbff'>HP recovery.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]$BRUse the skill on a target with high HP.

String.name: Modular Weapon System
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummons a deadly construct that modifies skills and aids you in battle.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhanced Skills]</font>$BR - <font color = '#F9B600'>Balder's Vengeance</font>: Increases skill damage by 20%.$BR - <font color = '#F9B600'>Remote Trigger</font>: Increases skill damage by 20%.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Modified Skills]</font>$BRAdds <font color = '#F9B600'>Laser Targeting</font> to the following skills, altering their effects:$BR - <font color = '#F9B600'>Rolling Reload</font> becomes <font color = '#F9B600'>Dashing Reload</font>.$BR - <font color = '#F9B600'>Blast</font> becomes <font color = '#F9B600'>Detonate</font>.$BR - <font color = '#F9B600'>Burst Fire</font> becomes <font color = '#F9B600'>Targeted Burst Fire</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Usage]</font>$BRUse to temporarily increase skill damage and Movement Speed.

String.name: Divine Intervention
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRetrieves a group member within $maxDistance in front of the caster. Cannot grab an ally riding a mount.<font color = '#66bbff'>The group member becomes invincible for a few seconds.</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move the reticule over to lock on target, then press the skill button again or left-click to activate the skill.

String.name: Aerial Scythe
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Edge Skill, exploits Edge</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Generates Edge)</font> - Leap into the air, initiating a spinning attack. You take 25% less damage while using the skill.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Costs Edge)</font> - Press the skill button again to deal a devastating blow from above. You take 25% less damage while using the skill. If you have 3 or more stacks of <font color = '#66bbff'>Edge</font>, your attack uses them all, increasing damage based on the number of stacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used to interrupt <font color = '#F9B600'>all skills</font>. <font color = '#00A0FF'>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhen you have <font color = '#66bbff'>3 to 8 stacks of Edge</font>, use while facing the enemy for better effect.

String.name: Lightning Strike I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCalls down a 15m line of lightning bolts in front of you, damaging any opponents in its path.$BRConsumes $H_S_GOOD3%$COLOR_END of your Maximum MP$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse while enemies are in front of you.

String.name: Aerial Scythe
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Edge Skill, exploits Edge</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Generates Edge)</font> - Leap into the air, initiating a spinning attack. You take 25% less damage while using the skill.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Costs Edge)</font> - Press the skill button again to deal a devastating blow from above. You take 25% less damage while using the skill. If you have 3 or more stacks of <font color = '#66bbff'>Edge</font>, your attack uses them all, increasing damage based on the number of stacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used to interrupt <font color = '#F9B600'>all skills</font>. <font color = '#00A0FF'>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhen you have <font color = '#66bbff'>3 to 8 stacks of Edge</font>, use while facing the enemy for better effect.

String.name: Aerial Scythe
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font><font color = '#F9B600'> Edge Skill, exploits Edge</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Generates Edge)</font> - Leap into the air, initiating a spinning attack. You take 25% less damage while using the skill.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Costs Edge)</font> - Press the skill button again to deal a devastating blow from above. You take 25% less damage while using the skill. If you have 3 or more stacks of <font color = '#66bbff'>Edge</font>, your attack uses them all, increasing damage based on the number of stacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used to interrupt <font color = '#F9B600'>all skills</font>. <font color = '#00A0FF'>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhen you have <font color = '#66bbff'>3 to 8 stacks of Edge</font>, use while facing the enemy for better effect.

You take 25% less damage while using the skill.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Costs Edge)</font> - Press the skill button again to deal a devastating blow from above. You take 25% less damage while using the skill. If you have 3 or more stacks of <font color = '#66bbff'>Edge</font>, your attack uses them all, increasing damage based on the number of stacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRCan be used to interrupt <font color = '#F9B600'>all skills</font>. <font color = '#00A0FF'>.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]</font>$BRWhen you have <font color = '#66bbff'>3 to 8 stacks of Edge</font>, use while facing the enemy for better effect.

String.name: Contagion II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLock on and apply Infection on one target within $maxDistance for 20 seconds. Infected target's <font color = '#66bbff'>Endurance</font> is reduced by 5% and the target spreads a disease that deals 1585 damage per second.$BRUsing this skill does not automatically start <font color = '#66bbff'>combat status</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BRDeals less damage and reduces players' <font color = '#66bbff'>HP recovery.$BR$BR[Skill Usage]$BRUse the skill on a target with high HP.

String.name: Mass Divine Intervention
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRetrieves up to 4 group members within $maxDistance in front of the caster. Cannot grab an ally riding a mount. <font color = '#66bbff'>Those group members become invincible for a few seconds.</font>$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button once and move the reticule over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to activate the skill.

String.name: Boomerang Pulse I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRFire a rebounding bolt which damages all enemies in its path, and also <font color = '#66bbff'>heals</font> group members in its path by $calcValue(heal,0,582,0). Using this skill does not automatically start combat status.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill while facing a target. Chain with a <font color = '#F9B600'>Warding Totem</font> for better effect.

String.name: Holy Burst
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Healing Skill$BRSend a bolt of divine energy forward <font color = '#66bbff'>healing</font> $calcValue(heal,0,800,0) HP and granting <font color = '#66bbff'>Devoted Favor</font> to up to 5 allies. This bolt also damages enemies in its path.$BRThe bolt explodes <font color = '#66bbff'>upon reaching maximum range</font>, <font color = '#66bbff'>healing</font> nearby allies an additional $calcValue(heal,0,1200,0) HP and <font color = '#66bbff'>enhancing</font> the effect of <font color = '#66bbff'>Devoted Favor</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhanced Devoted Favor]</font>$BRImmune to <font color = '#66bbff'>knockdown and stagger</font> for 3 seconds. Reduces <font color = '#66bbff'>damage taken</font> by 30%, and <font color = '#66bbff'>heals</font> $calcValue(heal,0,500,0) HP per second.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when multiple enemies and allies are ahead of you, and allies are low on HP.

String.name: Blade Frenzy
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCarve your way forward, then execute a devastating spin attack, avoiding all enemy attacks.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRActivates faster after using <font color = '#F9B600'>Scythe</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Aerial Scythe</font>, or <font color = '#F9B600'>Evasive Roll</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font>$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Frenzy</font> cannot be used in the Civil Unrest area.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse as a finishing move against a powerful foe.

String.name: Detonate
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Laser Targeting$BRFire a shot which explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away. Replenishes 100 MP on a successful hit. The Modular Weapon System fires 2 additional shots, each of which decreases the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Dashing Reload</font> on a successful hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRRecover 40 Willpower on successful Modular Weapon System hits.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BREnhanced Basic Attack. Can be used while moving.

Chain with a <font color = '#F9B600'>Warding Totem</font> for better effect.

String.name: Unsummon Thrall
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUnsummons your Thrall on cast.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill to put away your Thrall.

String.name: Remote Trigger
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Time Bomb)</font> - The Modular Weapon System deploys a Time Bomb in front of you, lifts you in the air, then moves you backward.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Remote Detonation)</font> - Press the skill button again while moving to draw a line of fire in front of you. If the Time Bomb is detonated by Remote Trigger, the explosion's range is increased by 50%, its damage by 10%, and gains a high chance to crit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRRecover 20 Willpower when shooting a Time Bomb with Remote Trigger, and 40 Willpower when the Time Bomb explodes.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRDramatically improves the damage of a deployed Time Bomb.

String.name: Edict of Judgment
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Affected Effect]</font><font color = '#f9b600'> Enhance Skill$BRGrant Edict of Judgment</font> effect to group members for 20 seconds, increasing Power by 50$calcValue(multiple,1004,0.0001,0) and Crit Factor by 30$calcValue(multiple,1004,0.0001,0).$BRThis effect is increased based on your Magic Resistance.$BR$BRWhile in effect, caster can only use <font color = '#f9b600'>Holy Burst</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Divine Charge</font>, and <font color = '#f9b600'>Restorative Burst</font> for <font color = '#f9b600'>healing and shield</font> skills.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Enhances</font> <font color = '#f9b600'>skills listed below</font>. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRWhen in effect, reduces cooldown by 50% and adds <font color = '#66bbff'>additional</font> effects to the following skills: <font color = '#f9b600'>Holy Burst</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Metamorphic Blast</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Final Reprisal</font>, <font color = '#f9b600'>Shocking Implosion</font>, and <font color = '#f9b600'>Zenobia's Vortex</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhanced Skills]</font>$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Holy Burst</font>: Damage increases by 30%, grants <font color = '#66bbff'>Enhanced Devoted Favor</font> to allies even if they do not have <font color = '#66bbff'>Devoted Favor</font> effect.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Metamorphic Blast</font>: Increases damage by 100% and expands your <font color = '#66bbff'>attack range</font>. $BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Shocking Implosion</font>: Increases damage by 30% and expands your <font color = '#66bbff'>attack range</font>. Also, <font color = '#66bbff'>heals HP</font> on nearby allies with successful hit.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Final Reprisal</font>: Increases damage by 50% and expands your <font color = '#66bbff'>attack range$calcValue(heal,0,2400,0)</font>. Also, <font color = '#66bbff'>replenishes MP</font> of nearby allies on successful hit, but the Knockdown effect is removed.$BR<font color = '#f9b600'>Zenobia's Vortex</font>: Increases damage by 50% and expands your <font color = '#66bbff'>attack range</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Civil Unrest]</font>Edict of Judgment</font> cannot be used in the Civil Unrest area.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse when <font color = '#66bbff'>additional damage</font> is needed. Press the skill button again to remove the effect.

String.name: Remote Trigger
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 1 (Time Bomb)</font> - The Modular Weapon System deploys a Time Bomb in front of you, lifts you in the air, then moves you backward.$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Stage 2 (Remote Detonation)</font> - Press the skill button again while moving to draw a line of fire in front of you. If the Time Bomb is detonated by Remote Trigger, the explosion's range is increased by 50%, its damage by 10%, and gains a high chance to crit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRRecover 20 Willpower when shooting a Time Bomb with Remote Trigger, and 40 Willpower when the Time Bomb explodes.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRDramatically improves the damage of a deployed Time Bomb.

String.name: Mass Teleport
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Teleport</font> yourself and up to 4 nearby group members. $BR - Invincible while teleporting$BR - Group can move through units without restriction.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse to healp nearby group members escape or move quickly.

String.name: Balder's Vengeance II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Willpower Skill$BRDeal damage to all enemies in front of you, up to $maxDistance, with a very high chance to crit. You are <font color = '#66bbff'>immune</font> to damage, but not stuns, while using this skill.$BRTriples Arcane Splash damage for a short period.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRLine up enemies and press the skill button when your Willpower is full.

String.name: Balder's Vengeance II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Willpower Skill$BRDeal damage to all enemies in front of you, up to $maxDistance, with a very high chance to crit. You are <font color = '#66bbff'>immune</font> to damage, but not stuns, while using this skill.$BRTriples Arcane Splash damage for a short period.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRLine up enemies and press the skill button when your Willpower is full.

String.name: Balder's Vengeance II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Willpower Skill$BRDeal damage to all enemies in front of you, up to $maxDistance, with a very high chance to crit. You are <font color = '#66bbff'>immune</font> to damage, but not stuns, while using this skill.$BRTriples Arcane Splash damage for a short period.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRLine up enemies and press the skill button when your Willpower is full.

String.name: Thrall Augmentation
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Toggle Skill$BRWhile activated, using a <font color = '#F9B600'>summon skill</font> <font color = '#66bbff'>summons</font> enhanced thralls that grants <font color = '#66bbff'>beneficial effects</font> to nearby allies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhanced Thrall Effects]</font>$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Protection</font>: Grants a <font color = '#66bbff'>shield</font> that absorbs 30,000 $calcValue(multiple,1004,0.5,0) HP for 12 seconds with immunity to <font color = '#66bbff'>knock-down and stagger</font> while the shield is active.$BRAbsorbed amount of damage increases by $H_S_GOOD50%$COLOR_END of your Magic Resistance. Costs additional 340 MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Life</font>: <font color = '#66bbff'>Removes harmful effects</font> cast on nearby allies. For 5 seconds, increases <font color = '#66bbff'>Movement Speed in combat</font> by 10, and instantly <font color = '#66bbff'>heals</font> $calcValue(heal,0,3105,0) HP of your ally and <font color = '#66bbff'>replenishes</font> 773 MP per second. Costs additional 300 MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Vengeance</font>: Increases $BRPower</font> by 15$calcValue(multiple,1004,0.0001,0) for 12 seconds (This effect increases as your Magic Resistance increases). Effect ends if $BR<font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down$BR$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>. Costs additional 700 MP. Thrall of Wrath</font>: Increases $BRCrit Power</font> by 0.6$calcValue(multiple,1004,0.000002,1) times for 20 seconds. This effect is increased based on your Magic Resistance. Effect ends if <font color = '#66bbff'>knocked-down. Costs additional 1000 MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRActivate the skill effect, then summon a thrall near allies.

String.name: Summon: Elemental God
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Summon</font> the Elemental God in front of you. Recovers HP of nearby allies to <font color = '#66bbff'>maximum</font> and grants a <font color = '#66bbff'>shield</font>.$BRDeals great damage to nearby enemies as the God hops around in a circle.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font> $BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Vengeance</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Wrath</font> will cancel Elemental God.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while facing <font color = '#66bbff'>summon location</font>.

String.name: Arunic Release
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRExplode a maximum of 4 motes ahead of you. <font color = '#F9B600'>Arun's Vitae</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Arun's Tears</font> both apply <font color = '#66bbff'>HP recovery and MP replenishment</font> to allies and deal damage to enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Chain Skill Guide]</font>$BRChain with <font color = '#F9B600'>Arun's Vitae</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Arun's Tears</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUse the skill when <font color = '#F9B600'>Arun's Vitae</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Arun's Tears</font> motes are near the targets.

String.name: Obliteration
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Laser Targeting$BRWith the <font color = '#F9B600'>Modular Weapon System</font> active, leap into the air and unleash a devastating missile barrage. You are immune to damage while in the air.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Enhance Skill]</font>$BRAll your attacks have double the normal chance to crit and are considered to be attacks from behind for a few seconds.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Focused Willpower]</font>$BRRecover 40 Willpower per successful missile hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRUnleash a devastating missile barrage 10m ahead of you to generate Arcane Splash.

String.name: Summon: Thrall Lord
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font> Summon Skill$BR<font color = '#66bbff'>Summon</font> the Thrall Lord in front of you, which deals damage to nearby enemies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Civil Unrest]</font>$BR<font color = '#F9B600'>Summon: Thrall Lord</font> cannot be used in the Civil Unrest area.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Limits]</font>$BRSummoning a <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Vengeance</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Thrall of Wrath</font> will cancel Thrall Lord.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Skill Usage]</font>$BRPress the skill button while facing <font color = '#66bbff'>summon location</font>.

Increases skill XP earned. The bonus changes each time the skill is used.
Cannot be used while moving.
Cooldown: 1 hour

String.name: Stormcharge
String.tooltip:
The unbridled power of the Frost Monarch causes your skills to deal more damage, you suffer less damage, and your attack speed and Flight Gauge are increased.
Cannot be used while moving. Using the skill activates the Stormcharge buff for 2 hours.
Cooldown: 24 hours

String.name: Rexpert Turbosaurus
String.tooltip:
Become a rexpert crafter. Increases your crafting speed by $H_W_GOOD$30%$COLOR_END for 10 minutes. Also resets the cooldown of all other mighty and ancient mighty flying mount skills.

Cooldown: 2 hours

Cooldown: 2 hours

String.name: Shiba Snacks
String.tooltip: Feed your Shiba a tasty treat! But as cute as it is to watch him chowing down on that little morsel, just remember that too much of the good stuff and he might need to go on a diet. (Increases your max HP by 5% but doesn't share cooldown with other mounts.)

String.name: Gift of Wisdom
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODGift of Wisdom$COLOR_END$BRThe wisdom of your mount grants you various combat effects which last for 30 minutes.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>Gift of Wisdom</font>$BR<font color = '#41FF3A'>- Everful Nostrum</font>$BR<font color = '#41FF3A'>- Bravery Potion</font>$BR<font color = '#41FF3A'>- Food buff</font>$BR<font color = '#41FF3A'>- Superior Noctenium Elixir</font>$BR$BRItems with similar effects cannot be used at the same time. The effect remains even if you die.$BR$BR<font color = '#FF0000'>Warning!$BRThe effect disappears as soon as you join a battleground or Civil Unrest.</font>$BRGift of Wisdom can only be activated once every 24 hours.

String.name: Forest's Embrace
String.tooltip:
[Forest's Embrace]
Increases Physical and Magic Amplification by $H_W_GOOD8,000$COLOR_END
Increases Physical and Magic Resistance by $H_W_GOOD4,000$COLOR_END$COLOR_END
Increases Physical and Magic Crit Power by $H_W_GOOD0.05

[Duration]
1 hour
$BRThe Kami's Forest's Embrace passive ability increases your Crit Power by 50%

You can only benefit from the skills of one mighty flying mount at any one time. Forest's Embrace can only be activated once every 24 hours. Only the effects of the last mount you summon apply.

String.name: Summon Rainbow Pig (GeForce)
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODFlying Speed: 280; Flying Duration: 538; Speed: 280;$COLOR_END$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[General Flight Capability: 115]</font>$BR$BRSummon Rainbow Pig $H_S_GOODwith its high flying speed and duration$COLOR_END. Restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second.

String.name: Summon: Regulus
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMovement Speed 280.$COLOR_END$BRSummon Regulus, a lion mount.
