String.name: Flight: Mighty Diamond Dragon
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODSpeed: 290/290; flying duration: 694; effect: MP, HP$COLOR_END$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[General Flight Capability: 136] </font>$BR$BRSummons a Mighty Diamond Dragon who restores 1% of your max MP and HP every second.

String.name: Flight: Ancient Mighty Armored Dragon
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODSpeed: 290/290; flying duration: 928; effect: MP, HP$COLOR_END$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[General Flight Capability: 157] </font>$BR$BRSummons an Ancient Mighty Armored Dragon who restores 2% of your max MP and HP every second. The dragon is surrounded by an aura that increases the movement speed of nearby group member's mounts by 10. String.name: Summon Legendary Shenlong
String.tooltip:
$H_S_GOODFlying Speed: 320; Flying Duration: 940; Speed: 290; Mounted Effects: HP/MP Regeneration$COLOR_END$BR[General Flight Capability: 181]$BR$BRSummon the legendary Shenlong $H_S_GOODwith its high flying speed and duration$COLOR_END. Restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second.$BRYou receive the Blessing of Wisdom effect which grants you various powerful combat effects for 30 minutes. $BR$BRBlessing of Wisdom$BR- Everful Nostrum$BR- Bravery Potion$BR- Food buff$BR- Superior Noctenium Elixir$BR$BRItems with similar effects cannot be used at the same time. The effect remains even if you die.$BR$BRWarning!$BRThe effect disappears as soon as you join a battleground or Civil Unrest. $BR$BRThe Wisdom's Omen passive ability increases Crit Power by 100%. You can only benefit from the skills of one ancient mighty flying mount at any one time. Only the effects of the last mount you summon apply.

You will receive the legendary Shenlong when the next rankings season starts.

String.name: Kick
String.tooltip: Kick the rolling haybale to move it around the playing area. And by "kick" we mean whack it with a ball.

String.name: Pig Pheromone
String.tooltip: Throw pheromones at a pigling from $maxDistance or less to make it follow you.

String.name: Drum Beat
String.tooltip: Aim and hit a toad drum within $maxDistance to play it.

Deactivates free flight.

String.name: Alkaline Water Bomb
String.tooltip: Throw an Alkaline Water Bomb to remove the Acidic Field.

String.name: Alkaline Water Bomb Mode
String.tooltip: Cancel Alkaline Water Bomb mode.

String.name: Personalized Greeting
String.tooltip:
Say hello in your own unique styletell a joke, sing a song, spout poetry (up to 80 characters in length). Recipients of your greetings get some pep to their step. <
><font color = '#80e71c'>Edit your greeting messages via the 'Change Greeting' button in the Details section of the Skills menu (K).</font>

String.name: Summon Group
String.tooltip: TERA Rewards skill: Teleport all group members within the same province to your side. You cannot teleport group members who are in other provinces.

String.name: Summon NPC: Phargo
String.tooltip: TERA Rewards skill: Summons a traveling banker for you and your group.

String.name: Elemental Fire
String.tooltip: Pushes back and burns enemies in a spray of flame.

String.name: Elemental Ice
String.tooltip: Pushes back enemies within $maxDistance. Will freeze enemies in place after 10 seconds.

String.name: Elemental Muck
String.tooltip: Summon a circle of muck 10m in front of you. Decreases Movement Speed and drains HP of enemies.

String.name: Elemental Blast
String.tooltip: Fires a bolt of damaging energy up to $maxDistance.

String.name: Darkan's Wings
String.tooltip:
[TERA Rewards Exclusive] Summon a pair of draconic wings to impress friends and foes alike.
Skill is canceled upon entering combat. Darkan's Wings do not grant the ability to fly.

String.name: Darkan's Blue Wings
String.tooltip: Focuses your inner power and gives you burning wings. The effect disappears if you are hit or inflict damage.

String.name: Darkan's Green Wings
String.tooltip: Focuses your inner power and gives you burning wings. The effect disappears if you are hit or inflict damage.

String.name: Darkan's Black Wings
String.tooltip: Focuses your inner power and gives you burning wings. The effect disappears if you are hit or inflict damage.

String.name: Darkan's Pink Wings
String.tooltip: Focuses your inner power and gives you burning wings. The effect disappears if you are hit or inflict damage.

String.name: Moon Lotus Aura
String.tooltip:
Activate the Moon Lotus Aura to sheath yourself in a gleaming aura for 30 seconds and receive the Moon Lotus Blessing for 15 minutes.

$H_W_GOOD[Effect]$COLOR_END Completely restores your HP and MP, increases your attack speed by $H_W_GOOD3$COLOR_END and your movement speed in combat by $H_W_GOOD5$COLOR_END.

$H_W_BADBlessing cooldown: 30 minutes.$COLOR_END
$H_W_BADCannot be used in combination with other Lotus Blessings.$COLOR_END
$H_W_BADAura cooldown: 5 seconds$COLOR_END

The aura disappears when you enter combat, the blessing remains.

String.name: Star Lotus Blessing
String.tooltip:
Sheath yourself in a gleaming aura for 30 seconds and receive the Star Lotus Blessing for 15 minutes.

$H_W_GOOD[Effect]$COLOR_END Completely restores your HP and MP, increases your attack speed by $H_W_GOOD3$COLOR_END and your movement speed in combat by $H_W_GOOD5$COLOR_END. $H_W_BADCannot be used in combination with other Lotus Blessings.$COLOR_END

The aura disappears when you enter combat, the blessing remains.

String.name: Moonlight Lotus Blessing
String.tooltip:
Activate the Moonlight Lotus Aura to sheath yourself in a gleaming aura for 30 seconds and receive the Moonlight Lotus Blessing for 15 minutes. Aura cooldown: 5 seconds

$H_W_GOOD[Effect]$COLOR_END
Completely restores your HP and MP, increases your attack speed by$H_W_GOOD 3$COLOR_END and your movement speed in combat by $H_W_GOOD5$COLOR_END.
$H_W_BADBlessing cooldown: 30 minutes.$COLOR_END$H_W_BADCannot be used in combination with other Lotus Blessings.$COLOR_END

The aura disappears when you enter combat, the blessing remains.

String.name: Mutate (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Turns a target within $maxDistance into a warthog that will fight for you. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Stun (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Stuns targets within $maxDistance temporarily. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Fear (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Frightens targets within $maxDistance. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Light (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Summons Balder's lamp $maxDistance in front of you. Balder's lamp kills monsters within 8m. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Punish (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Inflicts great damage on a target within $maxDistance. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Quake (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Knocks down targets within $maxDistance. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Repel
String.tooltip: Project a cone of oneiric energy that pushes nearby enemies $maxDistance away.

String.name: Inexorable Pull
String.tooltip: Drags all the enemies within $maxDistance toward you.

String.name: Human Cannonball
String.tooltip: Get engulfed in flame and fly 13m straight ahead and knocks down every target in your way and cause some damage.

String.name: Rising Wind
String.tooltip: Creates a cyclone that flings all enemies within $maxDistance up in the air.

String.name: Oneiric Lance
String.tooltip: Hold down the skill button to deal damage to all targets in the path of the effect.

String.name: Dream Bolt
String.tooltip: Project a blast of oneiric energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away.

String.name: Hush!
String.tooltip:
You cannot use any skills or items during the event!
Thank you for your cooperation! -Popori Club-

String.name: Rampage I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#ff0030'>Rage Skill</font>$BR Rush the enemy from up to 24m away and deliver a series of devastating blows.$BRProvides excellent defense, knocks monsters into the air (does not affect other players), and increases your Rage.

String.name: Snow Barrage
String.tooltip: Hold and charge the skill button to prepare and throw a number of snowballs with increasing damage.

String.name: Set Us Up, Da Bomb
String.tooltip: Blow yourself up, dealing damage to objects and enemies around you.

String.name: Self-Destruct
String.tooltip: You inflict damage on all nearby targets by blowing yourself up.

String.name: Summon: Felicity
String.tooltip: Use this manual to learn how to summon the cute Ser Picks-a-lot with a 72-slot tab of [special storage] and special emotes. He has the ability to gather ores, plants and essences at an enhanced speed, consuming 20% fewer production points.

String.name: Summon Pet: Wooley
String.tooltip: Summon your pet with the ability to [auto-loot].

String.name: Summon Pet: Candyspinner
String.tooltip: Summon your pet with the ability to [auto-loot].

String.name: Angler's Greeting
String.tooltip:
Say hello in the old angler style.
Skill will be used automatically during auto-fishing. Edit your greeting messages via the 'Change Greeting' button in the Details section of the Skills menu.

String.tooltip: Cancels zombification.

String.name: Location Scan
String.tooltip: Foes in an area around your current location are exposed to allies for a while.

String.tooltip: Cast a series of balls of flame on an area within a range, damaging both allies and opponents.
